Svayambhu: Paumacariu (Padmacarita) [the Rama story in Apabhramsa]
Based on the ed. by Harivallabha Cunilala Bhayani: Paumacariu of 
Kaviraja Svayambhudeva (A Pre-tenth Century Puranic Epic in Apabhramsa).
Bombay : Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan 1953-1960 (Singhi Jain Series, 34-36)


Input by Eva De Clercq, Ghent (Belgium)





___________________________________________

REFERENCE SYSTEM:

Pc_n,n.n = Paumacariu_saṃdhi,kaḍavaka.stanza


NOTE:
The sequence of the five kaṇḍas (Skt.: kāṇḍa),
which has not been integrated into the stanza numbering,
runs as follows:

I.   Vijjāharakaṇḍaṃ  = Saṃdhis 1 -20
II.  Ujjhākaṇḍaṃ  = Saṃdhis 21 - 42
III. Sundarakaṇḍaṃ  = Saṃdhis 43 - 56
IV.  Jujjhakaṇḍaṃ  = Saṃdhis 57 - 77
V.   Uttarakaṇḍaṃ = Saṃdhis 78 - 90
___________________________________________


$ = separator of metric units

kaïrāẏa-saẏambhueva-kiu


paümacariu


ṇamaha ṇava-kamala-komala-maṇahara-vara-vahala-kanti-sohillaṃ
   usahassa  pāẏa-kamalaṃ sa-surāsura-vandiẏaṃ sirasā
dīhara-samāsa-ṇālaṃ sadda-dalaṃ attha-kesarugghaviẏaṃ
   vuha-mahuẏara-pīẏa-rasaṃ saẏambhu-kavvuppalaṃ jaẏaü


pahilaü jaẏakārĕvi parama-muṇi  $  muṇi-vaẏaṇĕ jāhã siddhanta-jhuṇi
jhuṇi jāhã aṇiṭṭhiẏa rattidiṇu  $  jiṇu hiẏaĕ ṇa phiṭṭaï ekku khaṇu
khaṇu khaṇu vi jāhã ṇa vicalaï maṇu  $  maṇu maggaï jāhã mokkha-gamaṇu
gamaṇu vi jahĩ ṇaü jammaṇu maraṇu
maraṇu vi kaha hoi muṇīvarahã  $  muṇivara je laggā jiṇavarahã
jiṇavara jeṃ līẏa māṇa parahŏ (?)  $  paru keva ḍhukku jeṃ pariẏaṇahŏ
pariẏaṇu maṇĕ maṇṇiu jehĩ tiṇu  $  tiṇa-samaü ṇāhĩ lahu ṇaraẏa-riṇu
riṇu kema hoi bhava-bhaẏa-rahiẏa  $  bhava-rahiẏa dhamma-saṃjama-sahiẏa

ghattā:

je kāẏa-vāẏa-maṇĕ ṇicchiriẏa  $  (je) kāma-koha-duṇṇaẏa-tariẏa
    te ekka-maṇeṇa sa ẏaṃ bhu ĕṇa  $  vandiẏa guru paramāẏariẏa



________________________________________________________________________

*************************  I. vijjāharakaṇḍaṃ  *************************
________________________________________________________________________




----------  [1. paḍhamo saṃdhi]  ----------


tihuaṇalaggaṇa-khambhu guru  $  parameṭṭhi ṇaveppiṇu
puṇu ārambhiẏa rāmakaha  $  ārisu joeppiṇu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 1:


paṇaveppiṇu āi-bhaḍārāhŏ  $  saṃsāra-samudduttārāhŏ
paṇaveppiṇu ajiẏa-jiṇesarahŏ  $  dujjaẏa-kandappa-dappa-harahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu saṃbhavasāmiẏahŏ  $  taïlokka-sihara-pura-gāmiẏahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu ahiṇandaṇa-jiṇahŏ  $  kammaṭṭha-duṭṭha-riu-ṇijjiṇahŏ
paṇavevi sumaï-titthaṅkarahŏ  $  vaẏa-pañca-mahāduddhara-dharahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu paümappaha-jiṇahŏ  $  sohiẏa-bhava-lakkha-dukkha-riṇahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu suravara-sārāhŏ  $  jiṇavarahŏ supāsa-bhaḍārāhŏ
paṇaveppiṇu candappaha-guruhŏ  $  bhaviẏāẏaṇa-saüṇa-kappataruhŏ
paṇaveppiṇu pupphaẏanta-muṇihĕ  $  surabhavaṇucchaliẏa-divva-jhuṇihĕ
paṇaveppiṇu sīẏala-puṅgamahŏ  $  kallāṇa-jhāṇa-ṇāṇuggamahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu seẏaṃsāhivahŏ  $  accanta-mahanta-patta-sivahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu vāsupujja-muṇihĕ  $  vipphuriẏa-ṇāṇa-cūḍāmaṇihĕ
paṇaveppiṇu vimala-mahārisihĕ  $  saṃdarisiẏa-paramāgama-disihĕ
paṇaveppiṇu maṅgalagārāhŏ  $  sāṇantahŏ dhamma-bhaḍārāhŏ
paṇaveppiṇu santi-kunthu-arahã  $  tiṇṇa mi tihuaṇa-paramesarahã
paṇavevi malli-titthaṅkarahŏ  $  taïlokka-mahārisi-kulaharahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu muṇi-suvvaẏa-jiṇahŏ  $  devāsura-diṇṇa-paẏāhiṇahŏ
paṇaveppiṇu ṇami-ṇemīsarahã  $  puṇu pāsa-vīra-titthaṅkarahã

ghattā:

iẏa caüvīsa vi parama-jiṇa  $  paṇaveppiṇu bhāveṃ
     puṇu appāṇaü pāẏaḍami  $  rāmāẏaṇa-kāveṃ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 2:


vaddhamāṇa-muha-kuhara-viṇiggaẏa  $  rāmakahā-ṇaï eha kamāgaẏa
akkhara-vāsa-jaloha-maṇohara  $  su-alaṅkāra-chanda-macchohara
dīha-samāsa-pavāhāvaṅkiẏa  $  sakkaẏa-pāẏaẏa-puliṇālaṅkiẏa
desībhāsā-ubhaẏa-taḍujjala  $  kavi-dukkara-ghaṇa-sadda-silāẏala
attha-vahala-kallolā-ṇiṭṭhiẏa  $  āsāsaẏa-samatūha-pariṭṭhiẏa
eha rāmakaha-sari sohantī  $  gaṇahara-devahĩ diṭṭha vahantī
pacchaï indabhūi-āẏarieṃ  $  puṇu dhammeṇa guṇālaṇkarieṃ
puṇu pahaveṃ saṃsārārāeṃ  $  kittihareṇa aṇuttaravāeṃ
puṇu raviseṇāẏariẏa-pasāeṃ  $  vuddhiĕ avagāhiẏa kaïrāeṃ
paümiṇi-jaṇaṇi-gabbha-saṃbhūeṃ  $  māruẏaeva-rūva-aṇurāeṃ
aï-taṇueṇa paīhara-gatteṃ  $  chivvara-ṇāseṃ pavirala-danteṃ

ghattā:

ṇimmala-puṇṇa-pavitta-kaha-  $  kittaṇu āḍhappaï
      jeṇa samāṇijjantaĕṇa  $  thira kitti viḍhappaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 3:


vuhaẏaṇa saẏambhu paĩ viṇṇavaï  $  maĩ sarisaü aṇṇu ṇāhĩ kukaï
vāẏaraṇu kaẏāvi ṇa jāṇiẏaü  $  ṇaü vitti-suttu vakkhāṇiẏaü
ṇaü paccāhārahŏ tatti kiẏa  $  ṇaü saṃdhihĕ uppari vuddhi thiẏa
ṇaü ṇisuaü satta vihattiẏaü  $  chavvihaü samāsa-paüttiẏaü
chakkāraẏa dasa laẏāra ṇa suẏa  $  vīsovasagga paccaẏa vahuẏa
ṇa valāvala dhāu ṇivāẏa-gaṇu  $  ṇaü liṅgu uṇāi vakku vaẏaṇu
ṇaü ṇisuṇiu pañca-mahāẏa-kavvu (?)  $  ṇaü bharahu geu lakkhaṇu vi savvu
ṇaü vujjhiu piṅgala-patthāru  $  ṇaü bhammaha-daṇḍi-alaṅkāru
vavasāu to vi ṇaü pariharami  $  vari raḍḍāvaddhu kavvu karami
sāmaṇṇa bhāsa chuḍu sāvaḍaü  $  chuḍu āgama-jutti kā vi ghaḍaü
chuḍu hontu suhāsiẏa-vaẏaṇāĩ  $  gāmilla-bhāsa-pariharaṇāĩ
ĕhu sajjaṇa-loẏahŏ kiu viṇaü  $  jaṃ avuhu padarisiu appaṇaü
jaï ema virūsaï ko vi khalu  $  tahŏ hatthutthalliu leu chalu

ghattā:
pisuṇeṃ kiṃ abbhatthiĕṇa  $  jasu ko vi ṇa ruccaï
     kiṃ chaṇa-candu mahāgahĕṇa  $  kampantu vi muccaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 4:


avahatthĕvi khalaẏaṇu ṇiravasesu  $  pahilaü ṇiru vaṇṇami magahadesu
jahĩ pakka-kalamĕ kamaliṇi ṇisaṇṇa  $  alahanta taraṇi thera va visaṇṇa
jahĩ suẏa-pantiu supariṭṭhiẏāu  $  ṇaṃ vaṇasiri-maragaẏa-kaṇṭhiẏāu
jahĩ ucchu-vaṇaĩ pavaṇāhaẏāĩ  $  kampanti va pīlaṇa-bhaẏa-gaẏāĩ
jahĩ ṇandaṇavaṇaĩ maṇoharāĩ  $  ṇaccanti va cala-pallava-karāĩ
jahĩ phāḍima-vaẏaṇaĩ dāḍimāĩ  $  ṇajjanti tāĩ ṇaṃ kaï-muhāĩ
jahĩ mahuẏara-pantiu sundarāu  $  keẏaï-kesara-raẏa-dhūsarāu
jahĩ dakkhā-maṇḍava pariẏalanti  $  puṇu panthiẏa rasa-salilaĩ piẏanti

ghattā:

tahĩ taṃ paṭṭaṇu rāẏagihu  $  dhaṇa-kaṇaẏa-samiddhaü
    ṇaṃ pihiviĕ ṇava-jovvaṇaĕ  $  sirĕ seharu āiddhaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 5:


caü-goura-caü-pāẏāra-vantu  $  hasaï va muttāhala-dhavala-dantu
ṇaccaï va maruddhuẏa-dhaẏa-karaggu  $  dharaï va ṇivaḍantaü gaẏaṇa-maggu
sūlagga-bhiṇṇa-devaüla-siharu  $  kaṇaï va pārāvaẏa-sadda-gahiru
ghummaï va gaĕhĩ maẏa-bhimbhalehĩ  $  uḍḍaï va turaṅgahĩ cañcalehĩ
ṇhāi va sasikanta-jaloharehĩ  $  paṇavaï va hāra-mehala-bharehĩ
pakkhalaï va ṇeura-ṇiẏalaehĩ  $  vipphuraï va kuṇḍala-juẏalaehĩ
kilikilaï va savvajaṇucchaveṇa  $  gajjaï va murava-bherī-raveṇa
gāẏaï vālāviṇi-mucchaṇehĩ  $  puravaï va dhaṇṇa-dhaṇa-kañcaṇehĩ

ghattā:

ṇivaḍiẏa-paṇṇĕhĩ phopphalĕhĩ  $  chuha-cuṇṇāsaṅgeṃ
    jaṇa-calaṇagga-vimaddiĕṇa  $  mahi raṅgiẏa raṅgeṃ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 6:


tahĩ seṇiu ṇāmeṃ ṇaẏa-ṇivāsu  $  uvamijjaï ṇaravaï kavaṇu tāsu
kiṃ tiṇaẏaṇu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ visama-cakkhu  $  kiṃ sasaharu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ekka-pakkhu
kiṃ diṇaẏaru ṇaṃ ṇaṃ dahaṇa-sīlu  $  kiṃ hari ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kama-muaṇa-līlu
kiṃ kuñjaru ṇaṃ ṇaṃ ṇicca-mattu  $  kiṃ giri ṇaṃ ṇaṃ vavasāẏa-cattu
kiṃ sāẏaru ṇaṃ ṇaṃ khāra-ṇīru  $  kiṃ vammahu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ haẏa-sarīru
kiṃ phaṇivaï ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kūra-bhāu  $  kiṃ māruu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ cala-sahāu
kiṃ mahumahu ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kuḍila-vakku  $  kiṃ suravaï ṇaṃ ṇaṃ sahasa-akkhu
aṇuharaï puṇu vi jaï so jjĕ tāsu  $  vāmaddhu va dāhiṇa-addhu jāsu

ghattā:

tāva surāsura-vāhaṇĕhĩ  $  gaẏaṇaṅgaṇu chāiu
    vīra-jiṇindahŏ samasaraṇu  $  viulaïri parāiu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 7:


paramesaru pacchima-jiṇavarindu  $  calaṇaggeṃ cāliẏa-mahiharindu
ṇāṇujjalu caü-kallāṇa-piṇḍu  $  caü-kamma-ḍahaṇu kali-kāla-daṇḍu
caütīsātisaẏa-visuddha-gattu  $  bhuvaṇattaẏa-vallahu dhavala-chattu
paṇṇāraha-kamalāẏatta-pāu  $  allalla-phulla-maṇḍava-sahāu
caüsaṭṭhi-cāmaruddhūamāṇu  $  caü-suraṇikāẏa-saṃthuvvamāṇu
thiu viula-mahīharĕ vaddhamāṇu  $  samasaraṇu vi jasu joẏaṇa-pamāṇu
pāẏāra tiṇṇi caü gourāĩ  $  vāraha gaṇa vāraha mandirāĩ
ubbhiẏa caü māṇava-thambha jāma  $  turamāṇeṃ keṇa vi ṇarĕṇa tāma

ghattā:

calaṇa ṇaveppiṇu viṇṇaviu  $  seṇiu maharāo
    "jaṃ jhāẏahi jaṃ saṃbharahi  $  so jaga-guru āo"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 8:


jaṇa-vaẏaṇaĩ kaṇṇuppalikarevi  $  siṃhāsaṇa-siharahŏ oẏarevi
gaü paẏaĩ satta romañciẏaṅgu  $  puṇu mahiẏalĕ ṇāviu uttamaṅgu
devāviẏa lahu āṇanda-bheri  $  tharahariẏa vasundhari jaga-jaṇeri
sa-kalattu sa-puttu sa-piṇḍavāsu  $  sa-pariẏaṇu sa-sāhaṇu saṭṭahāsu
gaü vandaṇa-hattiĕ jiṇavarāsu  $  āsaṇṇīhūu mahīharāsu
samasaraṇu diṭṭhu harisiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  pariveḍhiu vāraha-viha-gaṇeṇa
pahilaĕ koṭṭhaĕ risi-saṃghu diṭṭhu  $  vīẏaĕ kappaṅgaṇa-jaṇu ṇiviṭṭhu
taïẏaĕ ajjiẏa-gaṇu sāṇurāu  $  caüthaĕ joisa-vara-accharāu
pañcamĕ vintariu suhāsiṇīu  $  chaṭṭhaĕ puṇu bhavaṇa-ṇivāsiṇīu
sattamĕ bhāvaṇa givvāṇa sāva  $  aṭṭhamĕ vintara saṃsuddha-bhāva
ṇavamaĕ joisa ṇamiuttamaṅgu  $  dahamaĕ kappāmara pulaïẏaṅgu
eẏārahamaĕ ṇaravara ṇiviṭṭha  $  vārahamaĕ tiriẏa ṇamanta diṭṭha

ghattā:

diṭṭhu bhaḍāraü vīra-jiṇu  $  siṃhāsaṇa-saṃṭhiu
     tihuvaṇa-matthaĕ suha-ṇilaĕ  $  ṇaṃ mokkhu pariṭṭhiu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 9:


sira-siharĕ caḍāviẏa-karaẏalaggu  $  magahāhiu puṇu vandaṇahã laggu
" jaẏa ṇāha savva-devāhideva  $  kiẏa-ṇāga-ṇarinda-surinda-seva
jaẏa tihuvaṇa-sāmiẏa tiviha-chatta  $  aṭṭhaviha-parama-guṇa-riddhi-patta
jaẏa kevala-ṇāṇubbhiṇṇa-deha  $  vammaha-ṇimmahaṇa paṇaṭṭha-ṇeha
jaẏa jāi-jarā-maraṇāri-cheẏa  $  vattīsa-surinda-kiẏāhiseẏa
jaẏa parama parampara vīẏarāẏa  $  sura-maüḍa-koḍi-maṇi-ghiṭṭha-pāẏa
jaẏa savva-jīva-kāruṇṇa-bhāva  $  akkhaẏa aṇanta ṇahaẏala-sahāva"
paṇaveppiṇu jiṇu taggaẏa-maṇeṇa  $  puṇu pucchiu gottamasāmi teṇa

ghattā:

"paramesara para-sāsaṇĕhĩ  $  suvvaï vivarerī
    kahĕ jiṇa-sāsaṇĕ kema thiẏa  $  kaha rāhava-kerī


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 10:


jagĕ loĕhĩ ḍhakkarivantaehĩ  $  uppāiu bhantiu bhantaehĩ
jaï kummeṃ dhariẏaü dharaṇi-vīḍhu  $  to kummu paḍantaü keṇa gīḍhu
jaï rāmahŏ tihuaṇu uvarĕ māi  $  to rāvaṇu kahĩ tiẏa levi jāi


aṇṇu vi kharadūsaṇa-samarĕ deva  $  pahu jujjhaï sujjhaï bhiccu keṃva
kiha tiẏamaï-kāraṇĕ kavivareṇa  $  ghāijjaï vāli sahoẏareṇa
kiha vāṇara girivara uvvahanti  $  vandhĕvi maẏaraharu samuttaranti
kiha rāvaṇu daha-muhu vīsa-hatthu  $  amarāhiva-bhuva-vandhaṇa-samatthu
varisaddhu suaï kiha kumbhaẏaṇṇu  $  mahisā-koḍihi mi ṇa dhāi aṇṇu

ghattā:

jeṃ parisesiu dahavaẏaṇu  $  para-ṇārīhĩ samaṇu
    so mandovari jaṇaṇi-sama  $  kiha lei vihīsaṇu"


_______________________________________________________________

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 1, Kaḍavaka 11:


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vuccaï gaṇahareṇa  $  suṇĕ seṇiẏa kiṃ vahu-vitthareṇa
pahilaü āẏāsu aṇantu sāu  $  ṇiravekkhu ṇirañjaṇu palaẏa-bhāu
taïlokku pariṭṭhiu majjhĕ tāsu  $  caüdaha rajjuẏa āẏāmu jāsu
tetthu vi jhallari-majjhāṇumāṇu  $  thiu tiriẏa-lou rajjuẏa-pamāṇu

caü-khetta-caüddaha-sari-ṇivāsu  $  chavviha-kulapavvaẏa-taḍa-paẏāsu

tahŏ dāhiṇa-bhāeṃ bharahu thakku  $  chakkhaṇḍālaṅkiu ekka-cakku

jaẏa indiẏa-gaẏaülĕ pañcāṇaṇa  $  jaẏa tihuaṇa-siri-rāmāliṅgaṇa
jaẏa kammāri-maḍapphara-bhañjaṇa  $  jaẏa ṇikkala ṇiravekkha ṇirañjaṇa

----------  [6. chaṭṭho saṃdhi]  ----------


caüsaṭṭhihĩ siṃhāsaṇĕhĩ aïkantĕhĩ āṇantaĕ bhittiĕ
puṇu uppaṇṇu kittidhavalu dhavaliu jeṇa bhuaṇu ṇiẏa-kittiĕ



yathā prathamas toyadavāhanaḥ. toyadavāhanasyāpatyaṃ maharakṣaḥ. maharakṣasyāpatyaṃ devarakṣaḥ. devarakṣasyāpatyaṃ rakṣaḥ. rakṣasyāpatyaṃ ādityaḥ. ādityasyāpatyam ādityarakṣaḥ. ādityarakṣasyāpatyaṃ bhīmaprabhaḥ. bhīmaprabhasyāpatyaṃ pūjarhan. pūjarhato 'patyaṃ jitabhāskaraḥ. jitabhāskarasyāpatyaṃ saṃparikīrtiḥ. saṃparikīrter sugrīvaḥ. sugrīvasyāpatyaṃ harigrīvaḥ. harigrīvasyāpatyaṃ śrīgrīvaḥ. śrīgrīvasyāpatyaṃ sumukhaḥ. sumukhasyāpatyaṃ suvyaktaḥ. suvyaktasyāpatyaṃ mṛgavegaḥ. mṛgavegasyāpatyaṃ bhānugatiḥ. bhāṇugater apatyam indraḥ. indrasyāpatyam indraprabhaḥ. indraprabhasyāpatyaṃ meghaḥ. meghasyāpatyaṃ siṃhavadanaḥ. siṃhavadanasyāpatyaṃ paviḥ. paver apatyaṃ indraviṭuḥ. indraviṭor apatyaṃ bhānudharmā. bhānudharmaṇo 'patyaṃ bhānuḥ. bhānor apatyaṃ surāriḥ. surārer apatyaṃ trijaṭaḥ. trijaṭasyāpatyaṃ bhīmaḥ. bhīmasyāpatyaṃ mahābhīmaḥ. mahābhīmasyāpatyaṃ mohanaḥ. mohanasyāpatyam aṅgārakaḥ. aṅgārakasyāpatyaṃ raviḥ. raver apatyaṃ cakrāraḥ. cakrārasyāpatyaṃ vajrodaraḥ. vajrodarasyāpatyaṃ pramodaḥ. pramodasyāpatyaṃ siṃhavikramaḥ. siṃhavikramasyāpatyaṃ  cāmuṇḍaḥ. cāmuṇḍasyāpatyaṃ ghātakaḥ. ghātakasyāpatyaṃ bhīṣmaḥ. bhīṣmasyāpatyaṃ dvipabāhuḥ. dvipabāhor apatyam arimardanaḥ. arimardanasyāpatyaṃ nirvāṇabhaktiḥ. nirvāṇabhakter apatyam ugraśrīḥ. ugraśriyo 'patyaṃ arhadbhaktiḥ. arhadbhakter apatyaṃ anuttaraḥ. anuttarasyāpatyaṃ gatyuttamaḥ. gatyuttamasyāpatyam anilaḥ. anilasyāpatyaṃ caṇḍaḥ. caṇḍasyāpatyaṃ laṅkāśokaḥ. laṅkāśokasyāpatyaṃ mayūraḥ. mayūrasyāpatyaṃ mahābāhuḥ. mahābāhor apatyaṃ manoramaḥ. manoramasyāpatyaṃ bhāskaraḥ. bhāskarasyāpatyaṃ bṛhadgatiḥ. bṛhadgater apatyaṃ bṛhatkāntaḥ. bṛhatkāntasyāpatyam arisaṃtrāsaḥ. arisaṃtrāsasyāpatyaṃ candrāvartaḥ. candrāvartasyāpatyaṃ mahāravaḥ. mahāravasyāpatyaṃ meghadhvaniḥ. meghadhvaner apatyaṃ grahakṣobhaḥ. grahakṣobhasyāpatyaṃ nakṣatradamanaḥ. nakṣatradamanasyāpatyaṃ tārakaḥ. tārakasyāpatyaṃ meghanādaḥ. meghanādasyāpatyaṃ kīrtidhavalaḥ. ityetāni
catuḥṣaṣṭi siṃhāsanāni.

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 9:


pariṇantahŏ laṅkāhiva-duhiẏa  $  tahŏ paṅgaṇĕ keṇa vi kaï lihiẏa
dīhara-laṅgūlāratta-muha  $  kamu dinti va dhāvanti va samuha
taṃ pekkhĕvi sāhāmaẏa-ṇivahu  $  bhaïẏaĕ mucchāviẏa rāẏa-vahu
etthantarĕ kuviu ṇarāhivaï  $  "taṃ mārahu lihiẏā jeṇa kaï"
paṇaveppiṇu mantihĩ uvasamiu  $  "kaï-ṇivahu ṇa keṇa vi aïkamiu
eẏahũ ji pasāeṃ rāẏa-siẏa  $  taü pesaṇaẏārī jema tiẏa
eẏahũ jĕ pasāeṃ raṇĕ ajaü  $  jagĕ vāṇara-vaṃsu pasiddhi-gaü
sirikaṇṭhahŏ laggĕvi kaï-saẏaĩ  $  eẏaĩ jĕ tumha kula-devaẏaĩ

ghattā:

taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi parituṭṭhaĕṇa  $  aïkamiẏa (?) ṇamiẏa marisāviẏa
    ṇimmala-kulahŏ kalaṅku jiha  $  maüḍĕ cindhĕ dhaĕ chattĕ lihāviẏa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 10:


teṃ vāṇara-vaṃsu pasiddhi-gaü  $  viṇṇi vi seḍiu vasikarĕvi thiu
uppaṇṇu kaïddhaü tāsu suu  $  kaïdhaẏahŏ vi paḍivalu pavara-bhuu
paḍivalahŏ vi ṇaẏaṇāṇandu puṇu  $  puṇu khaẏarāṇandu visāla-guṇu
puṇu giriṇandaṇu puṇu uvahiraü  $  tahŏ parama-mittu paḍipakkha-khaü
taḍikesi-ṇāmu laṅkāhivaï  $  vijjāhara-sāmiu gaẏaṇagaï
ekkahĩ diṇĕ uvavaṇu ṇīsariu  $  puṇu vuḍḍaṇa-vāvihĕ païsariu
mahaevi tāma tahŏ takkhaṇĕṇa  $  thaṇa-siharahĩ phāḍiẏa makkaḍĕṇa
teṇa vi ṇārāẏahĩ viddhu kaï  $  gaü taü jaü taruvara-mūlĕ jaï

ghattā:

laddha-ṇamokkārahŏ phalĕṇa  $  uvahikumāru deu uppaṇṇaü
    ṇiẏaẏa-bhavantaru saṃbharĕvi  $  vijjukesu jaü taü avaïṇṇaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 11:


taḍikesu ṇievi vihāiẏaü  $  "haũ eṇa haẏāseṃ ghāiẏaü
ajju vi maṇĕ sallu samuvvahaï  $  jaü pekkhaï taü kaïvara vahaï
kettaḍaü vahesaï khuddu khalu  $  uppāẏami māẏā-pamaẏa-valu"
to ema bhaṇĕvi sāhāmiẏaĩ  $  girivara-saṃkāsaĩ ṇimmiẏaĩ
rattamuhaĩ puccha-paīharaĩ  $  vukkāra-ghora-ghagghara-saraĩ
āṇattaĩ uppari dhāiẏaĩ  $  jalĕ thalĕ āẏāsĕ ṇa māiẏaĩ
aṇṇaĩ ummūliẏa-taruvaraĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ saṃcāliẏa-mahiharaĩ
aṇṇaĩ uggāmiẏa-paharaṇaĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ laṅgūla-paīharaĩ

ghattā:

aṇṇaĩ huẏavaha-hatthāĩ  $  aṇṇaĩ puṇu aṇṇĕhĩ uppāĕhĩ
    rūvaĩ kālahŏ kerāĩ  $  āvĕvi thiẏaĩ ṇāĩ vahu-bhāĕhĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 12:


aṇṇahĩ kokkiu laṅkāhivaï  $  "tiha paharu pāu jiha ṇihaü kaï"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï kampiẏaü  $  "kiṃ kahi mi pavaṅgamu jampiẏaü
kiṃ kahi mi kaïndahŏ paharaṇaĩ  $  āẏaĩ lahuāĩ ṇa kāraṇaĩ
cintevi mahābhaẏa-ghatthaĕṇa  $  vollāviẏa paṇaviẏa-matthaĕṇa
"ke tumhaĩ kāĩ a-khanti kiẏa  $  kajjeṇa keṇa saṇṇahĕvi thiẏa"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi caviu pamaẏa-ṇivahu  $  "kiṃ puvva-vaïru vīsariu pahu
jaïẏahũ jala-kīlaĕ āiẏaü  $  mahaevi-kajjĕ kaï ghāiẏaü
risi-pañcaṇamokkārahũ valĕṇa  $  suravaru uppaṇṇu teṇa phalĕṇa

ghattā:

vaïru tuhāraü saṃbharĕvi  $  so haũ ekku vi thiu vahu-bhāĕhĩ
    seraü acchahi kāĩ raṇĕ  $  jima abbhiḍu jima paḍu mahu pāĕhĩ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 13:


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇamiu ṇarāhivaï  $  amareṇa vi darisiẏa amara-gaï
ṇiu vijjukesu karĕ dharĕvi tahĩ  $  ṇivasaï maharisi caü-ṇāṇi jahĩ
paẏāhiṇa karĕvi guru-bhatti kiẏa  $  vandeppiṇu viṇṇi mi puraü thiẏa
savvaṅgiu suravaru harisiẏaü  $  "ĕhu jammu eṇa mahu darisiẏaü
ajju vi lakkhijjaï pāẏaḍaü  $  mahu keraü eu sarīraḍaü"
taṃ pekkhĕvi taḍikesu vi ḍariu  $  ṇaṃ pavaṇa-chittu taru tharahariu
puṇu pucchiu maharisi "dhammu kahĕ  $  paribhamahũ jeṇa ṇaü ṇaraẏa-pahĕ"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi cavaï cāru-cariu  $  "mahu atthi aṇṇu paramāẏariu
so kahaï dhammu savvattiharu  $  païsahũ ji jiṇālaü santiharu
parioseṃ tiṇṇi vi uccaliẏa  $  vāhuvali-bharaha-risaha va miliẏa

ghattā:

diṭṭhu mahārisi cei-harĕ  $  ṇaravaï-uvahikumāra-muṇindĕhĩ
     parama-jiṇindu samosaraṇĕ  $  ṇaṃ dharaṇinda-surinda-ṇarindĕhĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 14:


paṇaveppiṇu pucchiu parama-risi  $  "darisāvi bhaḍārā dhamma-disi"
paramesaru jampaï jaï-pavaru  $  taï-kāla-vuddhi caü-ṇāṇa-dharu
"dhammeṇa jāṇa-jampāṇa-dhaẏa  $  dhammeṇa bhicca-raha-turaẏa-gaẏa
dhammeṇāharaṇa-vilevaṇaĩ  $  dhammeṇa ṇiẏāsaṇa-bhoẏaṇaĩ
dhammeṇa kalattaĩ maṇaharaĩ  $  dhammeṇa chuhā-paṇḍura-gharaĩ
dhammeṇa piṇḍa-pīṇa-tthaṇaü  $  camaraĩ pāḍanti varaṅgaṇaü
dhammeṇa maṇuẏa-devattaṇaĩ  $  valaeva-vāsuevattaṇaĩ
dhammeṇa aruha-siddhattaṇaĩ  $  titthaṅkara-cakkaharattaṇaĩ

ghattā:

ekkeṃ dhammeṃ hontaĕṇa  $  indā deva vi seva karanti
    dhamma-vihūṇahŏ māṇusahŏ  $  caṇḍāla vi paṅgaṇaĕ ṇa ṭhanti"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 15:


taḍikeseṃ pucchiu puṇu vi guru  $  "aṇṇahĩ bhavĕ ko haũ ko va suru"
jaï jampaï "ṇisuṇuttara-disaĕ  $  jāo 'si āsi kāsī-visaĕ
tuhũ sāhu ehu dhāṇukku tahĩ  $  āiu taru-mūlĕ vi thiŏ 'si jahĩ
ṇigganthu ṇiĕvi uvahāsu kaü  $  īsīsuppaṇṇu kasāu taü
bhañjĕvi kāvittha-sagga-gamaṇu  $  patto 'si ṇavara joisa-bhavaṇu
tatthahŏ vi caveppiṇu suddhamaï  $  hūo 'si ettha laṅkāhivaï
dhāṇukkiu hiṇḍĕvi bhava-gahaṇĕ  $  uppaṇṇu pavaṅgamu pamaẏa-vaṇĕ
paĩ haü samāhi-maraṇeṇa muu  $  puṇu gampiṇu uvahi-kumāru huu"
tā


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi laṅkesarĕṇa  $  rajjĕ sukesu thavĕvi paramattheṃ
    muĕvi ku-vesa va rāẏa-siẏa  $  tava-siẏa-vahuẏa laïẏa saĩ hattheṃ


_______________________________________________________________

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 6, Kaḍavaka 16:


jaṃ vijjukesu ṇigganthu thiu  $  pañcĕhĩ muṭṭhihĩ sirĕ lou kiu
taṃ kaḍaẏa-maüḍa-kuṇḍala-dharĕṇa  $  sammattu laïu diḍhu suravarĕṇa
etthantarĕ kikka-puresarahŏ  $  gaü lehu kaïddhaẏa-seharahŏ
mahi-maṇḍalĕ ghattiu diṭṭhu kiha  $  ṇāvālaü gaṅgā-vāhu jiha
vandhaṇa-vimukku ṇaṃ ṇiraẏaülu  $  vaṅkuḍaü sahāveṃ jema khalu
juvaī jaṇu vaṇṇu samuvvahaï  $  āẏariu va cariu kahaü kahaï
ṇaṃ akkhara-pantihĩ pahu bhaṇiu  $  "tumhahũ sukesu paripālaṇiu
taḍikeseṃ tava-siẏa laïẏa karĕ  $  jaṃ jāṇahi taṃ pahu tuhu mi karĕ

ghattā:

lehu ghiveppiṇu uvahiraü  $  puttahŏ rajju devi ṇikkhantaü
    purĕ paḍicandu pariṭṭhiẏaü  $  vāṇaradīu sa ïṃ bhu ñjantaü


----------  [7. sattamo saṃdhi]  ----------


paḍicandahŏ jāẏa  $  kikkindhandhaẏa pavara-bhuva
ṇaṃ risaha-jiṇāsu  $  bharaha-vāhuvali ve vi suva


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 1:


chuḍu chuḍu sarīra-saṃpatti patta  $  tahĩ avasarĕ keṇa vi kahiẏa vatta
"veẏaḍḍha-kaḍaĕ dhaṇa-kaṇaẏa-paürĕ  $  dāhiṇa-seḍhihĩ āiccaṇaẏarĕ
vijjāmandaru ṇāmeṇa rāu  $  veẏamaï-agga-mahisiĕ sahāu
sirimāla-ṇāma tahŏ taṇiẏa duhiẏa  $  indīvaracchi chaṇa-canda-muhiẏa
kaẏalī-kandala-somāla vāla  $  sā paraĕ ghivesaï kahŏ vi māla"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pavara-kaïddhaehĩ  $  gamu sajjiu kikkindhandhaehĩ
ḍhoiẏaĩ vimāṇaĩ caḍiẏa joha  $  saṃcalla ṇahaṅgaṇĕ diṇṇa-soha
ṇivisaddheṃ dāhiṇa-seḍhi patta  $  jahĩ miliẏā vijjāhara samatta

ghattā:

kikkindheṃ diṭṭhu  $  dhaü rāulaü su(?)pavaṇahaü
    hakkāraï ṇāĩ  $  karaẏalu sirimālahĕ taṇaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 2:

ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-thāṇehĩ ṇivaddha mañca  $  mahakavi-kavvālāva va su-sañca
ārūḍha savva mañcesu tesu  $  cāmiẏara-gatta-maṇi-bhūsiesu
paribhamira-bhamara-jhaṅkāriesu  $  ṇiviḍāẏavatta-andhāriesu
ravikanta-kanti-ujjāliesu  $  ālāvaṇi-sadda-vamāliesu
mañcesu tesu thiẏa pahu caḍevi  $  vammaha-ṇaḍa ṇāḍijjanti(?) ke vi
bhūsanti sarīraĩ vāravāra  $  kaṇṭhāĩ muanti laẏanti hāra
sundara sacchāẏa vi kaṇaẏa-ḍora  $  aliẏaṃ ji ghivanti bhaṇevi thora
gāẏanti hasanti puṇāsaṇattha  $  aṅgaĩ moḍanti valanti hattha

ghattā:

sa-pasāhaṇa savva  $  thiẏa sammuha varaïtta kiha
    "kira hosaï siddhi"  $  āẏaĕ āsaĕ samaẏa jiha


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 3:


sirimāla tāma kariṇihĕ valagga  $  ṇaṃ vijju mahā-ghaṇa-koḍi-lagga
saẏalāharaṇālaṅkariẏa-deha  $  ṇaṃ ṇahĕ ummilliẏa canda-leha
aggima-gaṇiẏārihĕ caḍiẏa dhāi  $  ṇisi-puraü pariṭṭhiẏa sañjha ṇāi
darisāviu ṇara-ṇiurumvu tīĕ  $  ṇaṃ vaṇa-siri taruvara mahuẏarīĕ
"uhu sundari candāṇaṇa-kumāru  $  ugghāu ūhu raṇĕ duṇṇivāru
uhu vijaẏasīhu riu-palaẏa-kālu  $  rahaṇeura-puravara-sāmisālu
saẏala vi ṇaravara vañcanti jāi  $  avarāgama sammādiṭṭhi ṇāĩ
pura ujjovantiẏa dīvi jema  $  pacchaï andhāru karanti tema
ṇaṃ siddhi ku-muṇivara pariharanti  $  duggandha rukkha ṇaṃ bhamara-panti

ghattā:

gaṇiẏāriĕ vāla  $  ṇiẏa kikkindhahŏ pāsu kiha
      sari-salila-rahalliĕ (?)  $  kalahaṃsahŏ kalahaṃsi jiha


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 4:


kikkindhahŏ ghalliẏa māla tāĕ  $  ṇaṃ mehesarahŏ suloẏaṇāĕ
āsaṇṇa pariṭṭhiẏa vimala-deha  $  ṇaṃ kaṇaẏagirihĕ ṇava-candaleha
vicchāẏa jāẏa saẏala vi ṇarinda  $  sasi-joṇhaĕ viṇu ṇaṃ mahiharinda
ṇaṃ ku-tavasi parama-gaīhĕ cukka  $  ṇaṃ paṅkaẏa-sara ravi-kanti-mukka
etthantarĕ sirimālā-vaīhu  $  kovaggi-palīviu vijaẏasīhu
abbhantarĕ vijjāhara-varāhũ  $  païsāru diṇṇu kiṃ vaṇṇarāhũ
uddālahŏ vahu varaïttu haṇahŏ  $  vāṇara-vaṃsa-ẏaruhĕ kandu khaṇahŏ"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu andhaeṇa  $  hakkāriu amarisa-kuddhaeṇa

ghattā:
"vijjāhara tumhĕ  $  amhĕ kaïddhaẏa kavaṇu chalu
    laï paharaṇu pāva  $  jāma ṇa pāḍami sira-kamalu"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 5:


taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu vijaẏasīhu  $  utthariu pavara-bhuva-phaliha-dīhu
abbhiṭṭu jujjhu vijjāharāhã  $  sirimālā-kāraṇĕ duddharāhã
sāhaṇaï mi avaropparu bhiḍanti  $  ṇaṃ sukaï-kavva-vaẏaṇaĩ ghaḍanti
bhañjanti khambha vihaḍanti mañca  $  dukkavi-kavvālāva va ku-sañca
haẏa gaẏa suṇṇāsaṇa saṃcaranti  $  ṇaṃ paṃsuli-loẏaṇa paribhamanti
raṇu vijjāhara-vāṇarahũ jāma  $  laṅkāhiu pattu sukesu tāma
ālaggu so vi vaṇĕ jiha huāsu  $  jasu ḍhukkaï so so lei ṇāsu
tahĩ avasarĕ vehāviddhaeṇa  $  raṇĕ vijaẏasīhu haü andhaeṇa

ghattā:

mahi-maṇḍalĕ sīsu  $  dīsaï asivara-khaṇḍiẏaü
    ṇāvaï saẏavattu  $  toḍĕvi haṃseṃ chaṇḍiẏaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 6:


viṇivāiĕ vijaẏamaïndĕ khuddĕ  $  kiĕ pārāuṭṭhaĕ vala-samuddĕ
tuṭṭhāṇaṇu bhaṇaï sukesu ema  $  "sirimāla laeppiṇu jāhũ deva"
teṃ vaẏaṇeṃ gaẏa kaṇṭaïẏa-gatta  $  ṇivisaddheṃ kikku-purakkhu patta
ettahĕ vi duṭṭha-ṇiṭṭhavaṇa-heu  $  keṇa vi ṇisuṇāviu asaṇiveu
"paramesara para-ṇaravara-sirīhu  $  olaggaï pāṇĕhĩ vijaẏasīhu
paḍicandahŏ suĕṇa kaïddhaeṇa  $  āvaṭṭiu jama-muhĕ andhaeṇa"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi ṇa karantu kheu  $  saṇṇahĕvi padhāiu asaṇiveu
caüraṅgeṃ vijjāhara-valeṇa  $  pariveḍhiu paṭṭaṇu teṃ chaleṇa

ghattā:

hakkāriẏa ve vi  $  "pāvahŏ pamaẏa-mahaddhaẏahŏ
   laï ḍhukkaü kālu  $  ṇiggahŏ kikkindhandhaẏahŏ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 7:


puṇu pacchaĕ vipphuriẏāṇaṇeṇa  $  hakkāriẏa vijjulavāhaṇeṇa
"arĕ bhāi mahāraü ṇihaü jema  $  duddhara-sara-dhoraṇi dharahŏ tema"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dūsaha-daṃsaṇehĩ  $  paḍicanda-ṇarindahŏ ṇandaṇehĩ
ṇiggantahĩ jaṇa-ṇiggaẏa-paẏāvu  $  kiu pārāuṭṭhaü seṇṇu sāvu
so asaṇiveu andhaẏahŏ valiu  $  taḍivāhaṇeṇa kikkindhu khaliu
paharaṇaĩ muẏanti su-dāruṇāĩ  $  khaṇĕ aggeẏaĩ khaṇĕ vāruṇāĩ
khaṇĕ pavaṇatthaĩ khaṇĕ thambhaṇāĩ  $  khaṇĕ vāmohaṇa-ummohaṇāĩ
khaṇĕ mahiẏalĕ khaṇĕ ṇahaẏalĕ bhamanti  $  khaṇĕ sandaṇĕ khaṇĕ jĕ vimāṇĕ thanti

ghattā:

āẏāmĕvi dukkhu  $  andhaü khaggeṃ kaṇṭhĕ haü
    ṇiu pantheṃ teṇa  $  jeṃ so vijaẏamaïndu gaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 8:


ettahĕ vi bhiṇḍivāleṇa pahaü  $  kikkindha-ṇarāhiu muccha-gaü
acchantaü paricintĕvi maṇeṇa  $  āmelliu vijjulavāhaṇeṇa
tahĩ avasarĕ ḍhukku sukesu pāsu  $  rahavarĕ chuhevi ṇiu ṇiẏa-ṇivāsu
paḍivāiu ceẏaṇa-bhāu laddhu  $  uṭṭhanteṃ pucchiu parama-vandhu
"kahĩ andhaü "pesaṇa-cukku deva"  $  ṇivaḍiu puṇo vi taḍi-rukkhu jema
puṇu paḍivāiu puṇu āu jīu  $  "hā paĩ viṇu suṇṇaü pamaẏa-dīu
hā bhāẏa sahoẏara dehi vāẏa  $  hā paĩ viṇu meiṇi vihava jāẏa"

ghattā:

to bhaṇaï sukesu  $  "saṃsaü ṇāha jievāhŏ
    sirĕ ṇikkhaĕ khaggĕ  $  avasaru kavaṇu ruevāhŏ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 7, Kaḍavaka 9:


viṇu kajjeṃ vaïrihĩ aṅgu dehi  $  pāẏālalaṅka païsarahũ ehi
jīvantahũ sijjhaï savvu kajju  $  ettiu ṇa vi haũ ṇa vi tuhũ ṇa rajju"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vāṇara-vaṃsa-sāru  $  ṇīsariu sa-sāhaṇu sa-parivāru
ṇāsantu ṇiĕvi harisiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  rahu vāhiu vijjulavāhaṇeṇa
karĕ dhariu asaṇiveeṇa puttu  $  "kiṃ uttima-purisahã eu juttu
ṇāsantu ṇavantu suvantu sattu  $  bhuñjantu ṇa hammaï jalu piẏantu
jeṃ vijaẏasīhu haü bhuẏa-visālu  $  so ṇiu kiẏanta-dantantarālu"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi taḍivāhaṇu ṇiẏattu  $  lahu desu pasāhiu ekka-chattu

ghattā:

ṇigghāẏahŏ laṅka  $  aṇṇahã aṇṇaĩ paṭṭaṇaĩ
   bhuttaĩ icchāĕ  $  su-kalattaĩ va sa-jovvaṇaĩ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 8, Kaḍavaka 11:


"maru maru valahŏ valahŏ kiṃ ṇāsahŏ  $  dhārāhara-makkaḍahŏ haẏāsahŏ
suraẏaṇa-ṇaẏaṇāṇanda-jaṇerā  $  kuddha pāva taṃ (?) vāsava-kerā"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dūrujjhiẏa-saṅkaü  $  ahimuhu mallavantu para thakkaü
gahakallolu ṇāĩ chaṇa-candahŏ  $  ṇāĩ maïndu mahaggaẏa-vindahŏ
"arĕ sasaṅka sa-kalaṅka alajjiẏa  $  mahilāṇaṇa ve-pakkha-vivajjiẏa
candu bhaṇĕvi jeṃ hāsaü dijjaï  $  paĩ vi ko vi kiṃ raṇĕ ghāijjaï"
ema caveppiṇu cāva-saṇāhaü  $  bhiṇḍivāla-paharaṇĕṇa samāhaü
muccha parāiẏa pasariẏa-veẏaṇu  $  dukkhu dukkhu kira hoi sa-ceẏaṇu

ghattā:

dūrīhūẏā tāma riu  $  maẏalañchaṇu maṇĕ avatasaï kiha
    siru saṃcālaï karu dhuṇaï  $  saṃkantihĕ cukkaü vippu jiha


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 8, Kaḍavaka 12:


tāma mahā-rahaṇeura-puravaru  $  jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ païsaï suravaru
pavaṇa-kuvera-varuṇa-jama-khandĕhĩ  $  ṇaḍa-phamphāva-chatta-kaïvandĕhĩ
vandiṇa-saẏahĩ pavaḍḍhiẏa-harisĕhĩ  $  vijjāhara-kiṇṇara-kiṃpurisĕhĩ
joisa-jakkha-garuḍa-gandhavvĕhĩ  $  jaẏa-jaẏa-kāru karantĕhĩ savvĕhĩ
calaṇĕhĩ gampi paḍiu sahasārahŏ  $  ṇaṃ bharahesaru tihuaṇa-sārahŏ
sasipuri sasihĕ diṇṇa vikkhāẏahŏ  $  dhaṇaẏahŏ laṅka kikku jamarāẏahŏ
meha-ṇaẏarĕ varuṇāhiu ṭhaviẏaü  $  kañcaṇapurĕ kuveru paṭṭhaviẏaü

ghattā:

aṇṇu vi ko vi purandarĕṇa  $  tahĩ avasarĕ jo saṃbhāviẏaü
    maṇḍalu ekkekkaü pavaru  $  so savvu sa iṃ bhu ñjāviẏaü


----------  [9. ṇavamo saṃdhi]  ----------


etthantarĕ riddhihĕ jantāhŏ  $  pāẏāla-laṅka bhuñjantāhŏ
uppaṇṇu sumālihĕ puttu kiha  $  raẏaṇāsaü risahahŏ bharahu jiha


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 1:


solaha-āharaṇālaṅkariu  $  saẏam eva maẏaṇu ṇaṃ avaẏariu
vahu-divasĕhĩ āucchĕvi jaṇaṇu  $  gaü vijjā-kāraṇĕ pupphavaṇu
thiu akkhasuttu karaẏalĕ karĕvi  $  jiha maha-risi parama-jhāṇu dharĕvi
tahĩ avasarĕ guṇa-aṇurāiẏaü  $  so pomavindu saṃpāiẏaü
raẏaṇāsaü lakkhiu teṇa tahĩ  $  "imu purisa-raẏaṇu uppaṇṇu kahĩ
laï saccaü hūẏaü guru-vaẏaṇu  $  ĕhu so ṇaru ĕu taṃ pupphavaṇu
kaïkasi ṇāmeṇa vutta duhiẏa  $  papphulliẏa-puṇḍarīẏa-muhiẏa
"ĕhu putti tuhāraü bhattāru  $  māṇasa-sundarihĕ va sahasāru"

ghattā:

gaü dhīẏa thavevi ṇiẏāsavahŏ  $  uppaṇṇa vijja raẏaṇāsavahŏ
    thiu vihi mi majjhĕ paramesarihĩ  $  ṇaṃ viñjhu tāvi-ṇammaẏa-sarihĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 2:


avaloiẏa vahu raẏaṇāsavĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ agga-mahisi saĩ vāsavĕṇa
su-ṇiẏamviṇi paricakkaliẏa-thaṇi  $  indīvaracchi paṅkaẏa-vaẏaṇi
"kasu kerī kahĩ avaïṇṇa tuhũ  $  taü dūreṃ diṭṭhi jĕ jaṇaï suhu"
taṃ suṇĕvi sa-saṅka kaṇṇa cavaï  $  "jaï jāṇahŏ vomavindu ṇivaï
haũ tāsu dhīẏa keṇa ṇa variẏa  $  kaïkasi ṇāmeṃ vijjāhariẏa
guru-vaẏaṇĕhĩ āṇiẏa eu vaṇu  $  taü diṇṇī karĕ pāṇiggahaṇu
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi supurisa-dhavalaharu  $  uppāiu vijjāhara-ṇaẏaru
kokkāviu saẏalu vi vandhujaṇu  $  sahũ kaṇṇaĕ kiu pāṇiggahaṇu

ghattā:

vahu-kāleṃ suviṇaü lakkhiẏaü  $  atthāṇĕ ṇarindahŏ akkhiẏaü
    "phāḍeppiṇu kumbhaĩ kuñjarahũ  $  pañcāṇaṇu uvarĕ païṭṭhu mahu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 3:


uccolihĕ candāicca thiẏa"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi daïeṃ vihasikiẏa
aṭṭhaṅga-ṇimittaĩ jāṇaĕṇa  $  vuccaï raẏaṇāsava-rāṇaĕṇa
"hosanti putta taü tiṇṇi dhaṇĕ  $  pahilāraü tāhã raüddu raṇĕ
jaga-kaṇṭaü suravara-ḍamara-karu  $  bharahaddha-ṇarāhiu cakkadharu"
parioseṃ kahi mi ṇa mantāhũ  $  ṇava-suraẏa-sokkhu māṇantāhũ
uppaṇṇu dasāṇaṇu atula-valu  $  pāroha-paīhara-bhuẏa-juẏalu
pakkala-ṇiẏamvu vitthiṇṇa-uru  $  ṇaṃ saggahŏ pacaviu ko vi suru
puṇu bhāṇukaṇṇu puṇu candaṇahi  $  puṇu jāu vihīsaṇu guṇa-uvahi

ghattā:

to uppāḍantu danta gaẏahũ  $  karaẏalu chuhantu muhĕ paṇṇaẏahũ
    āẏaĕ līlaĕ rāmaṇu ramaï  $  ṇaṃ kālu vālu hoĕvi bhamaï

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 4:


khelantu paīsaï bhaṇḍāru  $  jahĩ tŏẏadavāhaṇa-taṇaü hāru
ṇava-muhaĩ jāsu maṇi-jaḍiẏāĩ  $  ṇava gaha pariẏappĕvi ghaḍiẏāĩ
jo paripālijjaï paṇṇaĕhĩ  $  āsīvisa-rosāuṇṇaĕhĩ
sāmaṇṇahŏ aṇṇahŏ karaï vahu  $  so kaṇṭhaü duṭṭhaü duvvisahu
sahasatti laggu karĕ dahamuhahŏ  $  ṇaṃ mittu sumittahŏ ahimuhahŏ
parihiu ṇava-muhaĩ samuṭṭhiẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ gaha-vimvaĩ su-pariṭṭhiẏaĩ
ṇaṃ saẏavattaĩ saṃcārimaĩ  $  ṇaṃ kāmiṇi-vaẏaṇaĩ kārimaĩ
vollanti samaü vollantaĕṇa  $  sa-viẏāru hasanti hasantaĕṇa

ghattā:

pekkheppiṇu tāĩ dahāṇaṇaĩ  $  thira-tāraĩ taralaĩ loẏaṇaĩ
    teṃ dahamuhu dahasiru jaṇĕṇa kiu  $  pañcāṇaṇu jema pasiddhi gaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 5:


jaṃ parihiu kaṇṭhaü rāvaṇĕṇa  $  kiu vaddhāvaṇaü su-pariẏaṇĕṇa
raẏaṇāsaü kaïkasi dhāiẏaĩ  $  āṇandeṃ kahi mi ṇa māiẏaĩ
ṇisuṇeppiṇu āiu ucchuraü  $  kikkindhu sa-kantaü sūraraü
saẏalehĩ ṇihāliu sāharaṇu  $  daha-gīummīliẏa-daha-vaẏaṇu
paricintiu "ṇaü sāmaṇṇu ṇaru  $  ĕhu hoi ṇiruttaü cakkaharu
eẏahŏ pāsiu rajju vi viulu  $  kaï-jāuhāṇa-valu raṇĕ atulu
eẏahŏ pāsiu suravaïhĕ khaü  $  jama-varuṇa-kuverahã ṇāhĩ jaü"

ghattā:

aṇṇekka-divasĕ gajjantu kiha  $  ṇava-pāusĕ jalahara-vindu jiha
ṇahĕ jantaü pekkhĕvi vaïsavaṇu  $  puṇu pucchiẏa jaṇaṇi "ehu kavaṇu"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 6:


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi maüliẏa-ṇaẏaṇiẏaĕ  $  vajjariu sa-gaggara-vaẏaṇiẏaĕ
"kaüsiki jaṇeri eẏahŏ taṇiẏa  $  pahilārī vahiṇi mahu ttaṇiẏa
vīsāvasu vijjāharu jaṇaṇu  $  ĕhu bhāi tuhāraü vaïsavaṇu
vaïrihĩ milevi muha maliṇa kiẏa  $  māẏari va kamāgaẏa laṅka hiẏa
eẏahŏ uddālĕvi jema tiẏa  $  kaïẏahũ māṇesahũ rāẏa-siẏa"
rattuppala-hūāloẏaṇĕṇa  $  ṇibbhacchiẏa jaṇaṇi vihīsaṇĕṇa
"vaïsavaṇahŏ kerī kavaṇa siẏa  $  dahavaẏaṇahŏ ṇokkhī kā vi kiẏa
pekkhesahi divasahĩ thovaĕhĩ  $  āĕhĩ amhārisa-devaĕhĩ

ghattā:

jama-khanda-kuvera-purandarĕhĩ  $  ravi-varuṇa-pavaṇa-sihi-sasaharĕhĩ
    aṇudiṇu daṇuvaï-kandāvaṇahŏ  $  gharĕ seva karevī rāvaṇahŏ"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 7:


ekkahĩ diṇĕ āucchĕvi jaṇaṇu  $  gaẏa tiṇṇi vi bhīsaṇu bhīma-vaṇu
jahĩ jakkha-sahāsaĩ dāruṇaĩ  $  jahĩ sīha-paẏaĩ ruhirāruṇaĩ
jahĩ ṇīsāsantĕhĩ ajaẏarĕhĩ  $  ḍollanti ḍāla sahũ taruvarĕhĩ
jahĩ sāhārūḍhaĩ vippaẏaĩ  $  andolaṇa-parama-bhāva-gaẏaĩ
tahĩ tehaĕ bhīsaṇĕ bhīma-vaṇĕ  $  thiẏa vijjahĕ jhāṇu dharevi maṇĕ
jā aṭṭhakkharĕhĩ pasiddhi gaẏa  $  ṇāmeṇa savva-kāmaṇṇa-rūẏa
sā vihĩ paharĕhĩ jĕ pāsu aïẏa  $  ṇaṃ gāḍhāliṅgaṇa-gaẏa daïẏa
puṇu jhāiẏa solaha-akkhariẏa  $  jaẏa(?)-koḍi-sahāsa-dahuttariẏa

ghattā:

te bhāẏara avicala-jhāṇa-rui  $  dahavaẏaṇa-vihīsaṇa-bhāṇusui
    vaṇĕ diṭṭha jakkha-sundariĕ kiha  $  jiṇa-vāṇiĕ tiṇṇi vi loẏa jiha

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 8:

jaṃ jakkhiĕ rāvaṇu diṭṭhu vaṇĕ  $  taṃ vammaha-vāṇa païṭṭha maṇĕ
"vollāviu vollaï kiṃ ṇa tuhũ  $  kiṃ vahiraü kiṃ tuha ṇāhĩ muhu
kiṃ jhāẏahi akkhasuttu ghivahi  $  mahu keraü rūva-salilu pivahi"
dahagīva-pasaru alahantiẏaĕ  $  sa-vilakkhaü kheḍu karantiẏaĕ
vacchatthalĕ pahaü sukomalĕṇa  $  kaṇṇāvaẏaṃsa-ṇīluppalĕṇa
aṇṇekkaĕ vuttu varaṅgaṇaĕ  $  papphulliẏa-tāmarasāṇaṇaĕ
"tuhũ jāṇahi ĕhu ṇaru saccamaü  $  uppāiu keṇa vi kaṭṭhamaü
puṇu gampiṇu raṇa-rasa-aḍḍhiẏahŏ  $  jakkhahŏ vajjariu aṇiḍḍhiẏahŏ

ghattā:

"kañcī-kalāva-keūra-dhara  $  paĩ tiṇa-samu maṇṇĕvi tiṇṇi ṇara
    vaṇĕ vijjaü ārāhanta thiẏa  $  ṇāvaï jaga-bhavaṇahŏ khambha kiẏa"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 9:


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jamvūdīva-pahu  $  ṇaṃ jaliu jalaṇa-jālā-ṇivahu
"so kavaṇu etthu ṇikkampiraü  $  jagĕ jīvaï jo mahu vāhiraü"
ahimuhu paẏaṭṭu tahŏ āsavahŏ  $  suẏa diṭṭha tāma raẏaṇāsavahŏ
"ahŏ ahŏ pavvaïẏahŏ ahiṇavahŏ  $  kaṃ jhāẏahŏ kavaṇu deu thuṇahŏ"
jaṃ ekku vi uttaru diṇṇu ṇa vi  $  taṃ puṇu vi samuṭṭhiu kova-havi
uvasaggu ghoru pārambhiẏaü  $  vahurūvĕhĩ jakkhu viẏambhiẏaü
āsīvisa-visahara-ajaẏarĕhĩ  $  saddūla-sīha-kuñjara-varĕhĩ
gaẏa-bhūẏa-pisāĕhĩ rakkhasĕhĩ  $  giri-pavaṇa-huāsaṇa-pāusĕhĩ

ghattā:

dasa-disi-vahu andhāraü karĕvi  $  orumbhĕvi gajjĕvi uttharĕvi
    gaü ṇipphalu so uvasaggu kiha  $  giri-mattaĕ vāsārattu jiha

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 10:


jaṃ cittu ṇa sakkiu avaharĕvi  $  thiu takkhaṇĕ aṇṇa māẏa dharĕvi
darisāviu saẏalu vi vandhujaṇu  $  kaluṇaü kandantu visaṇṇa-maṇu
kasa-ghāĕhĩ ghāijjantu vaṇĕ  $  "ṇivaḍantuṭṭhantaĩ khaṇĕ jĕ khaṇĕ

ahŏ dharahi vihīsaṇa jattāĩ  $  vaṇĕ mecchahĩ piṭṭijjantāĩ

ghattā:

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 11:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 12:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 13:

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 9, Kaḍavaka 14:


jaṃ diṭṭha seṇṇa saẏaṇahũ taṇiẏa  $  paripucchiẏa puṇu avaloẏaṇiẏa
tāĕ vi saṃvohiu dahavaẏaṇu  $  "ĕhu deva tuhāraü vandhu-jaṇu"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaravaï ṇīsariu  $  ṇiẏa-vijja-sahāseṃ pariẏariu
ṇaṃ kamaliṇi-saṇḍeṃ pavaru saru  $  ṇaṃ rāsi-sahāseṃ divasaẏaru
sa-vihīsaṇu kumbhaẏaṇṇu caliu  $  ṇaṃ divasa-teu sūrahŏ miliu
tiṇṇi mi kumāra saṃcalla kira  $  ucchaliẏa tāma phamphāva-gira
raẏaṇāsavu pattu sa-vandhujaṇu  $  taṃ paṭṭaṇu taṃ rāvaṇa-bhavaṇu
taṃ saha-maṇḍaü maṇi-veẏaḍiu  $  taṃ vijja-sahāsu samāvaḍiu

ghattā:

pekkheppiṇu pariosiẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  ṇiẏa taṇaẏa sumālihĕ ṇandaṇĕṇa
    romañcāṇanda-ṇeha-juĕhĩ  $  cumvĕvi avagūḍha sa iṃ bhu vĕhĩ


----------  [10. dasamo saṃdhi]  ----------


sāhiu chaṭṭhovavāsu karĕvi  $  ṇava-ṇīluppala-ṇaẏaṇĕṇa
sundaru su-vaṃsu su-kalattu jiha  $  candahāsu dahavaẏaṇĕṇa

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 10, Kaḍavaka 1:

paripucchiẏa "laï akkhahŏ davatti  $  kehaü pahu kehiẏa tāsu satti

sattaviha-vasaṇa-virahiẏa-sarīru  $  vahu-vuddhi-satti-khama-kāla-dhīru
arivara-chavvagga-viṇāsaẏālu  $  aṭṭhārahaviha-titthāṇupālu

ghattā:

tahŏ keraĕ sāhaṇĕ  $  savvu sāmi-sammāṇiẏaü
    ṇaü kuddhaü luddhaü  $  ko vi bhīru avamāṇiẏaü


kā tisraḥ śaktayaḥ prabhūśaktiḥ utsāhaśaktiḥ mantraśaktiś ceti. 
kā catasro vidyāḥ ānvīkṣikī trayī vārttā daṇḍanītiś ceti. sāṅkhyo yogo lokāyataṃ cānvīkṣikī sāmargyajurvedāstrayī kṛṣiḥ pāśupālyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ vārtā ca ānvīkṣikī-trayī-vārtānāṃ yogakṣemasādhano daṇḍas tasya nītir iti. 
ṣaḍguṇāḥ ke te saṃdhi-vigraha-yānāsana-saṃśraya-dvaidhībhāvāḥ. 
kiṃ tad ṣaḍvidhaṃ balam mūlabalam bhṛtyabalam śreṇībalam mitrabalam amitrabalam āṭavikabalaṃ ceti. 
kā sapta prakṛtayaḥ svāmyamātya-janapada-durga-kośa-bala (v.l. daṇḍa)-mitrāṇi.
kāni sapta vyasanāni pānam dyūtam strī mṛgayā pāruṣyam daṇḍapāruṣyam arthadūṣaṇaṃ ceti. tatrādau catvāri kāmajāni trīṇi kopajāni. 
ko 'riṣaḍvargaḥ kāma-krodha-lobha-māna-mada-harṣāḥ. 
kānyaṣṭādaśa tīrthāni mantri-purohita-senāpati-yuvarāja-dauvārikāntarvaśika-praśastṛ-samāhartṛ-saṃvidhātṛ-pradeṣṭṛ-nāyaka-pauravyāvahārika-karmāntrika-mantripariṣaḍ-daṇḍadurgāntapālāṭavikāḥ. 
pasāhaṇi [a]ṣṭāṅgāni te.

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 11:

raẏaṇāsava-sahasāra-jaṇerahũ  $  maẏa-bhesaï-māricca-kuverahũ
jama-suggīvahũ dūsama-sīlahũ  $  aṇala-ṇalahũ palaẏāṇila-ṇīlahũ
sasi-aṅgaẏahũ divāẏara-aṅgahũ  $  khara-cittahũ dūsaṇa-cittaṅgahũ
sua-camūhũ vīsāvasu-hatthahũ  $  sāraṇa-hari-harikesi-pahatthahũ
kumbhaẏaṇṇa-īsāṇaṇarindahũ  $  vihi-kesarihĩ vihīsaṇa-khandahũ
ghaṇavāhaṇa-taḍikesakumārahũ  $  mallavanta-kaṇaẏahũ duvvārahũ
jamvumāli-jīmuttaṇiṇāẏahũ  $  vajjoẏara-vajjāuharāẏahũ
vāṇaradhaẏa-pañcāṇaṇacindhahũ  $  ema jujjhu abbhiṭṭu pasiddhahũ

ghattā:

kari-kumbha-vikattaṇu  $  gañjolliẏa-taṇu  $  jo raṇĕ jāsu samāvaḍiu
      so tāsu samaccharu  $  tosiẏa-accharu  $  girihĕ davaggi va abbhiḍiu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 12:

ko vi kivāṇa-pāṇie suravahū ṇievi  $  ṇa muaï maṇḍalaggu paharaṃ samallievi

ko vi ṇīsarantanta-cubbhalo  $  bhamaï matta-hatthi va sa-saṅkhalo
ko vi kumbhi-kumbhaẏala-dāraṇo  $  mottioha-ujjaliẏa-paharaṇo
ko vi danta-musalukkhaẏāuho  $  dhāi matta-māẏaṅga-sammuho
ko vi khuḍiẏa-sīso dhaṇuddharo  $  valaï dhāi vindhaï sa-maccharo
ko vi vāṇa-viṇibhiṇṇa-vacchao  $  vāhirantaruccariẏa-picchao
soṇiẏāruṇo sahaï ṇaravaro  $  ratta-kamala-puñjo vva sa-bhamaro
ko vi ekka-calaṇe turaṅgame  $  hari va viṭṭhio ṇa bharie kame
ko vi siraüḍe karĕvi karaẏale  $  jujjha-bhikkha maggei para-vale

ghattā:

bhaḍu ko vi paḍitthiru  $  ṇivvaṭṭiẏa-siru  $  soṇiẏa-dhārucchaliẏa-taṇu
      lakkhijjaï dāruṇu  $  sindūrāruṇu  $  phagguṇĕ ṇāĩ sahasakiraṇu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 13:
kattha i matta-kuñjarā jīvieṇa cattā  $  kasaṇa-mahāghaṇa vva dīsanti dharaṇi-pattā

kattha i sa-visāṇaĩ kumbhaẏalaĩ  $  ṇaṃ raṇavahu-ukkhalaĩ sa-musalaĩ
kattha i haẏa karavālahĩ khaṇḍiẏa  $  anta-lalanta khalanta pahiṇḍiẏa
kattha i chattaĩ haẏaĩ visālaĩ  $  ṇaṃ jama-bhoẏaṇĕ diṇṇaĩ thālaĩ
kattha i suhaḍa-sirāĩ paloṭṭaĩ  $  ṇāĩ a-ṇālaĩ ṇava-kandoṭṭaĩ
kattha i raha-cakkaĩ vicchiṇṇaĩ  $  kali-kālahŏ āsaṇaĩ va diṇṇaĩ
kattha vi bhaḍahŏ sivaṅgaṇa ḍhukkiẏa  $  "hiẏavaü ṇāhĩ" bhaṇevi uḍhukkiẏa
kattha vi giddhu kavandhĕ pariṭṭhiu  $  ṇaṃ ahiṇava-siru suhaḍu samuṭṭhiu
kattha i giddheṃ maṇusu ṇa khaddhaü  $  vāṇĕhĩ cañcuhĩ bheu ṇa laddhaü

ghattā:

kattha i ṇara-ruṇḍĕhĩ  $  kara-kama-tuṇḍĕhĩ  $  samara-vasundhari bhīsaṇiẏa
      vahu-khaṇḍa-paẏārĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ sūārĕhĩ  $  raïẏa rasoi jamahŏ taṇiẏa

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 14:

tahĩ tehaĕ mahāhavĕ kiẏa-mahocchavehiṃ  $  kokkiu ekkamekku laṅkesa-vāsavehiṃ

"urĕ urĕ sakka sakka parisakkahi  $  jiha ṇiṭṭhaviu māli tiha thakkahi
haũ so rāvaṇu bhuvaṇa-bhaẏaṅkaru  $  suravara-kula-kiẏantu raṇĕ duddharu"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi valiu ākhaṇḍalu  $  pacchāẏantu sarĕhĩ ṇaha-maṇḍalu
dahamuho vi utthariu sa-maccharu  $  kiu sara-jālu sarĕhĩ saẏa-sakkaru
to etthantarĕ haẏa-paḍivakkheṃ  $  saru aggeu mukku sahasakkheṃ
dhāiu dhagadhagantu dhūmantaü  $  cindhĕhĩ chatta-dhaĕhĩ laggantaü
rāvaṇa-valu ṇāsaṃghiẏa-jīviu  $  ṇāsaï jālā-mālālīviu

ghattā:

raẏaṇiẏara-pahāṇeṃ  $  vāruṇa-vāṇeṃ  $  saravaraggi ulhāviẏaü
    masi-vaṇṇuparattaü  $  dhūmala-gattaü  $  pisuṇu jema vollāviẏaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 15:

uvasamie huāsaṇe vaẏaṇa-bhāsureṇaṃ  $  vahala-tamoha-paharaṇaṃ pesiẏaṃ sureṇaṃ

kiu andhāraü teṇa raṇaṅgaṇu  $  kiṃ pi ṇa dekkhaï ṇisiẏara-sāhaṇu
jimbhaï aṅgu valaï ṇiddāẏaï  $  suaï aceẏaṇu osuviṇāẏaï
pekkhĕvi ṇiẏa-valu oṇallantaü  $  melliu diṇaẏaratthu pajalantaü
amarāhivĕṇa rāhu-vara-paharaṇu  $  ṇāga-pāsa sara muaï dasāṇaṇu
pavara-bhuaṅga-sahāsĕhĩ daṭṭhaü  $  sura-valu pāṇa laevi paṇaṭṭhaü
gāruḍatthu vāsavĕṇa visajjiu  $  visahara-saravara-jālu parajjiu
khagaüḍa-pavaṇandoliẏa meiṇi  $  ḍolā-rūḍhī ṇaṃ vara-kāmiṇī
pakkha-pavaṇa-paḍipahaẏa-mahīhara  $  ṇaccāviẏa sa-disivaha sa-sāẏara
ghattā:

mellĕvi riu-ghāẏaṇu  $  saru ṇārāẏaṇu  $  tijagavihūsaṇĕ gaĕ caḍiu
      jettahĕ aïrāvaṇu  $  tettahĕ rāvaṇu  $  jāĕvi indahŏ abbhiḍiu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 16:

matta gaïnda dovi ubbhiṇṇa-kasaṇa-dehā  $  ṇaṃ gajjanta dhanta sama-uttharanta mehā

parovarassa pattaẏā  $  maẏamvu-sitta-gattaẏā
thirora thora-kandharā  $  paloṭṭa-dāṇa-ṇijjharā
sa-sīẏara vva pāusā  $  maẏandha mukka-aṅkusā
visāla-kumbhamaṇḍalā  $  ṇivaddha-danta-ujjalā
athakka-kaṇṇa-cāmarā  $  ṇivāriẏāli-goẏarā
samuddha-suṇḍa-bhīsaṇā  $  visaṭṭa-ghaṇṭa-ṇīsaṇā
maṇojja-gejja-pantiṇo  $  bhamanti ve vi dantiṇo

ghattā:

maẏagalĕhĩ mahantĕhĩ  $  vihi mi bhamantĕhĩ  $  suravaï-laṅkāhivĕ pavara
     bhava-bhavaṇĕhĩ chūḍhī  $  ṇaṃ mahi mūḍhī  $  bhamaï sa-sāẏara sa-dharadhara

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 17:

tijagavihūsaṇeṇa kiu sura-karī ṇirattho  $  pariosiẏa ṇisāẏarā lhasiu vaïri-sattho

rāvaṇu ṇava-juvāṇu valavantaü  $  amarāhiu gaẏa-vesa-mahantaü
bhamĕvi ṇa sakkiu karivaru khañciu  $  rakkheṃ saẏavāraü pariẏañciu
gaü gaeṇa pahu pahuṇoṭṭhaddhaü  $  jhampa devi aṃsuĕṇa ṇivaddhaü
vijaü ghuṭṭhu raẏaṇīẏara-sāhaṇĕ  $  devĕhĩ dunduhi diṇṇa divaṅgaṇĕ
tāva jaẏantu dasāṇaṇa-jāeṃ  $  āṇiu vandhĕvi vāhu-sahāeṃ
jamu suggīveṃ dūsama-sīleṃ  $  aṇalu ṇaleṇa aṇilu raṇĕ ṇīleṃ
khara-dūsaṇĕhĩ citta-cittaṅgaẏa  $  ravi sasi levi āẏa aṅgaṅgaẏa
suravara-guru maeṇa ṇibbhicceṃ  $  laïu kuveru samarĕ māricceṃ

ghattā:

jo jasu utthariẏaü  $  so teṃ dhariẏaü  $  geṇhĕvi pavara-vandi-saẏaĩ
      gaü suravara-ḍāmaru  $  puru ajarāmaru  $  jiṇu jiha jiṇĕvi mahābhaẏaĩ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 17, Kaḍavaka 18:

laṅka purandare ṇie jaẏa-sirī-ṇivāso  $  sahasāreṇa patthio patthivo dasāso

"ahŏ jama-dhaṇaẏa-sakka-kampāvaṇa  $  dehi suputta-bhikkha mahu rāvaṇa"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi bhaṇaï sura-vandhaṇu  $  "tumha vi amha vi eu ṇivandhaṇu
jamu talavaru paripālaü paṭṭaṇu  $  paṅgaṇu ṇikkiu karaü pahañjaṇu
puppha-paẏaru gharĕ deu vaṇāsaï  $  sahũ gandhavvĕhĩ gāẏaü sarasaï
vattha-sahāsaĩ havi pakkhālaü  $  kosu asesu kuveru ṇihālaü
joṇha kareu miẏaṅku ṇirantaru  $  sīẏalu ṇahaẏalĕ tavaü divāẏaru
amararāu majjaṇaü bharāvaü  $  aṇṇu vi ghaṇĕhĩ chaḍaü devāvaü"
taṃ paḍivaṇṇu savvu sahasāreṃ  $  mukku sakku laṅkālaṅkāreṃ

ghattā:

ṇiẏa-rajju vivajjĕvi  $  gaü pavvajjĕvi  $  sāsaẏapurahŏ sahasaṇaẏaṇu
     jaẏa-siri-vahu maṇḍĕvi  $  thiu avaruṇḍĕvi  $  sa ĩ bhu ẏa-phalihĕhĩ dahavaẏaṇu



iẏa cāru-paümacarie dhaṇañjaẏāsiẏa-saẏambhueva-kae
jāṇaha "rā va ṇa vi ja ẏaṃ" sattārahaṃ imaṃ pavvaṃ


----------  [18. aṭṭhārahamo saṃdhi]  ----------


raṇĕ māṇu malevi purandarahŏ  $  pariẏañcĕvi siharaĩ mandarahŏ
āvaï vi paḍīvaü jāma pahu  $  tāṇantarĕ diṭṭhu aṇantarahu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 18, Kaḍavaka 1:


pekkheppiṇu giri-kañcaṇa-subhaddu  $  jiṇa-vandaṇa-dūrucchaliẏa-saddu
suravara-saẏa-seva-karāvaṇeṇa  $  māricci papucchiu rāvaṇeṇa
"bhaḍa-bhañjaṇa bhuvaṇucchaliẏa-ṇāma  $  uhu kalaẏalu summaï kāĩ māma"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi pabhaṇaï samara-dhīru  $  "ĕhu jaï ṇāmeṇa aṇantavīru
dasaraha-bhāẏaru aṇaraṇṇa-jāu  $  sahasaẏara-saṇeheṃ tavasi jāu
uppaṇṇaü eẏahŏ etthu ṇāṇu  $  uhu dīsaï devāgamu sa-jāṇu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu ṇisiẏarindu  $  gaü tettahĕ jettahĕ muṇivarindu
pariẏañcĕvi ṇavĕvi thuṇĕvi ṇiviṭṭhu  $  saẏalu vi jaṇu vaẏaĩ laẏantu diṭṭhu

ghattā:

mahavaẏaĩ ko vi kŏ vi aṇuvaẏaĩ  $  kŏ vi sikkhāvaẏaĩ guṇavvaẏaĩ
    kŏ vi diḍhu sammattu laevi thiu  $  para rāvaṇu ekku ṇa uvasamiu


_______________________________________________________________

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 18, Kaḍavaka 2:


dhammarahu mahārisi bhaṇaï tetthu  $  "maṇuẏattu lahĕvi vaïsarĕvi etthu
ahŏ dahamuha mohandhārĕ chūḍha  $  raẏaṇāẏarĕ raẏaṇu ṇa lehi mūḍha
amiẏālaĕ amiu ṇa lehi kema  $  acchahi ṇihuaü kaṭṭhamaü jema"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu dasasireṇa  $  vuccaï thottuggīriẏa-gireṇa
"sakkami dhūmaddhaĕ jhampa devi  $  sakkami phaṇa-phaṇimaṇi-raẏaṇu levi
sakkami giri-mandaru ṇiddalevi  $  sakkami dasa disi-vaha daramalevi
sakkami māruu poṭṭalĕ chuhevi  $  sakkami jama-mahisĕ samāruhevi
sakkami raẏaṇāẏara-jalu pievi  $  sakkami āsīvisu ahi ṇievi

ghattā:

sakkami sakkahŏ raṇĕ uttharĕvi  $  sakkami sasi-sūrahã paha harĕvi
    sakkami mahi gaẏaṇu ekku karĕvi  $  duddharu ṇaü sakkami vaü dharĕvi

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 18, Kaḍavaka 3:


paricintĕvi suiru ṇarāhiveṇa  $  "laï lemi ekku vaü" vuttu teṇa
"jaṃ maĩ ṇa samicchaï cāru-gattu  $  taṃ maṇḍa laemi ṇa para-kalattu"
gaü ema bhaṇeppiṇu ṇiẏaẏa-ṇaẏaru  $  thiu acalu rajju bhuñjantu khaẏaru
ettahĕ vi mahindu mahinda-ṇāmĕ  $  puravarĕ icchiẏa-aṇuhūa-kāmĕ
tahŏ hiẏaẏaveẏa ṇāmeṇa bhajja  $  tahĕ duhiẏañjaṇasundari maṇojja
jhinduĕṇa ramantihĕ thaṇa ṇievi  $  thiu ṇaravaï muhĕ kara-kamalu devi
uppaṇṇa cinta "kahŏ kaṇṇa demi  $  laï vaṭṭaï giri-kaïlāsu ṇemi
vijjāhara-saẏaĩ milanti jetthu  $  varu avaseṃ hosaï ko vi tetthu"

ghattā:

gaü ema bhaṇĕvi pahu pavvaẏahŏ  $  jiṇa-aṭṭhāhiĕ aṭṭhāvaẏahŏ
    āvāsiu pāsĕhĩ ṇīẏaḍĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ tārāẏaṇu mandara-taḍĕhĩ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 18, Kaḍavaka 4:


ettahĕ vi tāva palhāẏa-rāu  $  sahũ keumaïĕ ravipurahŏ āu
sa-vimāṇu sa-sāhaṇu sa-parivāru  $  aṇṇu vi tahĩ pavaṇañjaẏa-kumāru
ekkattahĕ dūsāvāsu laïu  $  ṇaṃ vandaṇahattiĕ indu aïu
avara vi je je āsaṇṇa-bhavva  $  te te vijjāhara miliẏa savva
pahilaĕ phagguṇaṇandīsarāhĕ  $  kiẏa ṇhavaṇa-pujja taïlokka-ṇāhĕ
diṇĕ vīẏaĕ vihi mi ṇarāhivāhã  $  mittaïẏa paropparu hūa tāhã
palhāeṃ kheḍu karevi vuttu  $  "taü taṇiẏa kaṇṇa mahu taṇaü puttu
ki ṇa kīraï pāṇiggahaṇu rāẏa"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi teṇa vi diṇṇa vāẏa
pariosu pavaḍḍhiu sajjaṇāhã  $  maïliẏaĩ muhaĩ khala-dujjaṇāhã

ghattā:

"vahu añjaṇa vāukumāru varu"  $  ghoseppiṇu "ṇaẏaṇāṇandaẏaru
      taïẏaĕ vāsarĕ pāṇiggahaṇu"  $  gaẏa ṇaravaï ṇiẏaẏa-ṇiẏaẏa-bhavaṇu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 18, Kaḍavaka 5:


etthantarĕ dujjaü duṇṇivāru  $  maẏaṇāuru pavaṇañjaẏa-kumāru
ṇaü visahaï taïẏaü divasu entu  $  acchaï virahāṇalĕ jhampa dentu
dhūmāi valaï dhagadhagaï cittu  $  ṇaṃ mandiru abbhantarĕ palittu
candiṇaü candu candaṇu jaladdu  $  kappūra-kamaladalasejja-maddu

ṇiḍḍahaï aṅguvaṅgaĩ aṇaṅgu  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaẏāĩ va pisuṇa-saṅgu
ṇīsasaï sasaï vevaï tameṇa  $  dhāhāvaï dhāhā pañcameṇa
uḍḍhaṇa-āharaṇa-pasāhaṇāĩ  $  savvaĩ aṅgahŏ asuhāvaṇāĩ

ghattā:

    pabhaṇiu pahasiĕṇa ṇievi muhu  $  "kiṃ duvvalihuẏaü kumāra tuhũ"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 18, Kaḍavaka 6:


virahaggi-daḍḍha-muha-kañjaeṇa  $  pahasiu pavuttu pavaṇañjaeṇa
"bho ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇa cāru-citta  $  ṇaü visahaũ taïẏaü divasu mitta
jaï ajju ṇa lakkhiu piẏahĕ vaẏaṇu  $  to kallaĕ mahu ṇittulaü maraṇu"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vuccaï pahasieṇa  $  kamaleṇa va vaẏaṇeṃ pahasieṇa
"phaṇi-sira-raẏaṇeṇa vi ṇāhĩ gaṇṇu  $  ĕu kāraṇu kettiu jeṃ visaṇṇu

thiẏa jāla-gavakkhaĕ diṭṭha vāla  $  ṇaṃ maẏaṇa-vāṇa-dhaṇu-toṇa-sāla
māro vi maraï viraheṇa jāhĕ  $  ko vaṇṇĕvi sakkaï rūvu tāhĕ

ghattā:

    "taü jīviu sahalu aṇanta siẏa  $  jasu karĕ laggesaï eha tiẏa"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 18, Kaḍavaka 7:


etthantarĕ aṭṭhami-canda-bhāla  $  muhu joĕvi cavaï vasantamāla
"sahalaü taü māṇusa-jammu māĕ  $  bhattāru pahañjaṇu laddhu jāĕ"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi dummuha duṭṭha-vesa  $  siru vihuṇĕvi bhaṇaï vi mīsakesa
"sodāmaṇipahu pahu pariharevi  $  thiu pavaṇu kavaṇu guṇu saṃbharevi
jaṃ antaru gopaẏa-sāẏarāhũ  $  jaṃ joiṅgaṇahã divāẏarāhũ
jaṃ antaru kesari-kuñjarāhũ  $  jaṃ kusumāuha-titthaṅkarāhũ
jaṃ antaru garuḍa-mahoragāhũ  $  jaṃ amararāẏa-paharaṇa-ṇagāhũ

taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jāṇĕvi sarĕvi guṇu  $  attillu tehĩ tā ruṇṇu puṇu

ekkallaü rāvaṇu  $  bhuvaṇa-bhaẏāvaṇu  $  bhamaï aṇantaĕ vaïri-valĕ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 20, Kaḍavaka 7:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa I, Saṃdhi 20, Kaḍavaka 12:

*************************  II. ujjhākaṇḍaṃ  *************************  
________________________________________________________________________



----------  [21. ekkavīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


sāẏaravuddhi vihīsaṇĕṇa  $  paripucchiu "jaẏasiri-māṇaṇahŏ
kahĕ kettaḍaü  kālu acalu  $  jaü jīviu rajju dasāṇaṇahŏ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 1:


pabhaṇaï sāẏaravuddhi bhaḍāraü  $  kusumāuha-sara-pasara-ṇivāraü
"suṇu akkhami rahuvaṃsu pahāṇaü  $  dasarahu atthi aüjjhahĕ rāṇaü
tāsu putta hosanti dhurandhara  $  vāsueva-valaeva dhaṇuddhara
tehĩ haṇevaü rakkhu mahāraṇĕ  $  jaṇaẏa-ṇarāhiva-taṇaẏahĕ kāraṇĕ"
to sahasatti palittu vihīsaṇu  $  ṇaṃ ghaẏa-ghaḍaĕhĩ sittu huāsaṇu
"jāma ṇa laṅkā-vallari sukkaï  $  jāma ṇa maraṇu dasāsaṇĕ ḍhukkaï
toḍami tāma tāhũ bhaẏa-bhīsaĩ  $  dasaraha-jaṇaẏa-ṇarāhiva-sīsaĩ"
to taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi kaliẏāraü  $  vaddhāvaṇahã padhāiu ṇāraü
"ajju vihīsaṇu uppari esaï  $  tumhahã vihi mi siraĩ toḍesaï"

ghattā:

dasaraha-jaṇaẏa viṇīsariẏa  $  leppamaü thaveppiṇu appaṇaü
      ṇiẏaĩ siraĩ vijjāharĕhĩ  $  pariẏaṇahŏ kareppiṇu cappaṇaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 2:

tahĩ suhamaï-ṇāmeṇa pahāṇaü  $  ṇaṃ surapurahŏ purandaru rāṇaü

      ṇāĩ samudda-mahāsirihĕ  $  thiẏa jalavāhiṇi-pavāha samuha

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 4:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 7:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 8:

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 9:


diṭṭha jaṃ jĕ paḍĕ paḍima kumāreṃ  $  pañcahĩ sarahĩ viddhu ṇaṃ māreṃ
susiẏa-vaẏaṇu ghummaïẏa-ṇiḍālaü  $  valiẏa-aṅgu moḍiẏa-bhuva-ḍālaü
vaddha-kesu pakkhoḍiẏa-vacchaü  $  darisāviẏa-dasa-kāmāvatthaü
cinta paḍhama-thāṇantarĕ laggaï  $  vīẏaĕ piẏa-muha-daṃsaṇu maggaï
taïẏaĕ sasaï dīha-ṇīsāseṃ  $  kaṇaï caütthaĕ jara-viṇṇāseṃ
pañcamĕ ḍāheṃ aṅgu ṇa muccaï  $  chaṭṭhaĕ muhahŏ ṇa kāi mi ruccaï
sattamĕ thāṇĕ ṇa gāsu laïjjaï  $  aṭṭhamĕ gamaṇummāĕhĩ bhijjaï
ṇavamĕ pāṇa-saṃdehahŏ ḍhukkaï  $  dasamaĕ maraï ṇa kema vi cukkaï

ghattā:

kahiu ṇarindahŏ kiṅkarĕhĩ  $  "pahu dukkaru jīvaï puttu taü
    kāhĕ vi kaṇṇahĕ kāraṇĕṇa  $  so dasamī kāmāvattha gaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 10:


ṇāga-ṇarāmara-kula-kaliẏāraü  $  candagaïĕ paḍipucchiu ṇāraü
"kahi kahŏ taṇiẏa kaṇṇa kahĩ diṭṭhī  $  jā mahu puttahŏ hiẏaĕ païṭṭhī"
kahaï mahārisi "mihilā-rāṇaü  $  candakeu-ṇāmeṇa pahāṇaü
tahŏ suu jaṇaü tetthu maĩ diṭṭhaü  $  kaṇṇā-raẏaṇu tiloẏa-variṭṭhaü
taṃ jaï hoi kumārahŏ āẏahŏ  $  to siẏa haraï purandara-rāẏahŏ"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vijjāhara-ṇāheṃ  $  pesiu cavalaveu asagāheṃ
"jāhi videhā-daïu harevaü  $  maĩ vivāha-saṃvandhu karevaü"
gaü so candagaïhĕ muhu joĕvi  $  mandura ḍhukku turaṅgamu hoĕvi
koḍḍeṃ caḍiu ṇarāhiu jāvĕhĩ  $  dāhiṇa seḍhi parāiu tāvĕhĩ
mihilā-ṇāhu mueppiṇu jiṇa-harĕ  $  cavalaveu païsaï purĕ maṇaharĕ

ghattā:

"āṇiu jaṇaẏa-ṇarāhivaï"  $  ṇiẏa-ṇāhahŏ akkhiu sa-rahasĕṇa
      vandaṇahattiĕ so vi gaü  $  sahũ putteṃ viraha-paravvasĕṇa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 11:


vijjāhara-ṇara-ṇaẏaṇāṇandĕhĩ  $  kiu saṃbhāsaṇu vihi mi ṇarindĕhĩ
pabhaṇaï candagamaṇu tosiẏa-maṇu  $  "viṇṇi vi kiṇṇa karahũ saẏaṇattaṇu
duhiẏa tuhārī puttu mahāraü  $  hou vivāhu maṇoraha-gāraü"
amarisu ṇavara pavaddhiu jaṇaẏahŏ  $  "diṇṇa kaṇṇa maĩ dasaraha-taṇaẏahŏ
rāmahŏ jaẏasiri-rāmāsattahŏ  $  savara-varūhiṇi-cūriẏa-gattahŏ
tahĩ avasarĕ vaddhiẏa-ahimāṇeṃ  $  vuttu ṇarindu candapatthāṇeṃ
"kahĩ vijjāharu kahĩ bhūgoẏaru  $  gaẏa-masaẏahũ vaḍḍāraü antaru
māṇusa-khettu jĕ tāma kaṇiṭṭhaü  $  jīviu tahĩ kahĩ taṇaü visiṭṭhaü"

ghattā:

bhaṇaï ṇarāhiu "kettiĕṇa  $  jagĕ māṇusa-khettu jĕ aggalaü
    jasu pāsiu titthaṅkarĕhĩ  $  siddhattaṇu laddhaü kevalaü"


_______________________________________________________________

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 12:


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi bhāmaṇḍala-vappeṃ  $  vuccaï vijjā-vala-māhappeṃ
"paguṇa-guṇaĩ aï-dujjaẏa-bhāvaĩ  $  purĕ acchanti etthu ve cāvaĩ
vajjāvatta-samuddāvattaĩ  $  jakkhārakkhiẏa-rakkhiẏa-gattaĩ
kiṃ bhāmaṇḍaleṇa kiṃ rāmeṃ  $  tāĩ caḍāvaï jo āẏāmeṃ
pariṇaü so jjĕ kaṇṇa ĕu pabhaṇiu"  $  taṃ ji pamāṇu karĕvi pahu bhaṇiẏaü
gaẏa sa-sarāsaṇa mihilā-puravaru  $  vaddha mañca āḍhattu saẏamvaru
miliẏa ṇarāhiva je jagĕ jāṇiẏa  $  saẏala vi dhaṇu-paẏāva-avamāṇiẏa
ko vi ṇāhĩ jo tāĩ caḍāvaï  $  jakkha-sahāsahũ muhu darisāvaï

ghattā:

jāma ṇa guṇahĩ caḍantāĩ  $  ahijāẏaĩ kaü suha-daṃsaṇaĩ
    avaseṃ jaṇahŏ aṇiṭṭhāĩ  $  kukalattaĩ jema sarāsaṇaĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 13:


jaṃ ṇaravaï asesa avamāṇiẏa  $  dasaraha-taṇaẏa caẏāri vi āṇiẏa
hari-valaeva paḍhukkiẏa tettahĕ  $  sīẏa-saẏamvara-maṇḍaü jettahĕ
dūra-ṇivāriẏa-ṇaravara-lakkhĕhĩ  $  dhaṇuharāĩ allaviẏaĩ jakkhĕhĩ
"appaṇa-appaṇāĩ su-pamāṇaĩ  $  ṇivvāḍevi lehu vara-cāvaĩ"
laïẏaĩ sāẏara-vajjāvattaĩ  $  gāmahaṇā iva guṇĕhĩ caḍantaĩ
melliu kusuma-vāsu sura-sattheṃ  $  pariṇiẏa jaṇaẏa-taṇaẏa kākuttheṃ
je je miliẏa saẏamvarĕ rāṇā  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-ṇaẏarahŏ gaẏa viddāṇā
divasu vāru ṇakkhattu gaṇeppiṇu  $  laggu joggu gaha-dutthu ṇieppiṇu

ghattā:

joisiĕhĩ āesu kiu  $  "jaü lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ sa-rahasahũ
    āẏahĕ kaṇṇahĕ kāraṇĕṇa  $  hosaï viṇāsu vahu-rakkhasahũ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 21, Kaḍavaka 14:


sasivaddhaṇeṇa sasi-vaẏaṇiẏaü  $  kuvalaẏa-dala-dīhara-ṇaẏaṇiẏaü
kala-koila-vīṇā-vāṇiẏaü  $  aṭṭhāraha kaṇṇaü āṇiẏaü
dasa lahu-bhāẏarahũ samappiẏaü  $  lakkhaṇahŏ aṭṭha parikappiẏaü
doṇeṇa visallā-sundariẏa  $  kaṇhahŏ cintaviẏa maṇohariẏa
vaïdehi aüjjhā-ṇaẏari ṇiẏa  $  dasarahĕṇa mahocchava-soha kiẏa
raha-tikka-caükkahĩ caccarahĩ  $  kuṅkuma-kappūra-pavara-varahĩ
candana-chaḍoha-dijjantaĕhĩ  $  gāẏaṇa-gīẏahĩ gijjantaĕhĩ
maṇimaïẏaü raïẏaü dehaliu  $  mottiẏa-kaṇaĕhĩ raṅgāvaliu
sovaṇṇa-daṇḍa-maṇi-toraṇaĩ  $  vaddhaĩ suravara-maṇa-coraṇaĩ


ghattā:

sīẏa-valaĩ païsāriẏaĩ  $  jaṇĕ jaẏa-jaẏa-kārijjantāĩ
      thiẏaĩ aüjjhahĕ avicalaĩ  $  raï-sokkha sa ẏaṃ bhu ñjantāĩ


----------  [22. vāvīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


kosalaṇandaṇĕṇa  $  sa-kalatteṃ ṇiẏa-gharu āeṃ
āsāḍhaṭṭhamihĩ  $  kiu ṇhavaṇu jiṇindahŏ rāeṃ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 1:


sura-samara-sahāsĕhĩ dummaheṇa  $  kiu ṇhavaṇu jiṇindahŏ dasaraheṇa
paṭṭhaviẏaĩ jiṇa-taṇu-dhovaẏāĩ  $  devihĩ divvaĩ gandhovaẏāĩ
suppahahĕ ṇavara kañcui ṇa pattu  $  pahu pabhaṇaï rahasucchaliẏa-gattu
"kahĕ kāĩ ṇiẏamviṇi maṇĕ visaṇṇa  $  cira-cittiẏa bhitti va thiẏa vivaṇṇa"
paṇaveppiṇu vuccaï suppahāĕ  $  "kira kāĩ mahu ttaṇiẏaĕ kahāĕ
jaï haũ jĕ pāṇavallahiẏa deva  $  to gandha-salilu pāvaï ṇa kema"
tahĩ avasarĕ kañcui ḍhukku pāsu  $  chaṇa-sasi va ṇirantara-dhavaliẏāsu
gaẏa-dantu aẏaṃgamu (?) daṇḍa-pāṇi  $  aṇiẏacchiẏa-pahu pakkhaliẏa-vāṇi

ghattā:

garahiu dasarahĕṇa  $  "paĩ kañcui kāĩ cirāviu
    jalu jiṇa-vaẏaṇu jiha  $  suppahahĕ davatti ṇa pāviu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 2:


paṇaveppiṇu teṇa vi vuttu ema  $  "gaẏa diẏahā jovvaṇu lhasiu deva
paḍhamāusu jara dhavalanti āẏa  $  puṇu asaï va sīsa-valagga jāẏa
gaï tuṭṭiẏa vihaḍiẏa sandhi-vandha  $  ṇa suṇanti kaṇṇa loẏaṇa ṇirandha
siru kampaï muhĕ pakkhalaï vāẏa  $  gaẏa danta sarīrahŏ ṇaṭṭha chāẏa
parigaliu ruhiru thiu ṇavara cammu  $  mahu etthu jĕ huu ṇaṃ avaru jammu
giri-ṇaï-pavāha ṇa vahanti pāẏa  $  gandhovaü pāvaü kema rāẏa"
vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa kiu pahu-viẏappu  $  gaü parama-visāẏahŏ rāma-vappu
"saccaü calu jīviu kavaṇu sokkhu  $  taṃ kijjaï sijjhaï jeṇa mokkhu
ghattā:

suhu mahu-vindu-samu  $  duhu meru-sarisu paviẏambhaï
    vari taṃ kammu kiu  $  jaṃ paü ajarāmaru labbhaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 3:


kaṃ divasu vi hosaï ārisāhũ  $  kañcui-avattha amhārisāhũ
ko haũ kā mahi kahŏ taṇaü davvu  $  siṃhāsaṇu chattaĩ athiru savvu
jovvaṇu sarīru jīviu dhigatthu  $  saṃsāru asāru aṇatthu atthu
visu visaẏa vandhu diḍha-vandhaṇāĩ  $  ghara-dāraĩ parihava-kāraṇāĩ
suẏa sattu viḍhattaü avaharanti  $  jara-maraṇahã kiṅkara kiṃ karanti
jīvāu vāu haẏa haẏa varāẏa  $  sandaṇa sandaṇa gaẏa gaẏa jĕ ṇāẏa
taṇu taṇu jĕ khaṇaddheṃ khaẏahŏ jāi  $  dhaṇu dhaṇu ji guṇeṇa vi vaṅku thāi
duhiẏā vi duhiẏa māẏā vi māẏa  $  sama-bhāu lenti kira teṇa bhāẏa

ghattā:

āẏaĩ avaraï mi  $  savvaĩ rāhavahŏ samappĕvi
    appuṇu taü karami"  $  thiu dasarahu ema viẏappĕvi


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 4:


tahĩ avasarĕ āiu savaṇa-saṅghu  $  para-samaẏasamīraṇa-giri-alaṅghu
dummahamaha-vammaha-mahaṇa-sīlu  $  bhaẏa-bhaṅgura-bhuaṇuddharaṇa-līlu
ahi-visama-visaẏa-visa-veẏa-samaṇu  $  khama-dama-ṇiseṇi-kiẏa-mokkha-gamaṇu
tavasiri-vararāmāliṅgiẏaṅgu  $  kali-kalusa-salila-sosaṇa-paẏaṅgu
titthaṅkara-caraṇamvuruha-bhamaru  $  kiẏa-moha-mahāsura-ṇaẏara-ḍamaru
tahĩ saccabhūi ṇāmeṇa sāhu  $  jāṇiẏa-saṃsāra-samudda-thāhu
magahāhiu visaẏa-viratta-dehu  $  avahatthiẏa-putta-kalatta-ṇehu
givvāṇa-mahāgiri dhīrimāĕ  $  raẏaṇāẏara-guru gambhīrimāĕ

ghattā:

risi-saṅghāhivaï  $  so āu aüjjha bhaḍāraü
    "sivapuri-gamaṇu kari"  $  dasarahahŏ ṇāĩ hakkāraü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 5:

paḍivaṇṇaĕ tahĩ tettaḍaĕ kālĕ  $  to purĕ rahaṇeuracakkavālĕ
bhāmaṇḍalu maṇḍalu pariharantu  $  acchaï risi siddhi va saṃbharantu
vaïdehi-viraha-veẏaṇa sahantu  $  dasa kāmāvatthaü dakkhavantu
paḍihanti ṇa vijjāhara-tiẏāu  $  ṇaü khāṇa-pāṇa-bhoẏaṇa-kiẏāu
ṇa jaladda ṇa candaṇa kamala-sejja  $  ḍhukkanti janti aṇṇoṇṇa vejja
vāhijjaï viraheṃ dūsaheṇa  $  ṇaü phiṭṭaï keṇa vi osaheṇa
ṇīsāsu mueppiṇu dīhu dīhu  $  puṇaravi thiu thakkĕvi jema sīhu
"bhūgoẏari bhuñjami maṇḍa levi"  $  ṇīsariu sa-sāhaṇu saṇṇahevi

ghattā:

pattu viẏaḍḍha-puru  $  taṃ ṇiĕvi jāu jāīsaru
    "aṇṇahĩ bhava-gahaṇĕ  $  haũ hontu etthu rajjesaru"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 6:


mucchāviu taṃ pekkhĕvi paesu  $  saṃbharĕvi bhavantaru ṇiravasesu
sabbhāveṃ pabhaṇiu teṇa tāu  $  "kuṇḍalamaṇḍiu ṇāmeṇa rāu
haũ hontu etthu akhaliẏa-maraṭṭu  $  piṅgalu ṇāmeṇa kuvera-bhaṭṭu
sasikeu-duhiẏa avaharĕvi āu  $  parivasaï kuḍīraĕ kira varāu
uddāliu maĩ tahŏ taṃ kalattu  $  sŏ vi marĕvi surattaṇu kahi mi pattu
muu haü mi videhahĕ dehĕ āu  $  ṇiu deveṃ jāṇaï-jamala-jāu
vaṇĕ ghattiu kaṇṭeṇa vi ṇa bhiṇṇu  $  pupphavaïhĕ paĩ sāẏarĕṇa diṇṇu

ghattā:

vaddhiu tumha gharĕ  $  jaṇu saẏalu vi ĕu pariẏāṇaï
    jaṇaü jaṇeru mahu  $  māẏari videha sasa jāṇaï"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 7:


vittantu kaheppiṇu ṇiravasesu  $  gaü vandaṇahattiĕ taṃ paesu
jahĩ vasaï mahārisi saccabhūi  $  jahĩ jiṇavara-ṇhavaṇa-mahāvibhūi
vaïragga-kālu jahĩ dasarahāsu  $  jahĩ sīẏa-rāma-lakkhaṇa-vilāsu
sattuhaṇa-bharaha jahĩ miliẏa ve vi  $  gaü tahĩ bhāmaṇḍalu jaṇaṇu levi
jiṇu vandiu mokkha-valagga-jaṅghu  $  puṇu guru-parivāḍiĕ savaṇa-saṅghu
puṇu kiu saṃbhāsaṇu samaü tehĩ  $  sattuhaṇa-bharaha-vala-lakkhaṇehĩ
jāṇāviu sīẏahĕ bhāi jema  $  jiha hari-vala-sālā sāvaleva
suu parama-dhammu suha-bhāẏaṇeṇa  $  tavacaraṇu laẏaü candāẏaṇeṇa

ghattā:

dasarahu aṇṇa-diṇĕ  $  kira rāmahŏ rajju samappaï
    kekkaẏa tāva maṇĕ  $  uṇhālaĕ dharaṇi va tappaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 8:


ṇarindassa soūṇa pavvajja-ẏajjaṃ  $  sa-rāmāhirāmassa rāmassa rajjaṃ
sasā doṇarāẏassa bhaggāṇurāẏā  $  tulākoḍi-kantī-laẏāliddha-pāẏā
sa-pālamva-kañcī-pahā-bhiṇṇa-gujjhā  $  thaṇuttuṅga-bhāreṇa jā ṇiṇṇa-majjhā
ṇavāsoẏa-vacchacchaẏāchāẏa-pāṇī  $  varālāviṇī-koilālāva-vāṇī
mahā-morapicchoha-saṃkāsa-kesā  $  aṇaṅgassa bhallī va pacchaṇṇa-vesā
gaẏā kekkaẏā jattha atthāṇa-maggo  $  ṇarindo surindo va pīḍhaṃ valaggo
varo maggio "ṇāha so esa kālo  $  mahaṃ ṇandaṇo ṭhāu rajjāṇupālo"
"pie hou evaṃ" tao sāvalevo  $  samāẏārio lakkhaṇo rāmaevo

ghattā:

"jaï tuhũ puttu mahu  $  to ettiu pesaṇu kijjaï
    chattaĩ vaïsaṇaü  $  vasumaï bharahahŏ appijjaï

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 9:


ahavaï bharahu vi āsaṇṇa-bhavvu  $  so cintaï athiru asāru savvu
gharu pariẏaṇu jīviu sarīru vittu  $  acchaï tavacaraṇa-ṇihitta-cittu
paĩ muĕvi tāsu jaï diṇṇu rajju  $  to lakkhaṇu lakkhaĩ haṇaï ajju
ṇa vi haũ ṇa vi bharahu ṇa kekkaẏā vi  $  sattuhaṇu kumāru ṇa suppahā vi"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi papphulliẏa-muheṇa  $  vollijjaï dasaraha-taṇuruheṇa
"puttahŏ puttattaṇu ettiuṃ jĕ  $  jaṃ kulu ṇa caḍāvaï vasaṇa-puñjĕ
jaṃ ṇiẏa-jaṇaṇahŏ āṇā-viheu  $  jaṃ karaï vivakkhahŏ pāṇa-cheu
kiṃ putteṃ puṇu paẏapūraṇeṇa  $  guṇa-hīṇeṃ hiẏaẏa-visūraṇeṇa

ghattā:

lakkhaṇu ṇa vi haṇaï  $  tavu bhāvahŏ saccu paẏāsahŏ
    bhuñjaü bharahu mahi  $  haũ jāmi tāẏa vaṇa-vāsahŏ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 22, Kaḍavaka 10:


hakkāriu bharahu ṇaresareṇa  $  puṇu vuccaï ṇeha-mahābhareṇa
"taü chattaĩ taü vaïsaṇaü rajju  $  sāhevaü maĩ appaṇaü kajju"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi dummiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  dhikkāriu kekkaẏa-ṇandaṇeṇa
"tuhũ tāẏa dhigatthu dhigatthu rajju  $  māẏari dhigatthu sirĕ paḍaü vajju
ṇaü jāṇahũ mahilahã ko sahāu  $  jovvaṇa-maeṇa ṇa gaṇanti pāu
ṇaü vujjhahi tuhu mi mahā-maẏandhu  $  kiṃ rāmu muĕvi mahu paṭṭa-vandhu
sappurisa vi cañcala-citta honti  $  maṇĕ juttājuttu ṇa cintavanti

haṃsāvali-pakkha-samulhasanti  $  kallola-vola-āvatta dinti

ucchalaï valaï paḍikhalaï dhāi  $  malhanti mahāgaẏa-līla ṇāĩ

taṃ melleppiṇu goṭṭhu ravaṇṇaü  $  puṇu vaṇu païsaranti āraṇṇaü
jaṃ phala-patta-riddhi-saṃpaṇṇaü  $  tarala-tamāla-tāla-saṃchaṇṇaü
vaṇaṃ jiṇālaẏaṃ jahā sa-candaṇaṃ  $  jiṇinda-sāsaṇaṃ jahā sa-sāvaẏaṃ
mahā-raṇaṅgaṇaṃ jahā savāsaṇaṃ  $  maïnda-kandharaṃ jahā sa-kesaraṃ
ṇarinda-mandiraṃ jahā sa-māuẏaṃ  $  susañca-ṇacciẏaṃ jahā sa-tālaẏaṃ
jiṇesa-ṇhāṇaẏaṃ jahā mahāsaraṃ  $  ku-tāvase tavaṃ jahā maẏāsavaṃ
muṇinda-jīviẏaṃ jahā sa-mokkhaẏaṃ  $  mahā-ṇahaṅgaṇaṃ jahā sa-somaẏaṃ
miẏaṅka-vimvaẏaṃ jahā maẏāsaẏaṃ  $  vilāsiṇī-muhaṃ jahā mahārasaṃ

ghattā:

taṃ vaṇu mellĕvi tāĩ  $  inda-disaĕ āsaṇṇaĩ
    māsĕhĩ caüraddhehĩ  $  cittakūḍu volīṇaĩ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 24, Kaḍavaka 15:


taṃ cittaüḍu muevi turantaĩ  $  dasaürapura-sīmantaru pattaĩ
diṭṭha mahāsara kamala-karamviẏa  $  sārasa-haṃsāvali-vaga-cumviẏa
ujjāṇaĩ sohanti su-pattaĩ  $  muṇivara iva su-halāĩ su-pattaĩ
sālivaṇaĩ paṇamanti su-bhattaĩ  $  ṇaṃ sāvaẏaĩ jiṇesara-bhattaĩ
ucchuvaṇaĩ dala-dīhara-gattaĩ  $  ṇiẏa-vaï-laṅghaṇaĩ va dukalattaĩ
paṅkaẏa-ṇava-ṇīluppala-sāmĕhĩ  $  tahĩ païsantĕhĩ lakkhaṇa-rāmĕhĩ
sīrakuḍumviu maṇusu padīsiu  $  vuṇṇu kuraṅgu va vāhuttāsiu
haḍahaḍa-phuṭṭa-sīsu cala-ṇaẏaṇaü  $  pāṇakkantu samubbhaḍa-vaẏaṇaü

ghattā:

so ṇāsantu kumāreṃ  $  suravara-kari-kara-caṇḍĕhĩ
    āṇiu rāmahŏ pāsu  $  dharĕvi sa iṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ


----------  [25. pañcavīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


dhaṇuhara-hatthĕṇa  $  duvvāra-vaïri-āẏāmeṃ
sīrakuḍumviu  $  mambhīsĕvi pucchiu rāmeṃ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 1:

duddama-dāṇavinda-maddaṇa-mahāhaveṇaṃ
"bho bho kiṃ visanthulo" vuttu rāhaveṇaṃ

taṃ ṇisuṇevi pajampiu gahavaï  $  "vajjaẏaṇṇu ṇāmeṇa su-ṇaravaï
sīhoẏarahŏ bhiccu hiẏaïcchiu  $  bharahu va risahahŏ āṇavaḍicchiu
dasaüra-ṇāhu jiṇesara-bhattaü  $  piẏavaddhaṇahŏ pāsĕ uvasantaü
jiṇavara-paḍimaṅguṭṭhaĕ leppiṇu  $  aṇṇahŏ ṇavaï ṇa ṇāhu mueppiṇu
tāma ku-mantihĩ kahiu ṇarindahŏ  $  "paĩ avagaṇṇĕvi ṇavaï jiṇindahŏ"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu pahu kuddhaü  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālĕ kiẏantu viruddhaü
kovāṇala-palittu sīhoẏaru  $  ṇaṃ giri-siharĕ maïnda-kisoẏaru
"jo maĩ muĕvi aṇṇu jaẏakāraï  $  so kiṃ haẏa gaẏa rajju ṇa hāraï

ghattā:

aha kiṃ vahuĕṇa  $  kallaĕ diṇaẏarĕ atthantaĕ
      jaï ṇa vi mārami  $  to païsami jalaṇĕ jalantaĕ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 2:

païja karevi jāma pahu āhave abhaṅgo
tāma païṭṭhu coru ṇāmeṇa vijjulaṅgo

païsanteṃ raẏaṇihĕ majjhaẏālĕ  $  aliula-kajjala-saṇṇiha-tamālĕ
teṃ diṭṭhu ṇarāhiu vipphurantu  $  palaẏāṇalo vva dhagadhagadhagantu
romañca-kañcu-kañcuiẏa-dehu  $  jala-gabbhiṇu ṇaṃ gajjantu mehu
saṇṇaddha-vaddha-pariẏara-ṇivandhu  $  raṇa-bhara-dhura-dhoriu diṇṇa-khandhu
valivaṇḍa-maṇḍa-ṇiḍḍariẏa-ṇaẏaṇu  $  daṭṭhoṭṭhu suṭṭhu-vipphuriẏa-vaẏaṇu
"mārevaü riu" jampantu ema  $  khaẏa-kālĕ saṇiccharu kuviu jema
taṃ pekkhĕvi cintaï bhua-visālu  $  "kiṃ mārami ṇaṃ ṇaṃ sāmisālu
sāhammiẏa-vacchalu kiṃ karemi  $  savvāẏareṇa gampiṇu kahemi"
gaü ema bhaṇĕvi kaṇṭaïẏa-gattu  $  ṇivisaddheṃ dasaüra-ṇaẏaru pattu

ghattā:

chuḍu aruṇuggamĕ  $  so vijjulaṅgu dhāvantaü
      diṭṭhu ṇarindĕṇa  $  jasa-puñju ṇāĩ āvantaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 3:

pucchiu vajjaẏaṇṇĕṇa hasevi vijjulaṅgo
"bho bho kahĩ paẏaṭṭu vahu-vahala-pulaïẏaṅgo"

taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu vaẏaṇa-visāleṃ  $  vuccaï vajjaẏaṇṇu kusumāleṃ
"kāmaleha ṇāmeṇa vilāsiṇi  $  tuṅga-paohara jaṇa-maṇa-bhāviṇi
tahĕ āsattaü attha-vivajjiu  $  kāraṇĕ maṇi-kuṇḍalahã visajjiu
puṇu vijjāhara-karaṇu kareppiṇu  $  gaü satta vi pāẏāra kameppiṇu
kira vara-bhavaṇu paīsami jāvĕhĩ  $  païja karantu rāu suu tāvĕhĩ
haũ vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa ādaṇṇaü  $  "vaṭṭaï vajjaẏaṇṇu ucchaṇṇaü
sāhammiu jiṇa-sāsaṇa-dīvaü"  $  ema bhaṇeppiṇu valiu paḍīvaü
puṇu vi viẏaḍa-paẏa-chohĕhĩ dhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ tumhahũ pāsu parāiu

ghattā:

kiṃ olaggaĕ  $  jāṇantu vi rāẏa ma mujjhahi
      pāṇa laeppiṇu  $  jĕma ṇāsahi jĕma raṇĕ jujjhahi

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 4:

ahavaï kāĩ eṇa vahu-jampieṇa rāẏā
para-valĕ pekkhu pekkhu uṭṭhanti dhūli-chāẏā

pekkhu pekkhu āvantaü sāhaṇu  $  galagajjantu mahāgaẏa-vāhaṇu
pekkhu pekkhu hiṃsanti turaṅgama  $  ṇahaẏalĕ viulĕ bhamanti vihaṅgama
pekkhu pekkhu cindhaĩ dhuvvantaĩ  $  raha-cakkaĩ mahiẏalĕ khuppantaĩ
pekkhu pekkhu vajjantaĩ tūraĩ  $  ṇāṇāviha-ṇiṇāẏa-gambhīraĩ
pekkhu pekkhu saẏa saṅkha rasantā  $  ṇāĩ sadukkhaü saẏaṇa ruantā
pekkhu pekkhu pacalantaü ṇaravaï  $  gaha-ṇakkhatta-majjhĕ saṇi ṇāvaï"
dasaüra-ṇāhu ṇihālaï jāvĕhĩ  $  para-valu saẏalu vihāvaï tāvĕhĩ
"sāhu sāhu" to ema bhaṇeppiṇu  $  vijjulaṅgu ṇiu āliṅgeppiṇu
thiu raṇa-bhūmi pasāhĕvi jāvĕhĩ  $  saẏalu vi seṇṇu parāiu tāvĕhĩ

ghattā:

amarisa-kuddhĕhĩ  $  caüpāsĕhĩ ṇaravara-vindahĩ
      veḍḍhiu paṭṭaṇu  $  jima mahiẏalu caühĩ samuddahĩ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 5:

kiẏa gaẏa sāri-sajja pakkhariẏa vara-turaṅgā
kavaẏa-ṇivaddha joha abbhiṭṭa pulaïẏaṅgā

abbhiṭṭu jujjhu viṇha vi valāhã  $  avaropparu vaḍḍhiẏa-kalaẏalāhã
vajjanta-tūra-kolāhalāhã  $  uvasoha-caḍāviẏa-maẏagalāhã
mukkekkamekka-sara-savvalāhã  $  bhua-chiṇṇa-bhiṇṇa-vacchatthalāhã
loṭṭāviẏa-dhaẏa-mālāulāhã  $  paḍipahara-vihura-vihalaṅghalāhã
ṇiḍḍariẏa-ṇaẏaṇa-ḍasiẏāharāhã  $  asi-jhasa-sara-satti-paharaṇa-dharāhã
supamāṇa-cāva-kaḍḍhiẏa-karāhã  $  guṇa-diṭṭhi-muṭṭhi-sandhiẏa-sarāhã
dugghoṭṭa-thaṭṭa-loṭṭāvaṇāhã  $  kāẏara-ṇara-maṇa-saṃtāvaṇāhã
jaẏakārahŏ kāraṇĕ duddharāhã  $  raṇu vajjaẏaṇṇa-sīhoẏarāhã

ghattā:

vihi mi bhiḍantahĩ  $  samaraṅgaṇĕ dunduhi vajjaï
      vihi mi ṇarindahã  $  raṇĕ ekku vi jiṇaï ṇa jijjaï

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 6:

"haṇu haṇu (haṇu]" bhaṇanti hammanti āhaṇanti
paü vi ṇa osaranti māranti raṇĕ maranti

uhaẏa-valĕhĩ paḍiẏaggima-khandhaĩ  $  uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ṇaccanti kavandhaĩ
uhaẏa-valĕhĩ musumūriẏa dhaẏavaḍa  $  uhaẏa-valĕhĩ loṭṭāviẏa bhaḍa-thaḍa
uhaẏa-valĕhĩ haẏa gaẏa viṇivāiẏa  $  uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ruhiroha padhāiẏa
uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ṇittaṃsiẏa khaggaĩ  $  uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ḍevanti vihaṅgaĩ
uhaẏa-valĕhĩ ṇīsaddaĩ tūraĩ  $  uhaẏa-valaĩ paharaṇa-khara-vihuraĩ
uhaẏa-valaĩ gaẏa-dantĕhĩ bhiṇṇaĩ  $  uhaẏa-valaĩ raṇa-bhūmi-ṇisaṇṇaĩ
uhaẏa-valaĩ ruhirolliẏa-gattaĩ  $  hakka-ḍakka-lallakka muantaĩ
ema pakkhu vaṭṭaï saṅgāmahŏ  $  akkhaï sīrakuḍumviu rāmahŏ

ghattā:

taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  maṇi-maragaẏa-kiraṇa-phurantaü
      diṇṇu sa-hatthĕṇa  $  kaṇṭhaü kaḍaü kaḍisuttaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 7:

puṇu saṃcalla ve vi valaeva-vāsuevā
jāṇaï-kariṇi-sahiẏa gaẏa gilla-gaṇḍa jevā

cāva-vihattha mahattha mahāiẏa  $  sahasakūḍu jiṇabhavaṇu parāiẏa
jaṃ iṭṭāla-dhavala-chuha-paṅkiu  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaü jema akalaṅkiu
jaṃ uttuṅga-siharu sura-kittiu  $  vaṇṇa-vicitta-citta-cira-cittiu
taṃ jiṇabhavaṇu ṇiẏavi parituṭṭhaĩ  $  paẏahiṇa devi ti-vāra vaïṭṭhaĩ
tahĩ candappaha-vimvu ṇihāliu  $  jaṃ suravarataru-kusumomāliu
jaṃ ṇāgenda-surenda-ṇarindahĩ  $  vandiu muṇi-vijjāhara-vindahĩ
diṭṭhu su-sohiu sommu su-daṃsaṇu  $  aṇṇu mi seẏa-camaru siṃhāsaṇu
chatta-ttaü asou bhā-maṇḍalu  $  lacchi-vihūsiu viẏaḍa-uratthalu

ghattā:

kiṃ vahu(eṃ)-caviĕṇa  $  jagĕ ko paḍivimvu ṭhavijjaï
      puṇu vi paḍīvaü  $  jaï ṇāheṃ ṇāhuvamijjaï

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 8:

jaṃ jaga-ṇāhu diṭṭhu vala-sīẏa-lakkhaṇehĩ
tihi mi jaṇehĩ vandio viviha-vandaṇehĩ

"jaẏa risaha dusaha-parisaha-sahaṇa  $  jaẏa ajiẏa ajiẏa-vammaha-mahaṇa
jaẏa saṃbhava saṃbhava-ṇiddalaṇa  $  jaẏa ahiṇandaṇa ṇandiẏa-calaṇa
jaẏa sumaï-bhaḍārā sumaï-kara  $  paümappaha paümappaha-pavara
jaẏa sāmi supāsa su-pāsa-haṇa  $  candappaha puṇṇa-canda-vaẏaṇa
jaẏa jaẏa pupphaẏanta pupphacciẏa  $  jaẏa sīẏala sīẏala-suha-saṃciẏa
jaẏa seẏaṅkara seẏaṃsa-jiṇa  $  jaẏa vāsupujja pujjiẏa-calaṇa
jaẏa vimala-bhaḍārā vimala-muha  $  jaẏa sāmi aṇanta aṇanta-suha
jaẏa dhamma-jiṇesara dhamma-dhara  $  jaẏa santi-bhaḍārā santi-kara
jaẏa kunthu mahatthui-thua-calaṇa  $  jaẏa ara-arahanta mahanta-guṇa
jaẏa malli mahalla-malla-malaṇa  $  muṇi suvvaẏa su-vvaẏa suddha-maṇa"

ghattā:

vīsa vi jiṇavara  $  vandeppiṇu rāmu vaīsaï
      jahĩ sīhoẏaru  $  taṃ ṇilaü kumāru paīsaï

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 9:

tāma ṇarinda-vāre thira-thora-vāhu-jualo
so paḍihāru diṭṭhu saddattha-desi-kusalo

païsantu suhaḍu teṃ dhariu kema  $  ṇiẏa-samaeṃ lavaṇasamuddu jema
taṃ kuviu vīru vipphuriẏa-vaẏaṇu  $  vihuṇantu hattha ṇiḍḍariẏa-ṇaẏaṇu
maṇĕ cintaï vaïri-samudda-mahaṇu  $  "kiṃ mārami ṇaṃ ṇaṃ kavaṇu gahaṇu"
gaü ema bhaṇĕvi bhua-daṇḍa-caṇḍu  $  ṇaṃ matta-mahāgaü gilla-gaṇḍu
taṃ dasaüra-ṇaẏaru païṭṭhu kema  $  jaṇa-maṇa-mohantu aṇaṅgu jema
duvvāra-vaïri-saẏa-pāṇa-coru  $  ṇīsariu ṇāĩ kesari-kisoru
jaṃ lakkhaṇu lakkhiu rāẏa-vārĕ  $  paḍihāru vuttu "maṃ maṃ ṇivārĕ"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi païṭṭhu vīru  $  cakkavaï-lacchi-lañchiẏa-sarīru

ghattā:

dasaüra-ṇāhĕṇa  $  lakkhijjaï entaü lakkhaṇu
      risaha-jiṇindĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ dhammu ahiṃsā-lakkhaṇu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 10:

harisiu vajjaẏaṇṇu diṭṭheṇa lakkhaṇeṇaṃ
puṇu puṇu ṇeha-ṇibbharo caviu takkhaṇeṇaṃ

"kiṃ demi hatthi raha turaẏa-thaṭṭa  $  vicchuriẏa-phuriẏa-maṇi-maüḍa-paṭṭa
kiṃ vatthĕhĩ kiṃ raẏaṇehĩ kajju  $  kiṃ ṇaravara-parimiu demi rajju
kiṃ demi sa-vibbhamu piṇḍavāsu  $  kiṃ sa-suu sa-kantaü homi dāsu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi harisiẏa-maṇeṇa  $  paḍivuttu ṇarāhiu lakkhaṇeṇa
"kahĩ muṇivaru kahĩ saṃsāra-sokkhu  $  kahĩ pāva-piṇḍu kahĩ parama-mokkhu
kahĩ pāẏaü ketthu kuḍukka-vaẏaṇu  $  kahĩ kamala-saṇḍu kahĩ viulu gaẏaṇu
kahĩ maẏagalĕ halu kahĩ uṭṭĕ ghaṇṭa  $  kahĩ panthiu kahĩ raha-turaẏa-thaṭṭa
taṃ vollahi jaṃ ṇa ghaḍaï kalāĕ  $  amhaĩ vāhiẏa bhukkhaĕ khalāĕ

ghattā:

tuhũ sāhammiu  $  daẏa-dhammu karantu ṇa thakkahi
      bhoẏaṇu maggiu  $  tihũ jaṇahũ dehi jaï sakkahi"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 11:

vuccaï vajjaẏaṇṇĕṇaṃ sajala-loẏaṇeṇaṃ
"maggiu demi rajju kiṃ gahaṇu bhoẏaṇeṇaṃ"

ema bhaṇeppiṇu aṇṇuccāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ rāmahŏ pāsu parāiu
khaṇĕ kaccola thāla oẏāriẏa  $  pariẏala-sippi-saṅkha vitthāriẏa

ujjāṇaṃ piva suṭṭhu suandhaü  $  siddhahŏ siddhi-suhaṃ piva siddhaü

dhavala-ppaüra-kūra-pheṇujjala  $  pejjāvatta dinti cala cañcala
ghiẏa-kallola-vola pavahantī  $  timmaṇa-toẏa-tusāra muantī

ghattā:

      iṭṭha-kalattu va  $  taṃ bhuttu jahicchaĕ bhoẏaṇu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 12:

bhuñjĕvi rāmacandĕṇaṃ pabhaṇio kumāro
"bhoẏaṇu ṇa hoi ĕu uvaẏāra-garua-bhāro

paḍiuvaẏāru kiṃ pi viṇṇāsahi  $  ubhaẏa-valĕhĩ appāṇu pagāsahi
taṃ sīhoẏaru gampi ṇivārahi  $  addheṃ rajjahŏ sandhi samārahi
vuccaï "bharaheṃ dūu visajjiu  $  dujjaü vajjaẏaṇṇu aparajjiu
teṇa samāṇu kavaṇu kira viggahu  $  jeṃ āẏāmiu samarĕ pariggahu""
taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu riu-maddaṇu  $  rāmahŏ calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu jaṇaddaṇu
"ajju kiẏatthu ajju haũ dhaṇṇaü  $  jaṃ āesu deva paĩ diṇṇaü"
ema bhaṇevi paẏaṭṭu mahāiu  $  gaü sīhoẏara-bhavaṇu parāiu
matta-gaïndu jema galagajjĕvi  $  taṃ paḍihāru karaggeṃ tajjĕvi

ghattā:
tiṇa-samu maṇṇĕvi  $  atthāṇu saẏalu avagaṇṇĕvi
      païṭhu bhaẏāṇaṇu  $  gaẏa-jūhĕ jema pañcāṇaṇu
