START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 13:

amarisa-kuddhaeṇa vahu-bhariẏa-macchareṇaṃ
sīhoẏaru paloio jiha saṇicchareṇaṃ

kovāṇala-saẏa-jāla-jalanteṃ  $  puṇu puṇu joiu ṇāĩ kaẏanteṃ
jaü jaü lakkhaṇu lakkhaï saṃmuhu  $  taü taü simiru thāi heṭṭhā-muhu
cintiu "ko vi mahā-valu dīsaï  $  ṇaü paṇivāu karaï ṇaü vaïsaï"
taṃ ji ṇimittu laevi kumāreṃ  $  vuttu rāu "kiṃ vahu-vitthāreṃ
ema visajjiu bharaha-ṇarindeṃ  $  karaï keli ko samaü maïndeṃ
ko sura-kari-visāṇa uppāḍaï  $  mandarasela-siṅgu ko pāḍaï
ko 'maẏavāhu karaggeṃ ḍhaṅkaï  $  vajjaẏaṇṇu ko mārĕvi sakkaï
sandhi karahŏ paribhuñjahŏ meiṇi  $  hiẏaẏa-suhaṅkari jiha vara-kāmiṇi

ghattā:

ahavaï ṇaravaï  $  jaï rajjahŏ addhu ṇa icchahi
      to samaraṅgaṇĕ  $  sara-dhoraṇi enti paḍicchahi"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 14:

lakkhaṇa-vaẏaṇa-dūsio ahara-vipphuranto
"maru maru māri māri haṇu haṇu" bhaṇanto

uṭṭhiu pahu karavāla-vihatthaü  $  "acchaü tāma bharahu vīsatthaü
dūvahŏ dūvattaṇu darisāvahŏ  $  chindahŏ ṇāsu sīsu muṇḍāvahŏ
luṇahŏ hattha vicchārĕvi dhāḍahŏ  $  gaddahĕ caḍiẏaü ṇaẏarĕ bhamāḍahŏ"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi samuṭṭhiẏa ṇaravara  $  galagajjanta ṇāĩ ṇava jalahara
"haṇu haṇu haṇu" bhaṇanta vahu-macchara  $  ṇaṃ kali-kāla-kiẏanta-saṇicchara
ṇaṃ ṇiẏa-samaẏa-cukka raẏaṇāẏara  $  ṇaṃ ummeṭṭha padhāiẏa kuñjara
karĕ karavālu ko vi uggāmaï  $  bhīsaṇa ko vi gaẏāsaṇi bhāmaï
ko vi bhaẏaṅkaru cāu caḍāvaï  $  sāmihĕ bhiccattaṇu darisāvaï

ghattā:

eva ṇarindĕhĩ  $  phuriẏāhara-bhiuḍi-karālĕhĩ
      veḍhiu lakkhaṇu  $  pañcāṇaṇu jema siẏālĕhĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 15:

sūru va jalaharehĩ jaṃ veḍhio kumāro
uṭṭhiu dhara dalantu duvvāra-vaïri-vāro

rokkaï valaï dhāi riu rumbhaï  $  ṇaṃ kesari-kisoru paviẏambhaï
ṇaṃ suravara-gaïndu maẏa-vimbhalu  $  sira-kamalaĩ toḍantu mahā-valu
daramalantu maṇi-maüḍa ṇarindahũ  $  sīhu paḍhukkiu jema gaïndahũ
kŏ vi musumūriu cūriu pāĕhĩ  $  ko vi ṇisumbhiu ṭakkara-ghāĕhĩ
ko vi karaggĕhĩ gaẏaṇĕ bhamāḍiu  $  ko vi rasantu mahīẏalĕ pāḍiu
ko vi jujjhaviu mesa-jhaḍakkaĕ  $  kŏ vi kaḍuvāviu hakka-daḍakkaĕ
gaẏavara-laggaṇa-khambhuppāḍĕvi  $  gaẏaṇa-maggĕ puṇu bhuahĩ bhamāḍĕvi
ṇāĩ jameṇa daṇḍu pammukkaü  $  vaïrihĩ ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālu paḍhukkaü

ghattā:

ālaṇa-khambhĕṇa  $  bhāmanteṃ puhaï bhamāḍiẏa
      teṇa paḍantĕṇa  $  dasa sahasa ṇarindahũ pāḍiẏa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 16:

jaṃ paḍivakkhu saẏalu ṇiddaliu lakkhaṇeṇaṃ
gaẏavarĕ paṭṭavandhaṇe caḍiu takkhaṇeṇaṃ

ahimuhu sīhoẏaru saṃcalliu  $  palaẏa-samuddu ṇāĩ utthalliu
seṇṇāvatta dintu gajjantaü  $  paharaṇa-toẏa-tusāra-muantaü
tuṅga-turaṅga-taraṅga-samāulu  $  matta-mahāgaẏa-ghaḍa-velāulu
ubbhiẏa-dhavala-chatta-pheṇujjalu  $  dhaẏa-kallola-calanta-mahāvalu
riu-samuddu jaṃ diṭṭhu bhaẏaṅkaru  $  lakkhaṇu ḍhukku ṇāĩ giri mandaru
calaï valaï paribhamaï su-paccalu  $  ṇāĩ vilāsiṇi-gaṇu calu cañcalu
geṇhĕvi pahaü ṇarindu ṇarindeṃ  $  turaeṃ turaü gaïndu gaïndeṃ
rahieṃ rahiu rahaṅgu rahaṅgeṃ  $  chatteṃ chattu dhaẏaggu dhaẏaggeṃ

ghattā:

jaü jaü lakkhaṇu  $  parisakkaï bhiuḍi-bhaẏaṅkaru
      taü taü dīsaï  $  mahi-maṇḍalu ruṇḍa-ṇirantaru


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 17:

jaṃ riu-uahi mahiu somitti-mandareṇaṃ
sīhoẏaru padhāio samaü kuñjareṇaṃ

abbhiṭṭu jujjhu viṇṇi vi jaṇāhã  $  ujjeṇi-ṇarāhiva-lakkhaṇāhã
duvvāra-vaïri-geṇhaṇa-maṇāhã  $  uggāmiẏa-bhāmiẏa-paharaṇāhã
maẏamatta-gaïnduddāraṇāhã  $  paḍivakkha-pakkha-samghāraṇāhã
suravahua-sattha-tosāvaṇāhã  $  sīhoẏara-lakkhaṇa-ṇaravarāhã
 $  bhua-daṇḍa-caṇḍa-harisiẏa-maṇāhã
etthantarĕ sīhoẏara-dhareṇa  $  urĕ pelliu lakkhaṇu gaẏavareṇa
rahasubbhaḍu pulaẏa-visaṭṭa-dehu  $  ṇaṃ sukkeṃ khīliu sa-jalu mehu
teṃ levi bhuaggeṃ tharaharanta  $  uppāḍiẏa dantihĕ ve vi danta
kaḍuāviu maẏagalu maṇĕṇa taṭṭhu  $  vivarammuhu pāṇa laevi ṇaṭṭhu

ghattā:

tāma kumārĕṇa  $  vijjāhara-karaṇu kareppiṇu
      dhariu ṇarāhiu  $  gaẏa-matthaĕ pāu thaveppiṇu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 18:

ṇaravaï jīva-gāhi jaṃ dhariu lakkhaṇeṇaṃ
keṇa vi vajjaẏaṇṇahŏ kahiu takkhaṇeṇaṃ

"he ṇaraṇāha-ṇāha acchariẏaü  $  para-valu pekkhu kema jajjariẏaü
ruṇḍa-ṇirantaru soṇiẏa-cacciu  $  ṇāṇāviha-vihaṅga-pariẏañciu
ko vi paẏaṇḍa-vīru valavantaü  $  bhamaï kiẏantu va riu-jagaḍantaü
gaẏa-ghaḍa bhaḍa-thaḍa suhaḍa vahantaü  $  kari-sira-kamala-saṇḍa toḍantaü
rokkaï kokkaï ḍhukkaï thakkaï  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālu samarĕ parisakkaï
bhiuḍi-bhaẏaṅkaru kuruḍu samaccharu  $  thiu avaloẏaṇĕ ṇāĩ saṇiccharu
ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ gaṇu kiṃ gandhavu  $  kiṃ pacchaṇṇu ko vi taü vandhavu
kiṇṇaru kiṃ māruvu vijjāharu  $  kiṃ vambhāṇu bhāṇu hari halaharu
teṇa mahāhavĕ māṇa-maïndahã  $  viṇivāiẏa dasa sahasa ṇarindahã
aṇṇu vi dujjaü macchara-bhariẏaü  $  jīva-gāhi sīhoẏaru dhariẏaü

ghattā:

ekkeṃ hontĕṇa  $  valu saẏalu vi āhindoliu
      mandara-vīḍhĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ sāẏara-salilu viroliu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 19:

taṃ ṇisuṇevi ko vi paritosio maṇeṇaṃ
ko vi ṇiehũ laggu uddheṇa jampaṇeṇaṃ

ko vi pajampiu macchara-bhariẏaü  $  "caṅgaü jaṃ sīhoẏaru dhariẏaü
jo mārevaü vaïri sa-hattheṃ  $  so parivaddhu pāu para-hattheṃ
vandhava-saẏaṇahĩ parimiu ajju  $  vajjaẏaṇṇu aṇuhuñjaü rajju"
ko vi viruddhu puṇu puṇu ṇindaï  $  "dhammu muevi pāu kiṃ ṇandaï"
ko vi bhaṇaï "jeṃ maggiu bhoẏaṇu  $  dīsaï so jjĕ ṇāĩ ĕhu vambhaṇu"
tāma kumāreṃ riu ukkhandhĕvi  $  coru va rāuleṇa ṇiu vandhĕvi
sālaṅkāru sa-doru sa-ṇeuru  $  dummaṇu dīṇa-vaẏaṇu anteuru
dhāiu aṃsu-jalolliẏa-ṇaẏaṇaü  $  hima-haẏa-kamalavaṇu va komāṇaü

ghattā:

kesa-visanthulu  $  muha-kāẏaru karuṇu ruantaü
     thiu caüpāsĕhĩ  $  bhattāra-bhikkha maggantaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 25, Kaḍavaka 20:

tāma maṇeṇa saṅkiẏā rāhavassa ghariṇī
ṇaṃ bhaẏa-bhīẏa kāṇaṇe vuṇṇuẏaṇṇa hariṇī

"pekkhu pekkhu valu valu āvantaü  $  sāẏara-salilu jema gajjantaü
laï dhaṇuharu ma acchi ṇiccintaü  $  mañchuḍu lakkhaṇu raṇĕ atthantaü"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇivvūḍha-mahāhavu  $  jāma cāu kira giṇhaï rāhavu
tāma kumāru diṭṭhu sahũ ṇārihĩ  $  parimiu hatthi jema gaṇiẏārihĩ
taṃ pekkheppiṇu suhaḍa-ṇisāmeṃ  $  bhīẏa sīẏa mambhīsiẏa rāmeṃ
"pekkhu kema sīhoẏaru vaddhaü  $  sīheṇa va siẏālu uṭṭhaddhaü
eva volla kira vaṭṭaï jāvĕhĩ  $  lakkhaṇu pāsu parāiu tāvĕhĩ
calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu viẏāvaḍa-matthaü  $  bhaviu va jiṇahŏ kiẏañjali-hatthaü

ghattā:

"sāhu" bhaṇantĕṇa  $  surabhavaṇa-viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmeṃ
      sa iṃ bhu a-phalihĕhĩ  $  avaruṇḍiu lakkhaṇu rāmeṃ


----------  [26. chavvīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ  $  dhavalujjala-kasaṇa-sarīraĩ
ekkahĩ miliẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ gaṅgā-jaüṇahĕ ṇīraĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 26, Kaḍavaka 1:


avaropparu gañjolliẏa-gattĕhĩ  $  sarahasu sāiu devi turantĕhĩ
sīhoẏaru ṇamantu vaïsāriu  $  takkhaṇĕ vajjaẏaṇṇu hakkāriu
sahũ ṇaravara-jaṇeṇa ṇīsariẏaü  $  ṇāĩ purandaru sura-pariẏariẏaü
rehaï vijjulaṅgu aṇupacchaĕ  $  paḍivā-indu va sūrahŏ pacchaĕ
taṃ iṭṭāla-dhūli-dhua-dhavalaü  $  sahasakūḍu gaẏa patta jiṇālaü
caüdisu paẏahiṇa devi tivāraĕ  $  puṇu ahivandaṇa karaï bhaḍāraĕ
taṃ piẏavaddhaṇa-muṇi paṇaveppiṇu  $  valahŏ pāsĕ thiu kusalu bhaṇeppiṇu
dasaüra-pura-paramesaru rāmeṃ  $  sāhukkāriu suhaḍa-ṇisāmeṃ

ghattā:

"saccaü ṇaravaï  $  micchatta-sarĕhĩ ṇaü bhijjahi
diḍha-sammattĕṇa  $  para tujjhu jĕ tuhũ uvamijjahi"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 26, Kaḍavaka 2:


taṃ ṇisuṇevi paẏampiu rāeṃ  $  "eu savvu mahu tumha pasāeṃ"
puṇu vi tiloẏa-viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmeṃ  $  vijjulaṅgu pomāiu rāmeṃ
"bho diḍha-kaḍhiṇa-viẏaḍa-vacchatthala  $  sāhu sāhu sāhammiẏa-vacchala
sundaru kiu jaṃ ṇaravaï rakkhiu  $  raṇĕ acchantu ṇa paĩ uvvekkhiu"
to etthantarĕ vuttu kumāreṃ  $  "jampieṇa kiṃ vahu-vitthāreṃ
he dasaüra-ṇarinda visagaï-sua  $  jiṇavara-calaṇa-kamala-phullandhua
jo khalu khuddu pisuṇu macchariẏaü  $  acchaï ĕhu sīhoẏaru dhariẏaü
kiṃ mārami kiṃ appuṇu mārahi  $  ṇaṃ to daẏa kari sandhi samārahi

ghattā:

āṇa-vaḍicchaü  $  ĕhu evahĩ bhiccu tuhāraü
risaha-jiṇindahŏ  $  seẏaṃsu va pesaṇaẏāraü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 26, Kaḍavaka 3:


pabhaṇaï vajjaẏaṇṇu vahu-jāṇaü  $  "haũ pāikku puṇu vi ĕhu rāṇaü
ṇavara ekku vaü maĩ pālevaü  $  jiṇu mellevi aṇṇu ṇa ṇamevaü"
taṃ ṇisuṇeviṇu lakkhaṇa-rāmĕhĩ  $  suravara-bhavaṇa-viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmĕhĩ
dasaürapura-ujjeṇi-pahāṇā  $  vajjaẏaṇṇa-sīhoẏara-rāṇā
veṇṇi vi hattheṃ hatthu dharāviẏa  $  sarahasu kaṇṭhaggahaṇu karāviẏa
addhoaddhiĕ mahi bhuñjāviẏa  $  aṇṇu vi jiṇavara-dhammu suṇāviẏa
kāmiṇi kāmaleha kokkāviẏa  $  vijjulaṅgahŏ karaẏalĕ lāviẏa
diṇṇaĩ maṇi-kuṇḍalaĩ phurantaĩ  $  candāiccahũ teu harantaĩ
tāma kumāru vuttu vikkhāĕhĩ  $  vajjaẏaṇṇa-sīhoẏara-rāĕhĩ
"ṇava-kuvalaẏa-dala-dīhara-ṇaẏaṇahũ  $  maẏagala-gaï-gamaṇahũ sasi-vaẏaṇahũ
ucca-ṇilāḍālaṅkiẏa-tilaẏahũ  $  vahu-sohagga-bhogga-guṇa-ṇilaẏahũ
vibbhama-bhāubbhiṇṇa-sarīrahũ  $  taṇu-majjhahũ thaṇa-hara-gambhīrahũ

ghattā:

ahiṇava-rūvahũ  $  lāẏaṇṇa-vaṇṇa-saṃpuṇṇahũ
laï bho lakkhaṇa  $  vara tiṇṇi saẏaĩ tuhũ kaṇṇahũ"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 26, Kaḍavaka 4:


taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu dasaraha-ṇandaṇu  $  ema pajampiu hasĕvi jaṇaddaṇu
"acchaü ti-ẏaṇu tāma vilavantaü  $  bhisiṇi-ṇihāu va raviẏara-chittaü
maĩ jāevaü dāhiṇa-desahŏ  $  koṅkaṇa-malaẏa-paṇḍi-uddesahŏ
tahĩ valahaddahŏ ṇilaü gavesami  $  pacchaĕ pāṇiggahaṇu karesamiḥ
ema kumāru pajampiu jaṃ je  $  maṇĕ visaṇṇu kaṇṇāẏaṇu taṃ je
daḍḍhu himeṇa va ṇaliṇi-samuccaü  $  muhĕ muhĕ ṇāĩ diṇṇu masi-kuñcaü
jāma tāma tūrĕhĩ vajjantĕhĩ  $  vivihĕhĩ maṅgalehĩ gijjantĕhĩ
vandiṇehĩ "jaẏa jaẏa" pabhaṇantĕhĩ  $  khujjaẏa-vāmaṇehĩ ṇaccantĕhĩ
sīẏa sa-lakkhaṇu valu païsāriu  $  vīẏā-indu va jaẏajaẏakāriu
tahĩ ṇivaseppiṇu ṇaẏarĕ ravaṇṇaĕ  $  addharatti-avasarĕ paḍivaṇṇaĕ

ghattā:

vala-ṇārāẏaṇa  $  gaẏa dasaüru muĕvi mahāiẏa
cettahŏ māsahŏ  $  taṃ kuvvara-ṇaẏaru parāiẏa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 26, Kaḍavaka 5:


kuvvara-ṇaẏaru parāiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  phagguṇa-māsu pavoliu tāvĕhĩ
païṭṭhu vasanta-rāu āṇandeṃ  $  koila-kalaẏala-maṅgala-saddeṃ
ali-mihuṇĕhĩ vandiṇĕhĩ paḍhantĕhĩ  $  varahiṇa-vāvaṇehĩ ṇaccantĕhĩ
andolā-saẏa-toraṇa-vārĕhĩ  $  ḍhukku vasantu aṇeẏa-paẏārĕhĩ
katthaï cūa-vaṇaĩ pallaviẏaĩ  $  ṇava-kisalaẏa-phala-phullabbhahiẏaĩ
katthaï giri-siharaĩ vicchāẏaĩ  $  khala-muhaĩ va masi-vaṇṇaĩ ṇāẏaĩ
katthaï māhava-māsahŏ meiṇi  $  piẏa-viraheṇa va sūsaï kāmiṇi
katthaï gijjaï vajjaï mandalu  $  ṇara-mihuṇehĩ paṇacciu gondalu
taṃ tahŏ ṇaẏarahŏ uttara-pāsĕhĩ  $  jaṇa-maṇaharu joẏaṇa-uddesĕhĩ
diṭṭhu vasantatilaü ujjāṇaü  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaü jema a-pamāṇaü

ghattā:

suhalu suẏandhaü  $  ḍollantu viẏāvaḍa-matthaü
aggaĕ rāmahŏ  $  ṇaṃ thiu kusumañjali-hatthaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 26, Kaḍavaka 6:


tahĩ uvavaṇĕ païsĕvi viṇu kheveṃ  $  pabhaṇiu vāsuevu valaeveṃ
"bho asurāri-vaïri-musumūraṇa  $  dasaraha-vaṃsa-maṇoraha-pūraṇa
lakkhaṇa kahi mi gavesahi taṃ jalu  $  sajjaṇa-hiẏaü jema jaṃ ṇimmalu
dūrāgamaṇeṃ sīẏa tisāiẏa  $  hima-haẏa-ṇava-ṇaliṇi va vicchāiẏa"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vaḍa-duma-sovāṇĕhĩ  $  caḍiu mahārisi vva guṇathāṇĕhĩ
tāva mahāsaru diṭṭhu ravaṇṇaü  $  ṇāṇāviha-taruvara-saṃchaṇṇaü
sārasa-haṃsa-kuñca-vaga-cumviu  $  ṇava-kuvalaẏa-dala-kamala-karamviu
taṃ pekkhevi kumāru padhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ taṃ sara-tīru parāiu

ghattā:

païṭhu mahāvalu  $  jalĕ kamala-saṇḍu toḍantaü
māṇasa-saravarĕ  $  ṇaṃ sura-gaïndu kīlantaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 26, Kaḍavaka 7:


lakkhaṇu jalu āḍohaï jāvĕhĩ  $  kuvvara-ṇaẏara-ṇarāhiu tāvĕhĩ
chuḍu chuḍu vaṇa-kīlaĕ ṇīsariẏaü  $  maẏaṇa-divasĕ ṇaravara-pariẏariẏaü
taruvarĕ taruvarĕ mañcu ṇivaddhaü  $  mañcĕ mañcĕ thiu jaṇu samaladdhaü

mañcĕ mañcĕ jaṇu rasaẏa-vihatthaü  $  ghummaï ghulaï viẏāvaḍa-matthaü

"siẏa lakkhaṇu valu paccakkhu jahĩ  $  kaü saüṇa-visaüṇĕhĩ gaṇṇu tahĩ"

pasaraï su-kaïhĕ kavvu jiha  $  meha-jālu gaẏaṇaṅgaṇĕ tāvĕhĩ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 1:

pasaraï jema saddu sura-tūrahŏ  $  pasaraï jema rāsi ṇahĕ sūrahŏ
pasaraï jema davaggi vaṇantarĕ  $  pasaraï meha-jālu tiha amvarĕ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 3:


jala-vāṇāsaṇi-ghāẏahĩ ghāiu  $  gimbha-ṇarāhiu raṇĕ viṇivāiu
daddura raḍĕvi lagga ṇaṃ sajjaṇa  $  ṇaṃ ṇaccanti mora khala dujjaṇa
ṇaṃ pūranti sariu akkandeṃ  $  ṇaṃ kaï kilikilanti āṇandeṃ
ṇaṃ parahuẏa vimukka ugghoseṃ  $  ṇaṃ varahiṇa lavanti parioseṃ
ṇaṃ saravara vahu-aṃsu-jalolliẏa  $  ṇaṃ girivara hariseṃ gañjolliẏa
ṇaṃ uṇhavia davaggi vioeṃ  $  ṇaṃ ṇacciẏa mahi viviha-viṇoeṃ
ṇaṃ atthamiu divāẏaru dukkheṃ  $  ṇaṃ païsaraï raẏaṇi saĩ sukkheṃ
ratta-patta taru pavaṇākampiẏa  $  "keṇa vi vahiu gimbhu" ṇaṃ jampiẏa

ghattā:

tehaĕ kālĕ bhaẏāuraĕ  $  veṇṇi mi vāsueva-valaeva
    taruvara-mūlĕ sa-sīẏa thiẏa  $  jogu laeviṇu muṇivara jema


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 4:


hari-vala rukkha-mūlĕ thiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  gaẏamuhu jakkhu paṇāsĕvi tāvĕhĩ
gaü ṇiẏa-ṇivahŏ pāsu vevantaü  $  "deva deva paritāhi" bhaṇantaü
"ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ suravara kiṃ ṇara  $  kiṃ vijjāhara-gaṇa kiṃ kiṇṇara
dhaṇudhara dhīra paḍāẏaü ubbhĕvi  $  sutta mahāraü ṇilaü ṇirumbhĕvi"
taṃ ṇisuṇeviṇu vaẏaṇu mahāiu  $  pūvaṇu mambhīsantu padhāiu
viñjha-mahīhara-siharahŏ āiu  $  takkhaṇĕ taṃ uddesu parāiu
tāma ṇihāliẏa veṇṇi vi duddhara  $  sāẏara-vajjāvatta-dhaṇuddhara
avahī-ṇāṇu paüñjaï jāvĕhĩ  $  lakkhaṇa-rāma muṇiẏa maṇĕ tāvĕhĩ

ghattā:

pekkhĕvi hari-vala ve vi jaṇa  $  pūvaṇa-jakkheṃ jaẏa-jasa-luddheṃ
    maṇi-kañcaṇa-dhaṇa-jaṇa-paüru  $  paṭṭaṇu kiu ṇimisaddhahŏ addheṃ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 5:


puṇu rāmaüri paghosiẏa loeṃ  $  ṇaṃ ṇārihĕ aṇuhariẏa ṇioeṃ
dīhara-pantha-pasāriẏa-calaṇī  $  kusuma-ṇiẏattha-vattha-sāharaṇī
khāiẏa-tivali-taraṅga-vihūsiẏa  $  goura-thaṇahara-sihara-padīsiẏa
viulārāma-roma-romañciẏa  $  indagova-saẏa-kuṅkuma-añciẏa
girivara-sariẏa-pasāriẏa-vāhī  $  jala-pheṇāvali-valaẏa-saṇāhī
saravara-ṇaẏaṇa-ghaṇañjaṇa-añjiẏa  $  suradhaṇu-bhaüha-padīsiẏa-pañjiẏa
deula-vaẏaṇa-kamalu dariseppiṇu  $  vara-maẏalañchaṇa-tilaü chuheppiṇu
ṇāĩ ṇihālaï diṇaẏara-dappaṇu  $  ema viṇimmiu saẏalu vi paṭṭaṇu
vaïsĕvi valahŏ pāsĕ vīsatthaü  $  ālāvaï ālāvaṇi-hatthaü

ghattā:

ekkavīsa-vara-mucchaṇaü  $  satta vi sara ti-gāma darisantaü
    "vujjhi bhaḍārā dāsarahi  $  suppahāu taü" eva bhaṇantaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 6:


suppahāu uccāriu jāvĕhĩ  $  rāmeṃ valĕvi paloiu tāvĕhĩ
diṭṭhu ṇaẏaru jaṃ jakkha-samāriu  $  ṇāĩ ṇahaṅgaṇu sūra-vihūsiu
sa-ghaṇu sa-kumbhu sa-savaṇu sa-saṅkaü  $  sa-vuhu sa-tāraü sa-guru-sasaṅkaü
puṇu vi paḍīvaü ṇaẏaru ṇihāliu  $  ṇāĩ mahāvaṇu kusumomāliu
ṇāĩ sukaïhĕ kavvu paẏaïttiu  $  ṇāĩ ṇarinda-cittu vahu-cittaü
ṇāĩ seṇṇu rahavarahã amukkaü  $  ṇāĩ vivāha-gehu sa-caükkaü
ṇāĩ suraü caccari-cariẏālaü  $  ṇāvaï ḍimbhaü ahiẏa-chuhālaü
aha kiṃ vaṇṇieṇa khaṇĕ je khaṇĕ  $  tihuaṇĕ ṇatthi jaṃ pi taṃ paṭṭaṇĕ

ghattā:

taṃ pekkheppiṇu rāmaüri  $  bhuaṇa-sahāsa-viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmahŏ
    mañchuḍu ujjhāuri-ṇaẏaru  $  jāẏa mahanta bhanti maṇĕ rāmahŏ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 7:


jaṃ kiu vimbhaü sāsaẏa-lakkheṃ  $  vuttu ṇaveppiṇu pūaṇa-jakkheṃ
"tumhāraü vaṇa-vasaṇu ṇieppiṇu  $  kiu maĩ paṭṭaṇu bhāu dhareppiṇu
ema bhaṇevi suvitthaẏa-ṇāmahŏ  $  diṇṇa sughosa vīṇa teṃ rāmahŏ
diṇṇu maüḍu sāharaṇu vilevaṇu  $  maṇi-kuṇḍala kaḍisuttaü kaṅkaṇu
puṇu vi pajampiu jakkha-pahāṇaü  $  "haũ taü bhiccu deva tuhũ rāṇaü"
eva volla ṇimmāiẏa jāvĕhĩ  $  kavileṃ ṇaẏaru ṇihāliu tāvĕhĩ
jaṇa-maṇaharu sura-sagga-samāṇaü  $  vāsavapurahŏ vi khaṇḍaï māṇaü
taṃ pekkhĕvi āsaṅkiu vambhaṇu  $  "kahĩ vitthiṇṇu raṇṇu kahĩ paṭṭaṇu"

ghattā:

tharaharantu bhaẏa-māruĕṇa  $  samihaü ghivĕvi paṇāsaï jāvĕhĩ
    mambhīsanti miẏaṅkamuhi  $  puraü sa-māẏa jakkhi thiẏa tāvĕhĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 8:


"he diẏavara caüveẏa-pahāṇā  $  kiṇṇa muṇahi rāmaüri aẏāṇā
jaṇa-maṇa-vallahu rāhava-rāṇaü  $  matta-gaïndu va pagaliẏa-dāṇaü
takkuva-bhamara-saehĩ ṇa muccaï  $  dei asesu vi jaṃ jasu ruccaï
jo ghaĩ jiṇavara-ṇāmu laei  $  tahŏ kaḍḍheppiṇu pāṇaĩ dei
ĕu jaṃ vāsava-disaĕ visālaü  $  dīsaï tihuaṇatilaü jiṇālaü
tahĩ jo gampi karaï jaẏakāru  $  paṭṭaṇĕ ṇavari tāsu païsāru"
taṃ ṇisuṇeppiṇu diẏavaru dhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ jiṇavara-bhavaṇu parāiu
taṃ cārittasūru muṇi vandĕvi  $  viṇaü karĕvi appāṇaü ṇindĕvi

ghattā:

pucchiu muṇivaru diẏavarĕṇa  $  "dāṇahŏ kāraṇĕ viṇu sammatteṃ
    dhammeṃ laïeṃ kavaṇu phalu  $  eu deva mahu akkhi paẏatteṃ"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 9:


muṇivaru kahĕvi laggu "viulāĩ  $  kiṃ jaṇĕ ṇa ṇiẏahi dhammaphalāĩ
dhammeṃ bhaḍa-thaḍa haẏa gaẏa sandaṇa  $  pāveṃ maraṇa-vioẏakkandaṇa
dhammeṃ saggu bhoggu sohaggu  $  pāveṃ roggu sogu dohaggu
dhammeṃ riddhi viddhi siẏa saṃpaẏa  $  pāveṃ attha-hīṇa ṇara viddaẏa
dhammeṃ kaḍaẏa-maüḍa-kaḍisuttā  $  pāveṃ ṇara dāliddeṃ bhuttā
dhammeṃ rajju karanti ṇiruttā  $  pāveṃ para-pesaṇa-saṃjuttā
dhammeṃ vara-pallaṅkeṃ suttā  $  pāveṃ tiṇa-saṃthārĕ vibhuttā
dhammeṃ ṇara devattaṇu pattā  $  pāveṃ ṇaraẏa-ghorĕ saṃkantā
dhammeṃ ṇara ramanti vara-vilaẏaü  $  pāveṃ dūhaviu duha-ṇilaẏaü
dhammeṃ sundaru aṅgu ṇivaddhaü  $  pāveṃ paṅgulaü vi vahirandhaü

ghattā:

dhamma-pāva-kappaddumahũ  $  āẏaĩ jasa-avajasa-vahulāiṃ
      veṇṇi mi asuha-suhaṅkaraĩ  $  jāĩ piẏaĩ laï tāĩ phalāiṃ"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 10:


muṇivara-vaẏaṇĕhĩ diẏavaru vāsiu  $  laïu dhammu jo jiṇavarĕ bhāsiu
pañcāṇuvvaẏa levi padhāiu  $  ṇiẏa-mandiru ṇiviseṇa parāiu
gampiṇu puṇu sommahĕ vajjariẏaü  $  "ajju mahantu diṭṭhu accariẏaü
kahĩ vaṇu kahĩ paṭṭaṇu kahĩ rāṇaü  $  kahĩ muṇi diṭṭhu aṇeẏaĩ jāṇaü
kahĩ maï kahĩ laddhaĩ jiṇa-vaẏaṇaĩ  $  vahireṃ kaṇṇa 'ndheṇa va ṇaẏaṇaĩ"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi somma gañjolliẏa  $  "jāhũ ṇāha tahĩ ema pavolliẏa
puṇu saṃcallaĩ ve vi turantaĩ  $  tihuẏaṇatilaü jiṇālaü pattaĩ
sāhu ṇaveppiṇu pāsĕ ṇiviṭṭhaĩ  $  dhammu suṇeppiṇu ṇaẏarĕ païṭṭhaĩ

ghattā:

diṭṭhu ṇarindatthāṇu ṇahu  $  jāṇaï-mandāiṇi-paricaḍḍiu
    ṇara-ṇakkhattahĩ pariẏariu  $  hari-vala-canda-divāẏara-maṇḍiu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 11:


hari atthāṇa-maggĕ jaṃ diṭṭhaü  $  diẏavaru pāṇa laevi paṇaṭṭhaü
ṇaṭṭhu kuraṅgu va vāraṇavārahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu jiṇindu va bhava-saṃsārahŏ
ṇaṭṭhu miẏaṅku va abbhapisāẏahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu davaggi va ṇīra-ṇihāẏahŏ
ṇaṭṭhu bhuaṅgu va garuḍa-vihaṅgahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu kharo vva matta-māẏaṅgahŏ
ṇaṭṭhu aṇaṅgu va sāsaẏa-gamaṇahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu mahāghaṇo vva khara-pavaṇahŏ
ṇaṭṭhu mahīharo vva sura-kulisahŏ  $  ṇaṭṭhu turaṅgamo vva jama-mahisahŏ
tiha ṇāsantu padīsiu diẏavaru  $  mambhīsantu padhāiu siriharu
maṇḍa dharevi kareṇa karaggaĕ  $  gampi ghittu valaevahŏ aggaĕ
dukkhu dukkhu appāṇaü dhīrĕvi  $  saẏalu mahabbhaü maṇĕ avaherĕvi
duddama-dāṇavinda-vala-maddahŏ  $  puṇu āsīsa diṇṇa valahaddahŏ

ghattā:

"jema samuddu mahājalĕṇa  $  jema jiṇesaru sukkiẏa-kammeṃ
      canda-kunda-jasa-ṇimmalĕṇa  $  tiha tuhũ vaddhu ṇarāhiva dhammeṃ"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 28, Kaḍavaka 12:


to etthantarĕ para-vala-maddaṇu  $  kahakaha-saddeṃ hasiu jaṇaddaṇu
"bhavaṇĕ païṭṭha tuhāraĕ jaïẏahũ  $  paĩ avagaṇṇĕvi ghalliẏa taïẏahũ
etthu kālĕ puṇu diẏavaru kīsā  $  viṇaü karĕvi puṇu diṇṇa asīsā"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi bhaṇaï veẏāẏaru  $  "atthahŏ ko ṇa vi karaï mahāẏaru
jiha āṇandu jaṇaï sīẏālaĕ  $  tiha ki ṇa ruccaï ravi uṇhālaĕ
kāla-vaseṇa kālu vi sahevaü  $  etthu ṇa harisu visāu karevaü
atthu vilāsiṇi-jaṇa-maṇa-vallahu  $  attha-vihūṇaü vuccaï "ghallahu"
atthu viẏaḍḍhu atthu guṇavantaü  $  attha-vihūṇu bhamaï maggantaü
atthu aṇaṅgu atthu jagĕ sūhaü  $  attha-vihūṇu dīṇu ṇaru dūhaü
atthu saïcchiu bhuñjaï rajju  $  attha-vihūṇeṃ kiṃ pi ṇa kajju"

ghattā:

"sāhu" bhaṇanteṃ rāhavĕṇa  $  indaṇīla-maṇi-kañcaṇa-khaṇḍĕhĩ
      kaḍaẏa-maüḍa-kaḍisuttaẏahĩ  $  pujjiu kavilu sa iṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ


----------  [29. eguṇatīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


suraḍāmara-riu-ḍamarakara  $  kovaṇḍa-dhara  $  sahũ sīẏaĕ caliẏa mahāiẏa
vala-ṇārāẏaṇa ve vi jaṇa  $  parituṭṭha-maṇa  $  jīvanta-ṇaẏaru saṃpāiẏa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 29, Kaḍavaka 1:


paṭṭaṇu tihi mi tehĩ āvajjiu  $  diṇaẏara-vimvu va dosa-vivajjiu
ṇavara hoi jaï kampu dhaesu  $  haü turaesu jujjhu suraesu
ghāu muravesu  $  bhaṅgu cihuresu
jaḍaü ruddesu  $  maliṇu candesu
khalu khettesu  $  daṇḍu chattesu
(vahu-)kara gahaṇesu  $  paharu divasesu
dhaṇu dāṇesu  $  cinta jhāṇesu
sura saggesu  $  sīhu raṇṇesu
kalahu gaesu  $  aṅku kavvesu
ḍaru vasahesu  $  velu gaẏaṇesu
vaṇu rukkhesu  $  jhāṇu mukkhesu
ahavaï kittiu ṇiva vaṇṇijjaï  $  jaï para taṃ ji tāsu uvamijjaï

ghattā:

tahŏ ṇaẏarahŏ avaruttarĕṇa  $  kosantarĕṇa  $  uvavaṇu ṇāmeṇa pasatthaü
     ṇāĩ kumārahŏ entāhŏ  $  païsantāhŏ  $  thiu ṇava-kusumañjali-hatthaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 29, Kaḍavaka 2:


tahĩ uvavaṇĕ thiẏa hari-vala jāvĕhĩ  $  bharaheṃ lehu visajjiu tāvĕhĩ
aggaĕ ghittu ṇareṇa ṇarindahŏ  $  bhaviu va calaṇĕhĩ paḍiu jiṇindahŏ
laïu mahīhareṇa saĩ hattheṃ  $  jiṇavara-dhammu va muṇivara-sattheṃ
vāri-ṇivandhahŏ mukku gaïndu va  $  diṭṭhu aṅku tahĩ ṇahaẏalĕ candu va
"rajju muevi ve vi riu-maddaṇa  $  gaẏa vaṇa-vāsahŏ rāma-jaṇaddaṇa
ko jāṇaï hari kaddiu āvaï  $  tahŏ vaṇamāla dejja jasu bhāvaï"
lehu ghiveppiṇu ṇaravaï mahiharu  $  ṇāĩ daveṇa daḍḍhu thiu mahiharu
ṇāĩ miẏaṅko kamiu viḍappeṃ  $  tiha mahiharu ṇarindu māhappeṃ

ghattā:

jāẏa cinta maṇĕ duddharahŏ  $  dharaṇīdharahŏ  $  sihi-gala-tamāla-ghaṇa-vaṇṇahŏ
   "lakkhaṇu lakkhaṇa-lakkha-dharu  $  taṃ muĕvi varu  $  maĩ diṇṇa kaṇṇa kiṃ aṇṇahŏ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 29, Kaḍavaka 3:


to etthantarĕ ṇaẏaṇa-visālaĕ  $  eha vatta jaṃ suẏa vaṇamālaĕ
āulihuẏa hiẏaeṇa visūraï  $  dukkheṃ mahaṇaï vva āūraï
sirĕ pāseu caḍaï muhu sūsaï  $  kara vihuṇaï puṇu daïvahŏ rūsaï
maṇu dhugudhugaï dehu paritappaï  $  vammahŏ ṇaṃ karavatteṃ kappaï
tāva ṇahaṅgaṇeṇa ghaṇu gajjiu  $  ṇāĩ kumāreṃ dūu visajjiu
"dhīrī hohi māĕ" ṇaṃ bhāsiu  $  "uhu lakkhaṇu uvavaṇĕ āvāsiu"
garahiu mehu to vi taṇu-aṅgiĕ  $  dosa vi guṇa havanti saṃsaggiĕ
"tuhũ kira jaṇa-maṇa-ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇu  $  mahu puṇu jalahara ṇāĩ huāsaṇu

ghattā:

tujjhu ṇa dosu dosu kulahŏ  $  haẏa-duha-kulahŏ jalĕ  $  jalaṇĕ pavaṇĕ jaṃ jāẏaü
    taṃ pāseu dāhu karahu  $  ṇīsāsu mahu tiṇṇi  $  vi dakkhavaṇahŏ āẏaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 29, Kaḍavaka 4:


docchiu mehu paṇaṭṭhu ṇahaṅgaṇĕ  $  puṇu vaṇamālaĕ cintiu ṇiẏa-maṇĕ
"kiṃ païsarami valantĕ huāsaṇĕ  $  kiṃ samuddĕ kiṃ raṇṇĕ su-bhīsaṇĕ
kiṃ visu bhuñjami kiṃ ahi cappami  $  kiṃ appaü karavatteṃ kappami
kiṃ karivara-dantahĩ uru bhindami  $  kiṃ karavālĕhĩ tilu tilu chindami
kiṃ disa laṅghami kiṃ pavvajjami  $  kahŏ akkhami kahŏ saraṇu pavajjami
ahavaï eṇa kāĩ gamu sajjami  $  taruvara-ḍālaĕ pāṇa visajjami"
ema bhaṇeppiṇu caliẏa turantī  $  kaṅkellī-thaḍa ugghosantī
gandha-dhūva-vali-puppha-vihatthī  $  līlaĕ cikkamanti vīsatthī

ghattā:

caüviha-seṇṇeṃ pariẏariẏa  $  dhaṇa ṇīsariẏa  $  "ko vihĩ āliṅgaṇu desaï"
    ema cavanti païṭṭha vaṇĕ  $  ravi-atthavaṇĕ  $  "kahĩ lakkhaṇu" ṇāĩ gavesaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 29, Kaḍavaka 5:


diṭṭhu asoẏavacchu pariañciu  $  jiṇavaro vva sabbhāveṃ añciu
puṇu parivāẏaṇu kiẏaü asoẏahŏ  $  "aṇṇu ṇa iha-loẏahŏ para-loẏahŏ
jammĕ jammĕ mua-muahĕ sa-lakkhaṇu  $  piẏa-bhattāru hojja mahu lakkhaṇu"
puṇu puṇu ema ṇamaṃsaï jāvĕhĩ  $  raẏaṇihĕ ve paharā huẏa tāvĕhĩ
saẏalu vi sāhaṇu ṇiddoṇallaü  $  ṇāvaï mohaṇa-jāleṃ pelliu
ṇiggaẏa puṇu vaṇamāla turantī  $  hāra-ḍora-ṇeurĕhĩ khalantī
hari-virahamvu-pūrĕ ubbhantī  $  vuṇṇa-kuraṅgi va cittubbhantī

ghattā:

    ṇandāvatta-ṇarāhivaï  $  jiṇĕ karĕvi maï  $  dikkhahã samuṭṭhiu tāvĕhĩ

ṇaṃ mahiharu devaïṇandaṇeṇa  $  pañcamiẏa mukka vahu-macchareṇa
pammukka padhāiẏa ṇaravarāsu  $  ṇaṃ kanta sukantahŏ suhaẏarāsu
sa visāṇĕhĩ enti ṇiruddha kema  $  ṇava-suraẏa-samāgamĕ juvaï jema
etthantarĕ devahĩ lakkhaṇāsu  $  sirĕ mukka paḍīvaü kusuma-vāsu
aridamaṇu ṇa sohaï satti-hīṇu  $  khala-kupurisu vva thiu satti-hīṇu

ghattā:

hari romañciẏa-taṇu  $  sahaï sa-paharaṇu  $  raṇa-muhĕ parisakkantu kiha
      rattuppala-loẏaṇu  $  rasa-vasa-bhoẏaṇu  $  pañcāuhu veẏālu jiha

uvasaggu jāma pārambhiẏaü  $  vahu-rūvĕhĩ gaẏaṇĕ viẏambhiẏaü
paḍivaṇṇaĕ tahĩ tehaĕ 'vasarĕ  $  vaṭṭantaĕ guru-uvasagga-bharĕ
tumhahã jĕ pahāveṃ taṭṭhāĩ  $  asuraĩ dhaṇu-ravĕṇa paṇaṭṭhāĩ

ghattā:

        so dīsaï etthu  $  gāruḍu deu huu

----------  [35. pañcatīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


gutta-suguttahã taṇĕṇa pahāveṃ rāmu sa-sīẏa parama-sabbhāveṃ
devĕhĩ dāṇa-riddhi khaṇĕ darisiẏa vala-mandirĕ vasuhāra pavarisiẏa

_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 35, Kaḍavaka 1:


jāẏa mahaggha raẏaṇa su-pagāsaĩ  $  lakkhahã tiṇṇi saẏaĩ pañcāsaĩ
varisĕvi raẏaṇa-varisu saĩ hattheṃ  $  rāmu pasaṃsiu suravara-sattheṃ
"tihuvaṇĕ ṇavara ekku valu dhaṇṇaü  $  divvāhāru jeṇa vaṇĕ diṇṇaü"
maṇĕ parituṭṭhaĩ amara-saẏāĩ  $  "aṇṇeṃ dāṇeṃ kijjaï kāĩ
aṇṇeṃ dhariu bhuvaṇu saẏarāẏaru  $  aṇṇeṃ dhammu kammu purisāẏaru
aṇṇeṃ riddhi-viddhi vaṃsubbhaü  $  aṇṇeṃ pemmu vilāsu sa-vibbhamu
aṇṇeṃ geu veu siddhakkharu  $  aṇṇeṃ jāṇu jhāṇu paramakkharu
aṇṇu muevi aṇṇu kiṃ dijjaï  $  jeṇa mahantu bhogu pāvijjaï

ghattā:

aṇṇa-suvaṇṇa-kaṇṇa-godāṇahũ  $  meiṇi-maṇi-siddhanta-purāṇahũ
    savvahũ aṇṇa-dāṇu uccāsaṇu  $  para-sāsaṇahũ jema jiṇa-sāsaṇu"

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 35, Kaḍavaka 2:

----------  [36. chattīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


rahu koḍḍāvaṇaü maṇi-raẏaṇa-sahāsĕhĩ ghaḍiẏaü
gaẏaṇahŏ ucchalĕvi ṇaṃ diṇaẏara-sandaṇu paḍiẏaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 36, Kaḍavaka 1:


tahĩ tehaĕ sundarĕ suppavahĕ  $  āraṇṇa-mahāgaẏa-jutta-rahĕ
dhurĕ lakkhaṇu rahavarĕ dāsarahi  $  sura-līlaĕ puṇu viharanti mahi
taṃ kaṇhavaṇṇa-ṇaï muĕvi gaẏa  $  vaṇĕ kahi mi ṇihāliẏa matta gaẏa
kattha vi pañcāṇaṇa giri-guhĕhĩ  $  muttāvali vikkhiranti ṇahĕhĩ
kattha vi uḍḍāviẏa saüṇa-saẏa  $  ṇaṃ aḍavihĕ uḍḍĕvi pāṇa gaẏa

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 37, Kaḍavaka 1:

----------  [38. aṭṭhatīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


tisiraü lakkhaṇĕṇa samaraṅgaṇĕ ghāiu jāvĕhĩ
tihuaṇa-ḍamara-karu dahavaẏaṇu parāiu tāvĕhĩ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 38, Kaḍavaka 1:


lehu visajjiu jo sura-sīhahŏ  $  aggaĕ paḍiu gampi dasagīvahŏ
paḍiu ṇāĩ vahu-dukkhahã bhāru  $  ṇāĩ ṇisāẏara-kula-saṃghāru
ṇāĩ bhaẏaṅkaru kalahahŏ mūlu  $  ṇāĩ dasāṇaṇa-matthā-sūlu
leheṃ kahiu savvu ahiṇāṇĕhĩ  $  "samvukumāru ulaggaï pāṇĕhĩ
aṇṇu vi khagga-raẏaṇu uddāliu  $  khara-ghariṇihĕ hiẏavaü viddāriu
taṃ ṇisuṇevi ve vi jasabhūsaṇa  $  para-valĕ bhiḍiẏa gampi khara-dūsaṇa
ṇāri-raẏaṇu ṇiruvamu sohaggaü  $  acchaï rāvaṇa tujjhu jĕ joggaü"

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 38, Kaḍavaka 18:


uṭṭhiu vīsapāṇi asi lentaü  $  ṇāĩ sa-vijju mehu gajjantaü
vijjā-cheu karĕvi vijjāharĕ  $  ghattiu kamvūdīvabbhantarĕ
puṇu dasasiru saṃcallu sa-sīẏaü  $  ṇahaẏalĕ ṇāĩ divāẏaru vīẏaü
majjhĕ samuddahŏ jaẏasiri-māṇaṇu  $  puṇu vollevaĕ laggu dasāṇaṇu
"kāĩ gahilliĕ maĩ ṇa samicchahi  $  kiṃ mahaevi-paṭṭu ṇa samicchahi
kiṃ ṇikkaṇṭaü rajju ṇa bhuñjahi  $  kiṃ ṇa vi suraẏa-sokkhu aṇuhujjahi
kiṃ mahu keṇa vi bhaggu maḍappharu  $  kiṃ dūhaü kiṃ kahi mi asundaru"
ema bhaṇĕvi āliṅgaï jāvĕhĩ  $  jaṇaẏa-suẏaĕ ṇibbhacchiu tāvĕhĩ

ghattā:

"divasĕhĩ thovĕhĩ  $  tuhũ rāvaṇa samarĕ jiṇevaü
     amhahũ vāriẏaĕ  $  rāma-sarĕhĩ āliṅgevaü"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 38, Kaḍavaka 19:


ṇiṭṭhura-vaẏaṇĕhĩ docchiu jāvĕhĩ  $  dahamuhu huaü vilakkhaü tāvĕhĩ
"jaï mārami to eha ṇa pecchami  $  vollaü savvu haseppiṇu acchami
avaseṃ kaṃ divasu i icchesaï  $  sarahasu kaṇṭha-ggahaṇu karesaï
"aṇṇu vi maĩ ṇiẏa-vaü pālevvaü  $  maṇḍaĕ para-kalattu ṇa laevvaü"
ema bhaṇevi caliu sura-ḍāmaru  $  laṅka parāiu laddha-mahāvaru
sīẏaĕ vuttu "ṇa païsami paṭṭaṇĕ  $  acchami etthu viulĕ ṇandaṇavaṇĕ
jāva ṇa suṇami vatta bhattārahŏ  $  tāva ṇivitti majjhu āhārahŏ"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi uvavaṇĕ païsāriẏa  $  sīsava-rukkha-mūlĕ vaïsāriẏa

ghattā:

mellĕvi sīẏa vaṇĕ  $  gaü rāvaṇu gharahŏ turantaü
   dhavalĕhĩ maṅgalĕhĩ  $  thiu rajju sa ïṃ bhu ñjantaü


----------  [39. eguṇacālīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


kuḍhĕ laggeppiṇu lakkhaṇahŏ valu jāma paḍīvaü āvaï
taṃ ji laẏāharu taṃ ji taru para sīẏa ṇa appaü dāvaï

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 39, Kaḍavaka 1:


ṇīsīẏaü vaṇu avaẏajjiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ sararuhu lacchi-visajjiẏaü
ṇaṃ meha-vindu ṇivvijjulaü  $  ṇaṃ muṇivara-vaẏaṇu a-vacchalaü
ṇaṃ bhoẏaṇu lavaṇa-jutti-rahiu  $  arahanta-vimvu ṇaṃ a-vasahiu
ṇaṃ datti-vivajjiu kiviṇa-dhaṇu  $  tiha sīẏa-vihūṇaü diṭṭhu vaṇu
puṇu joaï guhilĕhĩ païsarĕvi  $  thiẏa jāṇaï jāṇaï osarĕvi
puṇu jovaï giri-vivarantarĕhĩ  $  thiẏa jāṇaï lhikkĕvi kandarĕhĩ
tāṇantarĕ diṭṭhu jaḍāi vaṇĕ  $  saṃsūḍiẏa-gattaü paḍiu raṇĕ

ghattā:

pahara-vihura-ghummanta-taṇu  $  jaṃ diṭṭhu pakkhi ṇiddaliẏaü
    tāvĕhĩ vujjhiu rāhavĕṇa  $  hiẏa jāṇaï keṇa vi chaliẏaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 39, Kaḍavaka 2:

puṇu diṇṇa teṇa suha vasu-hārā  $  uccārĕvi pañca ṇamokkārā
je sārabhūẏa jiṇa-sāsaṇahŏ  $  je maraṇa-sahāẏa bhavva-jaṇahŏ
laddhehĩ jehĩ diḍha hoi maï  $  laddhehĩ jehĩ paraloẏa-gaï
laddhehĩ jehĩ saṃbhavaï suhu  $  laddhehĩ jehĩ ṇijjaraï duhu
te diṇṇa vihaṅgahŏ rāhavĕṇa  $  kiẏa-ṇisiẏara-ṇiẏara-parāhavĕṇa
"jāejjahi parama-suhāvahĕṇa  $  aṇaraṇṇāṇantavīra-pahĕṇa"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi savvāẏarĕṇa  $  lahu pāṇa visajjiẏa ṇahaẏarĕṇa
jaṃ muu jaḍāi hiẏa jaṇaẏa-sua  $  dhāhāviu ubbhā karĕvi bhua

ghattā:

"kahĩ haũ kahĩ hari kahĩ ghariṇi  $  kahĩ gharu kahĩ pariẏaṇu chiṇṇaü
     bhūẏa-vali vva kuḍumvu jagĕ  $  haẏa-daïveṃ kaha vikkhiṇṇaü"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 39, Kaḍavaka 3:


valu ema bhaṇevi pamucchiẏaü  $  puṇu cāraṇa-risihĩ ṇiẏacchiẏaü

āūrĕvi gala-gambhīra-jhuṇi  $  puṇu laggu cavevaĕ jeṭṭha-muṇi
"bho carama-deha sāsaẏa-gamaṇa  $  keṃ kajjeṃ rovahi mūḍha-maṇa
tiẏa dukkhahũ khāṇi vioẏa-ṇihi  $  tahĕ kāraṇĕ rovahi kāĩ vihi

    jiha guṇavaï-aṇuattaṇĕṇa  $  jiṇaẏāsu jāu vaṇĕ vāṇaru"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 39, Kaḍavaka 4:


jaṃ ṇisuṇiu ko vi cavantu ṇahĕ  $  mucchā-vihalaṅghalu dharaṇi-vahĕ
"hā sīẏa" bhaṇantu samuṭṭhiẏaü  $  caü-disaü ṇiẏantu  pariṭṭhiẏaü
ṇaṃ kari kariṇihĕ vicchoiẏaü  $  puṇu gaẏaṇa-maggu avaloiẏaü
tahĩ tāva ṇihāliẏa viṇṇi risi  $  saṃgahiẏa jehĩ paraloẏa-kisi
te guru guru-bhatti karevi thuẏa  $  "ho dhamma-viddhi siri-ṇamiẏa-bhuẏa
giri-meru-samāṇaü jetthu duhu  $  tahĕ kāraṇĕ rovahi kāĩ tuhũ
khala tiẏamaï jeṇa ṇa parihariẏa  $  tahŏ ṇaraẏa-mahāṇaï duttariẏa
rovanti ema para kappurisa  $  tiṇa-samu gaṇanti je sappurisa

ghattā:

    hammaï jiṇa-vaẏaṇosahĕṇa  $  jeṃ jamma-sae vi ṇa ḍhukkaï"

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 39, Kaḍavaka 5:

"labbhanti gāma-varapaṭṭaṇaĩ  $  sīẏala-viulaĩ ṇandaṇa-vaṇaĩ

labbhaï tamvolu vilevaṇaü  $  labbhaï hiẏaïcchiu bhoẏaṇaü

----------  [40. cālīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------

jiṇavara-guṇa-kittaṇu  $  sīẏa-saïttaṇu  $  taṃ ṇisuṇahu rāhava-cariu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 40, Kaḍavaka 1:

dhruvakaṃ


taṃ santaṃ gaẏāgasaṃ  $  dhīsaṃ saṃtāva-pāva-saṃtāsaṃ
cāru-rucā-ṇaeṇa  $  vaṃde devaṃ saṃsāra-ghora-sāsaṃ

ghattā:

      puṇu kahami mahavvalu  $  khara-dūsaṇa-valu  $  jiha āẏāmiu lakkhaṇĕṇa

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 40, Kaḍavaka 2:

duvaī
hiẏa ettahĕ vi sīẏa ettahĕ vi viou mahantu rāhave  $  hari ettahĕ vi bhiḍiu ettahĕ vi virāhiu miliu āhave

tāva tetthu bhīsāvaṇe vaṇe  $  ekkamekka-hakkāraṇe raṇe
kuruḍa-diṭṭhi-vaẏaṇubbhaḍe bhaḍe  $  viraïe mahā-vitthaḍe thaḍe
vāvaranta-bhaẏa-bhāsure sure  $  jajjaraṅga-paharāure ure
asi-savāhu-paḍiẏapphare phare  $  jampamāṇa-kaḍuakkhare khare
daliẏa-kumbha-viẏalaṅgae gae  $  siru dhuṇāvie āhae hae
ruhira-vindu-caccikkie kie  $  sāẏare vva sura-manthie thie
chatta-daṇḍa-saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍie  $  haḍḍa-ruṇḍa-vicchaḍḍa-maṇḍie

----------  [41. ekkacālīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------

vaẏaṇaehĩ khara-mahurĕhĩ muhu sūsaï visūrae
           chohĕ chohĕ ṇivaḍantaĕ jūāro vva jūrae
siru dhuṇei kara moḍaï aṅgu valei kampae
            aharu levi ṇijjhāẏaï kāmasareṇa jampae
gāi vāi uvvellei harisa-visāẏa dāvaĕ
             vāravāra mucchijjaï maraṇāvattha pāvae
candaṇeṇa siñcijjaï candaṇa-leu dijjae
             cāmarehĩ vijjijjaï to vi maṇeṇa jhijjae

ghattā:

kiṃ rāvaṇu ekku  $  jo jo garuaĩ gajjiẏaü
    jiṇa-dhavalu muevi  $  kāmeṃ ko ṇa parajjiẏaü

_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 42, Kaḍavaka 11:


thiĕ dasāṇaṇe viraha-bhimbhalĕ  $  jāẏa cinta vara-manti-maṇḍalĕ
"etthu mallu ko kuiĕ lakkhaṇe  $  siddhu jāsu asi-raẏaṇu takkhaṇe
ṇihaü samvu jeṃ dūṣaṇo kharo  $  hoi ku-i ṇa sāvaṇṇu so ṇaro"
bhaṇaï manti sahasamaï-ṇāmĕṇaṃ  $  "kavaṇu gahaṇu ekkeṇa rāmĕṇaṃ
lakkhaṇeṇa saha sāhaṇeṇa vā  $  raha-turaṅga-gaẏavāhaṇeṇa vā
duttare dusañcāra-sāẏare  $  kahĩ paesu viccī-bhaẏaṅkare
rāvaṇassa pavalaṃ valaṃ mahā  $  atthi vīra ekkekka dūsahā
kiṃ mueṇa dūsaṇĕṇa samvuṇā  $  sāẏaro kim ohaṭṭu vinduṇā"

ghattā:

taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi  $  vihasĕvi pañcāmuhu bhaṇaï
    "kiṃ vuccaï ekku  $  jo ekku jĕ sahasaĩ haṇaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa II, Saṃdhi 42, Kaḍavaka 12:


aṇṇuĕ ṇisua vatta maĩ ehiẏa  $  rāvaṇa-mandirĕ ṇīsandehiẏa
je je ṇaravaï ke-i kaïddhaẏa  $  jamvava-ṇala-suggīvaṅgaṅgaẏa
samaü virāhieṇa vaṇa-sevahũ  $  miliẏā vāsueva-valaevahũ
taṃ ṇisuṇevi dasāṇaṇa-bhicceṃ  $  vuccaï pañcāmuhu māricceṃ
"eha ajutta vatta paĩ akkhiẏa  $  rāvaṇu muĕvi ṇa aṇṇahŏ pakkhiẏa
kā vi aṇaṅgakusuma valavantahŏ  $  diṇṇi khareṇa dhīẏa haṇuvantahŏ
taṃ kiṃ māma-vaïru vīsariẏaü  $  jeṃ paḍivakkha milaï bhaẏa-ḍariẏaü"
to etthantare bhaṇaï vihīsaṇu  $  "kettiu cavahu vaẏaṇu suṇṇāsaṇu
evahĩ so uvāu cintijjaï  $  laṅkā-ṇāhu jeṇa rakkhijjaï"
ema bhaṇevi caüddisu tāḍiẏa  $  purĕ āsāliẏa vijja bhamāḍiẏa

ghattā:

tiẏasahu mi dulaṅghu  $  diḍhu māẏā-pāẏāru kiu
      ṇīsaṅku ṇisindu  $  rajju sa ẏaṃ bhu ñjantu thiu


aüjjhā-kaṇḍaṃ samattaṃ


āiccuevi-paḍimovamāĕ  $  āiccamvimāe
vīam aüjjhā-kaṇḍaṃ  $  saẏambhū-ghariṇīĕ lehaviẏaṃ


________________________________________________________________________
*************************  III. sundarakaṇḍaṃ  *************************  
________________________________________________________________________



----------  [43. tiẏālīsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


ehaĕ avasarĕ kikkindhapurĕ ṇaṃ gaü gaẏahŏ samāvaḍiu
suggīvahŏ viḍa-suggīu raṇĕ tārā-kāraṇĕ abbhiḍiu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 1:


paḍivakkhu jiṇevi ṇa sakkiẏaü  $  viddāṇaü māṇa-kalaṅkiẏaü
ṇaṃ hiẏavaĕ sūleṃ salliẏaü  $  māẏā-suggīveṃ ghalliẏaü
suggīu bhamantu vaṇeṇa vaṇu  $  saṃpāiu khara-dūsaṇahã raṇu
valu diṭṭhu saẏalu sara-jajjariu  $  tila-mettu khuruppĕhĩ kappariu
katthaï sandaṇa saẏa-khaṇḍa kiẏa  $  katthaï turaṅga ṇijjīva thiẏa
katthavi loṭṭāviẏa hatthi-haḍa  $  katthaï saüṇĕhĩ khajjanti bhaḍa
katthaï chiṇṇaĩ dhaẏa-cindhāĩ  $  katthaï ṇaccanti kavandhāĩ
katthaï raha-turaẏa-gaẏāsaṇaĩ  $  hiṇḍanti samarĕ suṇṇāsaṇaĩ

ghattā:

taṃ tehaü kikkindhesarĕṇa  $  bhaẏa-bhīsāvaṇu diṭṭhu raṇu
    ummeṭṭheṃ lakkhaṇa-gaẏavarĕṇa  $  ṇaṃ viddhaṃsiu kamala-vaṇu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 2:


raṇu bhīsaṇu jaṃ jĕ ṇiẏacchiẏaü  $  khara-dūsaṇa-pariẏaṇu pucchiẏaü
"imu kāĩ mahantaü accariu  $  valu saẏalu keṇa sara-jajjariu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi dūmiẏa-maṇĕṇa  $  vuccaï khara-dūsaṇa-pariẏaṇeṇa
"kŏ vi dasarahu tahŏ sua veṇṇi jaṇa  $  vaṇa-vāsĕ païṭṭha visaṇṇa-maṇa
somitti ko vi citteṇa thiru  $  teṃ samvukumārahŏ khuḍiu siru
asi-raẏaṇu laïu tiẏasahũ valiu  $  candaṇahihĕ jovvaṇu daramaliu
kūvāreṃ gaẏa khara-dūsaṇahũ  $  ajaẏahũ jaẏa-lacchi-vihūsaṇahũ
abbhiṭṭa te vi sahũ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  teṇa vi dohāviẏa takkhaṇĕṇa

ghattā:

keṇa vi maṇĕ amarisa-kuddhaĕṇa  $  hiẏa gehiṇi vaṇĕ rāhavahŏ
    pāḍiu jaḍāi laggantu kuḍhĕ  $  ettiu kāraṇu āhavahŏ"

_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 3:


ehiẏa ṇisuṇĕvi saṃgāma-gaï  $  cintāviu kikkindhāhivaï
"kira païsami gampi jāhũ saraṇu  $  kiu daïveṃ tahu mi ṇavara maraṇu
ehaĕ avasarĕ ko saṃbharami  $  kiṃ haṇuahŏ saraṇu paīsarami
teṇa vi riu jiṇĕvi ṇa sakkiẏaü  $  paccelliu haũ ṇiratthu kiẏaü
kiṃ abbhatthijjaï dahavaẏaṇu  $  ṇaṃ ṇaṃ tiẏa-lampaḍu luddha-maṇu
amhaĩ viṇivāĕvi ve vi jaṇa  $  sahũ rajjeṃ appuṇu lei dhaṇa
khara-dūsaṇa-deha-vimaddaṇahũ  $  varu saraṇu jāmi rahu-ṇandaṇahũ"
cinteviṇu kikkindhāhivĕṇa  $  hakkāriu mehaṇāu ṇivĕṇa
"taṃ gampi virāhiu ema bhaṇu  $  vuccaï suggīu āu saraṇu"
piẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ dūu visajjiẏaü  $  gaü macchara-māṇa-vivajjiẏaü
pāẏāla-laṅka-purĕ païsarĕvi  $  teṃ vuttu virāhiu jokkarĕvi

ghattā:

"suggīu sutārā-kāraṇĕṇa  $  viḍa-suggīveṃ ghalliẏaü
      kiṃ païsaraü kiṃ ma païsaraü  $  tumhahã saraṇu samalliẏaü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 4:


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi harisa-kāraṇĕṇa  $  "païsaraü" pavuttu virāhieṇa
"haũ dhaṇṇaü jasu kikkindharāu  $  ahimāṇu mueppiṇu pāsu āu"
saṃmāṇiu gaü pallaṭṭu dūu  $  païsāriu pahu āṇandu hūu
taṃ tūrahã saddu suṇevi teṇa  $  so vuttu virāhiu rāhaveṇa
"sahũ sāhaṇeṇa kaṇṭaïẏa-dehu  $  āvantaü dīsaï kavaṇu ehu"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇeṇa  $  vuccaï candoẏara-ṇandaṇeṇa
"suggīva-vāli iẏa bhāi ve vi  $  vaḍḍāraü gaü pavvajja levi
ehu vi jiṇevi keṇa vi khaleṇa  $  vaṇa-vāsahŏ ghalliu bhua-valeṇa

ghattā:

vara-vāṇara-dhaü sūraraẏa-suu  $  tārā-vallahu viulamaï
    jo suvvaï kahi mi kahāṇaĕhĩ  $  ĕhu so kikkindhāhivaï"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 5:


sa-virāhiẏa lakkhaṇa-rāmaeva  $  vollanti paropparu jāva eva
tiṇṇi mi suggīveṃ diṭṭha kema  $  āgamĕṇa tiloa tivāẏa jema
caü disa-gaẏa ekkahĩ miliẏa ṇāĩ  $  vaïsāriẏa ṇaravaï jamvavāi
saṃmāṇĕvi pucchiẏa lakkhaṇeṇa  $  "tumhahã avahariu kalattu keṇa"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi savvahũ mahantu  $  ṇamiẏāṇaṇu pabhaṇaï jamvavantu
"vaṇa-kīlaĕ gaü suggīu jāma  $  thiu païsĕvi viḍasuggīu tāma
thovantarĕ vāli-kaṇiṭṭhu āu  $  sāmanta-manti-maṇḍala-sahāu
ṇaü jāṇiu viṇhi mi kavaṇu rāu  $  maṇĕ vimbhaü savvahŏ jaṇahŏ jāu

ghattā:

suggīva-jualu koḍḍāvaṇaü  $  pekkhĕvi rahasa-samucchaliu
    valu addhaü suggīvahŏ taṇaü  $  māẏāsuggīvahŏ miliu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 6:


ettahĕ vi satta akkhohaṇīu  $  ettahĕ vi satta akkhohaṇīu
thiu sāhaṇu addhovaddhi hovi  $  aṅgaṅgaẏa vihaḍiẏa suhaḍa ve vi
māẏāsuggīvahŏ miliu aṅgu  $  aṅgaü suggīvahŏ raṇĕ abhaṅgu
vihĩ simirĕhĩ ve vi sahanti bhāi  $  ṇisi-divasĕhĩ candāicca ṇāĩ
ettahĕ vi vīru vipphuriẏa-vaẏaṇu  $  suu vālihĕ ṇāmeṃ candakiraṇu
thiu tārahĕ rakkhaṇu abhaü devi  $  "jaï ḍhukkahŏ to mahu marahŏ ve vi"
jujjhantu jiṇesaï jo jji ajju  $  tahŏ saẏalu sa-tāraü demi rajju"
vihĩ ekku vi ṇaü païsāru lahaï  $  ṇala-ṇīlahũ puṇu suggīu kahaï
"saccaü āhāṇaü ehu āu  $  paraẏāriu jji ghara-sāmi jāu"
asahanta paropparu ḍhukka ve vi  $  ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-karavālaĩ karĕhĩ levi

ghattā:

kira jāma bhiḍanti bhiḍanti ṇa vi  $  tāva ṇivāriẏa vāraĕhĩ
      mukkaṅkusa matta gaïnda jiha  $  osāriẏa kaṇṇāraĕhĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 7:


osāriẏa jaṃ puravara-jaṇeṇa  $  thiẏa ṇaẏarahŏ uttara-dāhiṇeṇa
aṇṇekka-diẏahĕ jujjhanti jāma  $  pavaṇañjaẏa-ṇandaṇu kuviu tāma
"maru maru suggīvahŏ maliu māṇu"  $  saṇṇaddhu suhaḍa-sāhaṇa-samāṇu
"haṇu haṇu" bhaṇantu haṇuvantu pattu  $  pabhaṇaï ṇiru rahasucchaliẏa-gattu
"suggīva māma mā maṇĕṇa mujjhu  $  viḍa-bhaḍahŏ padīvaü dehi jujjhu
jaï ṇa vi bhañjami bhuja-daṇḍu tāsu  $  to ṇa homi puttu pavaṇañjaẏāsu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi kikkindharāu  $  tahŏ uppari galagajjantu āu
te bhiḍiẏa ve vi kaṇṭaïẏa-deha  $  ṇava-pāusĕ ṇaṃ jala-bhariẏa-meha

ghattā:
asi-cāva-cakka-gaẏa-moggarĕhĩ  $  jiha sakkiu tiha jujjhiẏaü
   haṇuvanteṃ aṇṇāṇeṇa jiha  $  appaü paru vi ṇa vujjhiẏaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 8:


jaṃ vihi mi majjhĕ ekku vi ṇa ṇāu  $  gaü valĕvi paḍīvaü pavaṇajāu
suggīu vi pāṇa laevi ṇaṭṭhu  $  ṇaṃ maẏagalu kesari-ghāẏa-taṭṭhu
kira païsaï khara-dūsaṇahã saraṇu  $  kiu ṇavara kiẏanteṃ tahu mi maraṇu
tahĩ ṇisuṇiẏa tumhahã taṇiẏa vatta  $  jiha caüdaha sahasekkahŏ samatta
to vari suggīvahŏ karĕ paritta  $  saraṇāiu rakkhahi parama-mitta"
jaṃ hari abbhatthiu jamvaveṇa  $  suggīu vuttu puṇu rāhaveṇa
"tuhũ maĩ āsaṅghĕvi āu pāsu  $  akkhahi haũ saraṇaü jāmi kāsu
jiha tuhũ tiha haü mi kalatta-rahiu  $  vaṇĕ hiṇḍami kāma-gaheṇa gahiu"

ghattā:

suggīveṃ vuccaï "deva suṇĕ  $  kusala-vatta sīẏahĕ taṇiẏa
    jaï ṇāṇami to sattamaĕ diṇĕ  $  païsami salahã huāsaṇiẏa"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 9:


jaṃ jāṇaï-keraü laïu ṇāmu  $  taṃ viraha-visanthulu bhaṇaï rāmu
"jaï āṇahi kantahĕ taṇiẏa vatta  $  to vaẏaṇu mahāraü ṇisuṇi mitta
sattamĕ divasĕ ettaḍaü vujjhu  $  karĕ lāẏami tārāevi tujjhu
bhuñjāvami taṃ kikkindha-ṇaẏaru  $  dakkhavami chatta-dhaẏa-daṇḍa-pavaru
aṇṇu mi tuha keraü haṇami sattu  $  parirakkhaï jaï vi kiẏanta-mittu
vambhāṇu bhāṇu gaṅgāhiseu  $  aṅgāraü sasaharu rāhu keu
vuhu vihaphaï sukku saṇiccharo vi  $  jamu varuṇu kuveru purandaro vi
ettiẏa milevi rakkhanti jo vi  $  jīvantu ṇa chuṭṭaï vaïri to vi

ghattā:

jaï païja ṇa pūrami ettaḍiẏa  $  jaï ṇa karami sajjaṇahã dihi
    sattamaĕ divasĕ suggīva mahu  $  pattiẏa to saṇṇāsa-vihi"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 10:


sīrāuhu païjārūḍhu jaṃ jĕ  $  saṃcallu asesu vi simiru taṃ jĕ
saṃcallu virāhiu duṇṇivāru  $  suggīu rāmu lakkhaṇa-kumāru
te caliẏa cāẏari vi parama-mitta  $  ṇāvaï kali-kāla-kaẏanta-mitta
ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi disa-gaïnda  $  ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi khaẏa-samudda
ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi sura-ṇikāẏa  $  ṇaṃ caliẏa cavala caüviha kasāẏa
ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari viriñca-veẏa  $  uvadāṇa-daṇḍa ṇaṃ sāma-bheẏa
aha vaṇṇieṇa kiṃ ettaḍeṇa  $  ṇaṃ caliẏa cāẏari vi appaṇeṇa
thovantarĕ tarala-tamāla-chaṇṇu  $  jiṇa-dhammu jema sāvaẏa-ravaṇṇu

ghattā:

suggīveṃ rāmeṃ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  giri kikkindhu vihāviẏaü
    pihimiĕ uccāĕvi sira-kamalu  $  maüḍu ṇāĩ darisāviẏaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 11:


thovantarĕ dhaṇa-kañcaṇa-paüru  $  lakkhijjaï taṃ kikkindhaṇaẏaru
ṇaṃ ṇahaẏalu tārā-maṇḍiẏaü  $  ṇaṃ kavvu kaïddhaẏa-caḍḍiẏaü
ṇaṃ haṇua-vihūsiu muha-kamalu  $  vihasiu saẏavattu ṇāĩ sa-ṇalu
ṇaṃ ṇīlālaṅkiu āharaṇu  $  ṇaṃ kunda-pasāhiu viula-vaṇu
suggīva-vantu ṇaṃ haṃsa-siru  $  ṇaṃ jhāṇu muṇindahũ taṇaü thiru
māẏā-suggīveṃ mohiẏaü  $  kusaleṇa ṇāĩ kāmiṇi-hiẏaü
etthantarĕ vaddhiẏa-kalaẏalĕhĩ  $  jamvava-kundendaṇīla-ṇalĕhĩ
somitti-virāhiẏa-rāhavĕhĩ  $  savvĕhĩ ṇivvūḍha-mahāhavĕhĩ

ghattā:

suggīvahŏ vihurĕ samāvaḍiĕ  $  vahu-saṃmāṇa-dāṇa-maṇĕhĩ
    veḍhijjaï taṃ kikkindhapuru  $  ṇaṃ ravi-maṇḍalu ṇava-ghaṇĕhĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 12:


veḍheppiṇu paṭṭaṇu ṇiravasesu  $  paṭṭhaviu dūu viḍa-bhaḍahŏ pāsu
suggīveṃ rāmeṃ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  sandesaü pesiu takkhaṇĕṇa
"kiṃ vahuṇā kahĕ paramatthu tāsu  $  jima bhiḍu jima pāṇa laevi ṇāsu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi kappūracandu  $  saṃcallu ṇāĩ khaẏakāla-daṇḍu
dujjaü māẏā-suggīu jetthu  $  saha-maṇḍavĕ dūu païṭṭhu tetthu
jo pesiu rāmeṃ lakkhaṇĕṇa  $  sandesaü akkhiu takkhaṇĕṇa
"ṇaü ṇāsaï ajju vi eu kajju  $  kahŏ taṇiẏa tāra kahŏ taṇaü rajju
pahu pāṇa laeppiṇu ṇāsu ṇāsu  $  jīvantu ṇa chuṭṭahi avasu tāsu

ghattā:

sandesaü viḍa-suggīva suṇĕ  $  puṇaravi suggīvahŏ taṇaü
    sahũ sira-kamaleṇa tuhāraĕṇa  $  rajju laevvaü appaṇaü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 43, Kaḍavaka 13:


taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi vaẏaṇubbhaḍĕṇa  $  āruṭṭheṃ duṭṭheṃ viḍa-bhaḍĕṇa
āesu diṇṇu ṇiẏa-sāhaṇahŏ  $  "vitthārahŏ mārahŏ āhaṇahŏ
pāvahŏ muṇḍāvahŏ sira-kamalu  $  sahu ṇāseṃ chindahŏ bhua-jualu
dūahŏ dūattaṇu dakkhavahŏ  $  pāhuṇaü kaẏantahŏ paṭṭhavahŏ"
pahu mantihĩ dukkhu ṇivāriẏaü  $  suggīva-dūu gaü khāriẏaü
ettahĕ vi ṇarindu ṇa saṃthiẏaü  $  ṇiẏa-sandaṇa-vīḍhĕ pariṭṭhiẏaü

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 44, Kaḍavaka 10:


tahĩ tehaĕ vi kālĕ bhaẏa-bhīẏahĕ  $  keṇa vi sīlu ṇa khaṇḍiu sīẏahĕ
para-purisĕhĩ ṇaü cittu laïjjaï  $  vālĕhĩ jiha vāẏaraṇu ṇa bhijjaï"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi vijjāhara-vuttaü  $  kaṇṭhaü diṇṇu kaḍaü kaḍisuttaü
tahĩ avasarĕ je gaẏā gavesā  $  āẏa paḍīvā te vi asesā
pucchiẏa rāhaveṇa "vara-vīrahŏ  $  jamvava aṅgaṅgaẏa soṇḍīrahŏ
ahŏ ṇala-ṇīlahŏ gavaẏa-gavakkhahŏ  $  sā kiṃ dūrĕ laṅkā mahu akkhahŏ"
jamvaü kahahŏ laggu halaheihĕ  $  "rakkhasa-dīvahŏ sāẏara-veihĕ
joẏaṇa-saẏaĩ satta vihĩ antaru  $  tahi mi samuddu raüddu bhaẏaṅkaru
laṅkā-dīu vi teṇa pamāṇeṃ  $  kahiu jiṇindeṃ kevala-ṇāṇeṃ
tahĩ tikūḍu ṇāmeṇa mahīharu  $  joẏaṇāĩ pañcāsa sa-vittharu
ṇava tuṅgattaṇeṇa tahŏ uppari  $  thiẏa joẏaṇa vattīsa laṅkāuri

ghattā:

ekku vi ṇarindu ṇīsaṅkaü  $  aṇṇu samuddeṃ pariẏariu
      ekku vi kesari duppekkhaü  $  aṇṇu paḍīvaü pakkhariu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 44, Kaḍavaka 11:


jasu taïlokka-cakku āsaṅkaï  $  teṇa samāṇu bhiḍĕvi ko sakkaï
rāhava eṇa kāĩ ālāveṃ  $  kāĩ va sīẏahĕ taṇĕṇa palāveṃ
piṇḍatthaṇiu laḍaha-lāẏaṇṇaü  $  laï mahu taṇiẏaü teraha kaṇṇaü
guṇavaï hiẏaẏavamma hiẏaẏāvali  $  suravaï paümāvaï raẏaṇāvali
candakanta sirikantāṇuddhari  $  cārulacchi maṇavāhiṇi sundari
sahũ jiṇavaïĕ rūva-saṃpaṇṇaü  $  pariṇi bhaḍārā eẏaü kaṇṇaü"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi valaeveṃ vuccaï  $  "āẏahũ majjhĕ ṇa ekka vi ruccaï
jaï vi rambha aha hoi tilottima  $  sīẏahĕ pāsiu aṇṇa ṇa uttima"

ghattā:

valaevahŏ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu  $  kikkindhāhiveṇa hasiu
    "kiu rattahŏ taṇaü kahāṇaü  $  bhoẏaṇu muĕvi chāṇu asiu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 44, Kaḍavaka 12:


khaṇĕ khaṇĕ vollahi ṇāĩ aẏāṇaü  $  kiṃ paĩ ṇa suẏaü loẏāhāṇaü
jaï vi kiṃ pi accharaĕ ṇa kijjaï  $  tā kiṃ māṇusa-metteṃ dijjaï
pūsamāṇu jaï sīẏahĕ pāsiu  $  to karĕ vaẏaṇu mahāraü bhāsiu
varisĕ varisĕ tihuvaṇa-saṃtāvaṇu  $  jaï vi ṇei ekkekkī rāvaṇu
to vi janti taü teraha varisaĩ  $  jāĩ surinda-bhoga-aṇusarisaĩ
upparantĕ puṇu kāi mi hosaï"  $  taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu valu ghosaï
"maï mārevaü vaïri sa-hattheṃ  $  lāevaü khara-dūsaṇa-pantheṃ
tiẏa-parihavu savvaha mi garūvaü  $  ṇaṃ to paï mi saĩ ji aṇuhūaü

ghattā:

jo maïliu vihi-pariṇāmĕṇa  $  aẏasa-kalaṅka-paṅka-malĕhĩ
    so jasa-paḍu pakkhālevaü  $  dahamuha-sīsa-silāẏalĕhĩ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 44, Kaḍavaka 13:


taṃ ṇisuṇevi vuttu suggīveṃ  $  "viggahu kavaṇu samaü dahagīveṃ
ekku kuraṅgu ekku aïrāvaü  $  pāhaṇu ekku ekku kula-pāvaü
ekku samuddu ekku kamalāẏaru  $  ekku bhuaṅgamu ekku khagesaru
ekku maṇusu ekku vi vijjāharu  $  tahŏ tumhahũ vaḍḍāraü antaru
jagĕ jasa-paḍahu jeṇa apphāliu  $  giri kaïlāsu karĕhĩ saṃcāliu
jeṇa mahāhavĕ bhaggu purandaru  $  jamu vaïsavaṇu varuṇu vaïsāṇaru
jeṇa samīraṇo vi jiu khatteṃ  $  kavaṇu gahaṇu tahŏ māṇusa-metteṃ"
hari vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa āruṭṭhaü  $  ṇāĩ saṇiccharu citteṃ duṭṭhaü

ghattā:

"aṅgaṅgaẏa-ṇala-suggīvahŏ  $  vāhu-sahejjā hohu chuḍu
     haũ lakkhaṇu ekku pahuccami  $  jo dahagīvahŏ jīva-khuḍu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 44, Kaḍavaka 14:


taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi vaẏaṇuṇṇaĕṇa  $  suggīu vuttu jamvuṇṇaĕṇa
"ĕhu hoi ṇa kŏ vi sāvaṇṇu ṇaru  $  saccaü paḍivakkha-viṇāsaẏaru
jaṃ cavaï savvu taṃ ṇivvahaï  $  ko asivaru sūrahāsu lahaï
jo jīviu samvukkahŏ haraï  $  jo khara-dūsaṇa-kulakhaü karaï
so raṇĕ paharantu keṇa dhariu  $  khaẏa-kālu dasāsahŏ avaẏariu
paramāgamu ṇīsandehu thiu  $  kevalihĩ āsi āesu kiu
āliṅgĕvi vāhahĩ jiha mahila  $  jo saṃcālesaï koḍi-sila
so hosaï mallu dasāṇaṇahŏ  $  sāmiu vijjāhara-sāhaṇahŏ

ghattā:

jamvavahŏ vaẏaṇu ṇisuṇeppiṇu  $  dhuṇiu kumāreṃ bhua-jualu
    "kiṃ ekkeṃ pāhaṇa-khaṇḍĕṇa  $  dharami sa-sāẏaru dharaṇi-ẏalu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 44, Kaḍavaka 15:


taṃ ṇisuṇevi vaẏaṇu parituṭṭheṃ  $  vuttu jaṇaddaṇu vāli-kaṇiṭṭheṃ
"jaṃ jaṃ cavahi deva taṃ saccaü  $  aṇṇu vi eu karahi jaï paccaü
to haũ bhiccu homi hiẏaïcchiu  $  sūrahŏ divasu va vela paḍicchiu
taṃ ṇisuṇevi samara-dussīlĕhĩ  $  ṇaravaï vujjhāviu ṇala-ṇīlĕhĩ
"jeṇa sarĕhĩ khara-dūsaṇa ghāiẏa  $  pattiẏa koḍi-sila vi uccāiẏa"
ema cavevi caliẏa vijjāhara  $  ṇava-kaṅkālĕ ṇāĩ ṇava jalahara
lakkhaṇa-rāma caḍāviẏa jāṇĕhĩ  $  ghaṇṭā-jhuṇi-jhaṅkāra-pahāṇĕhĩ
koḍi-silā-uddesu parāiẏa  $  siddhĕhĩ siddhi jema ṇijjhāiẏa

ghattā:

jā saẏala-kāla hiṇḍantahũ  $  hua vaṇa-vāsĕ parammuhiẏa
   sā evahĩ lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ  $  ṇaṃ thiẏa siẏa savaḍammuhiẏa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 44, Kaḍavaka 16:


loẏaggahŏ siva-sāsaẏa-sokkhahŏ  $  jahĩ muṇivarahũ koḍi gaẏa mokkhahŏ
sā koḍi-sila tehĩ pariañciẏa  $  gandha-dhūva-vali-pupphĕhĩ añciẏa
diṇṇa sa-saṅkha paḍaha kiu kalaẏalu  $  ghosiu caü-paẏāru jiṇa-maṅgalu
"jasu dunduhi asou bhāmaṇḍalu  $  so arahantu deu taü maṅgalu
je gaẏa tihuẏaṇaggu taṃ ṇikkalu  $  te siddhavara dentu taü maṅgalu
jehĩ aṇaṅgu bhaggu jiu kali-malu  $  te vara-sāhu dentu taü maṅgalu
jo chajjīva-ṇikāẏahã vacchalu  $  so daẏa-dhammu deu taü maṅgalu"
ema su-maṅgalu  uccāreppiṇu  $  siddhavarahũ ṇavakāru kareppiṇu
jaẏa-jaẏa-saddeṃ sila saṃcāliẏa  $  rāvaṇa-riddhi ṇāĩ uddāliẏa
mukka paḍīvī karaẏala-tāḍiẏa  $  dahamuha-hiẏaẏa-gaṇṭhi ṇaṃ phāḍiẏa

ghattā:

parituṭṭheṃ suravara-loĕṇa  $  jaẏa-siri-ṇaẏaṇa-kaḍakkhaṇahŏ
      pammukku sa ïṃ bhu va-daṇḍĕhĩ  $  kusuma-vāsu sirĕ lakkhaṇahŏ


----------  [45. pañcacālīsamo sandhi]  ----------


koḍi-silaĕ saṃcāliẏaĕ dahamuha-jīviu saṃcāli(ẏa)ü
ṇahĕ devĕhĩ mahiẏalĕ ṇarĕhĩ āṇanda-tūru apphāli(ẏa)ü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 1:

raha-vimāṇa-māẏaṅga-turaṅgama-vāhaṇe  $  vijaü ghuṭṭhu suggīvahŏ keraĕ sāhaṇe

etthantarĕ sirĕ lāiẏa karehĩ  $  jokkāriu valu vijjāharehĩ
jagĕ jiṇavara-bhavaṇaïm jāĩ jāĩ  $  pariañcĕvi añcĕvi tāĩ tāĩ
pallaṭṭu paḍīvaü suhaḍa-paẏaru  $  ṇiviseṇa pattu kikkindha-ṇaẏaru
ettiẏaĩ kiẏaĩ sāhasaĩ jaï vi  $  suggīvahŏ maṇĕ saṃdehu to vi
"ahŏ jamvava cariu mahantu kāsu  $  kiṃ dahavaẏaṇahŏ kiṃ lakkhaṇāsu
kaïlāsu tuliu ekkeṃ pacaṇḍu  $  aṇṇekkeṃ puṇu pāhāṇa-khaṇḍu
vaḍḍāraü sāhasu vihi mi kavaṇu  $  kiṃ suhagaï kiṃ saṃsāra-gamaṇu"
jamvavĕṇa vuttu "mā maṇĕṇa mujjhu  $  kiṃ ajja vi pahu sandehu tujjhu

ghattā:

vaḍḍāraü vaḍḍantarĕṇa  $  paramāgamu savvahŏ pāsiu
       jamma-sae vi ṇarāhivaï  $  kiṃ cukkaï muṇivara-bhāsiu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 2:

taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi suggīvahŏ harisiẏa-gattaho  $  phiṭṭa bhanti jiṇā-vaẏaṇĕhĩ jiha micchattaho

āgama-valeṇa uvaladdhaeṇa  $  avaloiu seṇṇu kaïddhaeṇa
"kiṃ ko vi atthi ettiẏahã majjhĕ  $  jo khandhu samoḍḍaï garua-vojjhe
jo ujjālaï mahu taṇaü vaẏaṇu  $  jo darisaï valahŏ kalatta-raẏaṇu
jo tāraï dukkha-mahāṇaīhĕ  $  jo jāi gavesaü jāṇaīhĕ"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi jamvaü caviu eva  $  "haṇuvantu muĕvi ko jāi deva
ṇaü jāṇahũ kiṃ āruṭṭho so vi  $  jaṃ ṇihaü samvu kharu dūsaṇo vi
taṃ rosu dharĕvi majjhāra-taṇua  $  rāvaṇahŏ milesaï ṇavara haṇua
jaṃ jāṇahŏ cintahŏ taṃ paesu  $  teṃ milieṃ miliẏaü jagu asesu

ghattā:

vihi mi rāma-rāmaṇa-valahũ  $  ekku vi vaḍḍhimaü ṇa dīsaï
      sahũ jaẏa-lacchiĕ vijaü tahĩ  $  para jahĩ haṇuvantu milesaï"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 3:

taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kikkindha-ṇarāhiu rañjio  $  lacchibhutti haṇuvantahŏ pāsu visajjio

"paĩ muĕvi aṇṇu ko vuddhivantu  $  jiha milaï tema kari kiṃ pi mantu
guṇa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ gampiṇu pavaṇa-puttu  $  bhaṇu "etthu kālĕ rūsĕvi ṇa juttu
khara-dūsaṇa-samvu pasāhiẏatta  $  appaṇu duccariĕhĩ maraṇu patta
ṇaü rāmahŏ ṇaü lakkhaṇahŏ dosu  $  jiha tahŏ tiha savvahŏ hoi rosu"
bhaṇu "ettieṇa kāleṇa kāĩ  $  candaṇahihĕ cariẏaĩ ṇa vi suẏāĩ
lakkhaṇa-mukkaĕ virahāurāĕ  $  khara-dūsaṇa mārāviẏa khalāĕ""
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi āṇandu hūu  $  ārūḍhu vimāṇĕ turantu dūu
saṃcalliu pulaẏa-visaṭṭa-gattu  $  ṇivisaddheṃ lacchīṇaẏaru pattu

ghattā:

paṭṭaṇu pavaṇa-suahŏ taṇaü  $  thiu haṇuruha-dīvĕ ravaṇṇaü
      mahiẏalĕ keṇa vi kāraṇĕṇa  $  ṇa sagga-khaṇḍu avaïṇṇaü

_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 4:

lacchibhutti taṃ lacchīṇaẏaru paīsaī  $  vavaharantu jaṃ sundaru taṃ taṃ dīsaī

deulavāḍaü paṇṇu pahillaü  $  phopphalu aṇṇu mūlu ceullaü
jāihullu karahāḍaü cuṇṇaü  $  cittaüḍaü kañcuaü ravaṇṇaü
rāmaüraü gulu saru païṭhāṇaü  $  aïvaḍḍaü bhujaṅgu vahu-jāṇaü
addha-vesu piu avvua-keraü  $  jovvaṇu kaṇṇāḍaü saviẏāraü
celaü harikelaü sacchāẏaü  $  vaḍḍāẏaraü loṇu vikkhāẏaü
vaïrāẏaraü vajju maṇi siṅghalu  $  ṇevālaü katthūriẏa-parimalu
mottiẏa-hāra-ṇiẏaru sañjāṇaü  $  kharu vajjaraü turaü kekkāṇaü
vara kāviṭṭhi suṭṭhu paüṇārī  $  vāṇi suhāsiṇi ṇanduravārī
kañcī-keraü ṇaẏaru visiṭṭhaü  $  cīṇaü ṇettu viẏaḍḍhĕhĩ diṭṭhaü
aṇṇu inda-vāẏaraṇu guṇijjaï  $  bhūvāvallaü geu jhuṇijjaï
ema ṇaẏaru gaü ṇivvaṇṇantaü  $  rāulu pavaṇa-suahŏ saṃpattaü

ghattā:

so paḍihāriĕ ṇammaẏaĕ  $  suggīva-dūu ṇa ṇivāriu
      ṇāĩ mahaṇṇavĕ ṇammaẏaĕ  $  ṇiẏa-jalapavāhu païsāriu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 5:

diṭṭhu teṇa dūrahŏ vi samīraṇa-ṇandaṇo  $  sisira-kālĕ divasaẏaru va ṇaẏaṇāṇandaṇo

sirisaïlu ṇareṇa ṇihāliẏaü  $  ṇaṃ kari kariṇihĩ parimāliẏaü
ekkettahĕ ekka ṇiviṭṭha tiẏa  $  vara-vīṇa-vihatthī pāṇa-piẏa
ṇāmeṇaṇaṅgakusuma subhua  $  sasa samvukumārahŏ kharahŏ sua
aṇṇekkettahĕ aṇṇekka tiẏa  $  vara-kamala-vihatthī ṇāĩ siẏa
sā paṅkaẏarāẏa abhaṅgaẏahŏ  $  suggīvahŏ sua sasa aṅgaẏahŏ
vihĩ pāsĕhĩ ve vi varaṅgaṇaü  $  kuvalaẏa-dala-dīhara-loẏaṇaü
rehaï sundaru majjhatthu kiha  $  vihĩ sañjhahĩ parimiu divasu jiha
etthantarĕ guñjhu ṇa rakkhiẏaü  $  haṇuvantahŏ dūeṃ akkhiẏaü

ghattā:

"khemu kusalu kallāṇu jaü  $  suggīvaṅgaṅgaẏa-vīrahũ
       akusalu maraṇu viṇāsu khaü  $  khara-dūsaṇa-samvukumārahũ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 6:

kahiu savvu taṃ lakkhaṇa-rāma-kahāṇaüṃ  $  daṇḍaẏāi muṇi-koḍi-silā-avasāṇaüṃ

taṃ suṇĕvi aṇaṅgakusuma ḍariẏa  $  paṅkaẏarāẏāṇurāẏa-bhariẏa
ekkahĕ ṇaṃ vajjāsaṇi paḍiẏa  $  aṇṇekkahĕ romāvali caḍiẏa
ekkahĕ maṇĕ ṇāĩ palevaṇaü  $  aṇṇekkahĕ puṇu vaddhāvaṇaü
ekkahĕ sarīru ṇicceẏaṇaü  $  aṇṇekkahĕ vavagaẏa-veẏaṇaü
ekkahĕ hiẏavaü palu palu lhasiu  $  aṇṇekkahĕ palu palu osasiu
ekkahĕ ohulliu muha-kamalu  $  aṇṇekkahĕ viẏasiu ahara-dalu
ekkahĕ jala-bhariẏaĩ loẏaṇaĩ  $  aṇṇekkahĕ rahasa-paloẏaṇaĩ
ekkahĕ saru vara-geẏahŏ taṇaü  $  aṇṇekkahĕ kaluṇu ruvāvaṇaü
ekkahĕ thiu rāulu vimaṇa-maṇu  $  aṇṇekkahĕ vaḍḍhaï ṇāĩ chaṇu

ghattā:

addhaü aṃsu-jalolliẏaü  $  addhaü sarahasu romañciẏaü
      rāula pavaṇa-suẏahŏ taṇaü  $  ṇaṃ harisa-visāẏa-paṇacciẏaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 7:

kharahŏ dhīẏa mucchaṅgaẏa puṇu vi paḍīviẏā  $  candaṇeṇa pavvāliẏa paccujjīviẏā

uṭṭhiẏa rovanti aṇaṅgakusuma  $  ṇaṃ candaṇa-laẏa ubbhiṇṇa-kusuma
"hā tāẏa keṇa viṇivāio 'si  $  vijjāharu hontaü ghāio 'si
sūrāṇa sūra jasa-ṇikkalaṅka  $  vijjāhara-kula-ṇahaẏala-maẏaṅka
hā bhāi sahoẏara dehi vāẏa  $  vilavanti kāsu paĩ mukka māẏa"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi kusalĕhĩ paṇḍiehĩ  $  saddattha-sattha-paricaḍḍiehĩ
"kiṃ ṇa suu jiṇāgamu jagĕ pagāsu  $  jāẏahŏ jīvahŏ savvahŏ viṇāsu
jala-vindu jema ghaṅghalĕ paḍantu  $  jaṃ dīsaï taṃ sāhasu mahantu
sāhāru ṇa vandhaï ei jāi  $  arahaṭṭa-jantĕ ṇava ghaḍiẏa ṇāĩ

ghattā:

rovahi kāĩ akaraṇĕṇa  $  dhīravahi māĕ appāṇaü
      amhahã tumhahũ avarahu mi  $  kaddivasu vi avasa-paẏāṇaü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 45, Kaḍavaka 8:

kharahŏ dhīẏa paridhīraviẏā parivārĕṇaṃ  $  maẏa-jalaṃ ca devāviẏa loẏācārĕṇaṃ

iherisammi velae  $  pariṭṭhie vamālae
samuṭṭhio 'rimaddaṇo  $  samīraṇassa ṇandaṇo
palamva-vāhu-pañjaro  $  ṇiraṅkuso vva kuñjaro
mahīharassa upparī  $  viruddhaü vva kesarī

ṇiggao vipphuranto ṇirattho ṇaro  $  ṇāĩ ṇiggantha-rūvo thio muṇivaro
pavaṇa-putteṇa ghettūṇa riu vaddhao  $  vara-bhuaṅgu vva garuḍeṇa uṭṭhaddhao
puttĕ vehe sue savara-vāvārio  $  aṇila-putto mahindeṇa hakkārio
añjaṇā-piẏara-puttāṇa duddarisaṇo  $  saṃpahāro samālaggu bhaẏa-bhīsaṇo
khagga-tikkhagga-vara-moggaruggāmaṇo  $  sella-vāvalla-bhallāi-saṅkāvaṇo

ghattā:
paḍhama-bhiḍantaĕṇa  $  sara-pañjaru mukku mahindeṃ
     chiṇṇu kaïddhaĕṇa  $  jiha bhava-saṃsāru jiṇindeṃ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 46, Kaḍavaka 7:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 47, Kaḍavaka 1:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 47, Kaḍavaka 8:

"bho sāhu sāhu bhuvaṇekkavīra  $  jaẏalacchi-vaccha-lañchiẏa-sarīra
bho sāhu sāhu akhaliẏa-maraṭṭa  $  bhaḍa-bhañjaṇa para-vala-maïẏavaṭṭa
bho sāhu sāhu paccakkha-maẏaṇa  $  sohagga-rāsi sappurisa-raẏaṇa
bho sāhu sāhu kaïkeẏa-tilaẏa  $  kandappa-dappa-māhappa-ṇilaẏa
bho sāhu sāhu taṇu-teẏa-piṇḍa  $  diḍha-viẏaḍa-vaccha bhuva-daṇḍa-caṇḍa
bho sāhu sāhu riu-gandhahatthi  $  uvamijjaï jaï uvamāṇu atthi

ghattā:

paĩ ṇāha parajjiẏa haũ samarĕ  $  varĕ evahĩ pāṇiggahaṇu karĕ"
   ṇiẏa-ṇāmu liheppiṇu mukku saru  $  ṇaṃ dūu visajjiu piẏahŏ gharu

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 49, Kaḍavaka 1:

jaïẏahũ vaṇa-vāsahŏ ṇīsariẏaĩ  $  dasaüra-kuvvara-pura païsariẏaĩ
ṇammaẏa viñjhu tāvi ahiṇāṇaĩ  $  aruṇagāma-rāmaüri-paẏāṇaĩ
jaẏaüra-ṇandāvatta-ṇivāṇaĩ  $  khemañjali-vaṃsatthala-thāṇaĩ
gutta-sugutta-jaḍāi-ṇivesaĩ  $  khaggu samvu-candaṇahi-paesaĩ
khara-dūsaṇa-saggāma-pavañcaĩ  $  tisiraẏa-raṇa-cariẏāĩ daïccaĩ

ghattā:

eẏaĩ cindhaĩ pāẏaḍaĩ  $  avarāi mi kiẏaĩ jāĩ chalaĩ
     kāĩ ṇa paĩ aṇuhūāĩ  $  avaloẏaṇi-sīhaṇāẏa-phalaĩ

duvaī
campaẏa-tilaẏa-vaüla-vaḍapāẏava-surataru bhagga jāvĕhĩ  $  caürujjāṇapāla saṃpāiẏa galagajjanta tāvĕhĩ

hakkārĕvi para-vala-vala-galatthu  $  dāḍhāvali dhāiu laüḍi-hatthu
jo uttara-vārahŏ rakkhavālu  $  jo pasariẏa-jasa-bhuvaṇantarālu
jo gillagaṇḍa-gaẏa-ghaḍa-gharaṭṭu  $  paḍivakkha-khalaṇu akhaliẏa-maraṭṭu
so haṇuvahŏ bhiḍiu palamva-vāhu  $  ṇaṃ gaṅgā-vāhahŏ jaüṇa-vāhu
jo teṇa pamelliu laüḍi-daṇḍu  $  so bhañjĕvi gaü saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu
sirisaïlu vi pahasiu pulaïẏaṅgu  $  "vaṇa-bhaṅgahŏ vīẏaü suhaḍa-bhaṅgu
darisāvami" ema cavantaeṇa  $  ummūliu tālu turantaeṇa
ku-jaṇu va sura-bhāẏaṇu thaḍḍha-bhāu  $  dūra-halaü aṇṇu vi duppaṇāu

ghattā:

teṇa ṇisāẏaru āhaẏaṇĕ  $  āẏāmevi samāhaü tāleṃ
      paḍiu ghuleppiṇu dharaṇiẏalĕ  $  ghāiu desu ṇāĩ dukkāleṃ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 51, Kaḍavaka 6:

duvaī
jaṃ haṇuveṇa ṇihaü samaraṅgaṇĕ dāḍhāvali sa-maccharo
dhāiu ekkadantu galagajjĕvi ṇaṃ gaẏavarahŏ gaẏavaro

jo puvva-vārĕ vaṇa-rakkhavālu  $  saṃpāiu ṇaṃ khaẏa-kālĕ kālu
diḍha-kaḍhiṇa-dehu thira-thora-hatthu  $  para-vala-paoli-bhellaṇa-samatthu
āẏāmĕvi satti pamukka teṇa  $  ṇaṃ sari sāẏarahŏ mahīhareṇa
sā sāmīraṇihĕ parāẏaṇattha  $  asaï va sappurisahŏ akiẏattha
haṇuveṇa vi raṇaühĕ duṇṇirikkhu  $  uppāḍiu vara-sāhāru rukkhu
kāmiṇi-muha-kuharahŏ aṇuharantu  $  paripakka-phalāharu kusuma-dantu
ṇava-pallava-jīhā-lavalavantu  $  kalaẏaṇṭhi-kaṇṭha-mahurullavantu
mahakavva-viẏāru va dala-ṇivesu  $  pacchaṇṇa-pariṭṭhiẏa-rasa-visesu

ghattā:

      ekkadantu ghummantu raṇĕ  $  pāḍiu rukkhu jema duvvāeṃ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 51, Kaḍavaka 7:

duvaī

jo dāhiṇa-vārahŏ rakkhavālu  $  kokkantu padhāiu muha-karālu
"vaṇu bhañjĕvi kahĩ haṇuvanta jāhi  $  laï paharaṇu ahimuhu thāhi thāhi
jiha haü dāḍhāvali uttharantu  $  aṇṇu vi viṇivāiu ekkadantu
tiha paharu paharu bho pavaṇajāẏa  $  dahavaẏaṇahŏ kerā kuddha pāẏa"

      vihalaṅghalu ghummanta-taṇu  $  giri va paloṭṭiu kulisa-pahāreṃ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 52, Kaḍavaka 2:

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 52, Kaḍavaka 3:

jaṃ jāṇiẏaü akkhaü raṇa-rasāhiu rahu sārahiṇa haṇuvahŏ sammuhu vāhiu  $  ḍhukkantu raṇĕ teṇa vi diṭṭhu kehaü raẏaṇāẏarĕṇa gaṅgā-vāhu jehaü

"caṅgaü pavaṇa-putta paĩ jujjhiu  $  jiṇavara-vaẏaṇu kaẏāvi ṇa vujjhiu
aṇuvaü guṇavaü ṇaü sikkhāvaü  $  paradhaṇa-vaü suṇāmu jiha sāvaü
ettiẏa jīva jeṇa saṃghāriẏa  $  ṇa vi jāṇahũ kahĩ thatti samāriẏa

"iu gharu iu pariẏaṇu iu kalattu"  $  ṇaü vujjhahi jiha saẏalehĩ cattu

saṇṇaddhu asesu vi sāhaṇu  $  rāmahŏ suggīvahŏ taṇaü
    ṇaṃ jamvūdīu paẏaṭṭaü  $  laṅkādīvahŏ pāhuṇaü

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa III, Saṃdhi 56, Kaḍavaka 8:

*************************  IV. jujjhakaṇḍaṃ  *************************  
________________________________________________________________________



----------  [57. sattavaṇṇāsamo saṃdhi]  ----------


haṃsadīvĕ thiĕ rāma-valĕ  $  khohu jāu ṇisiẏara-saṅghāẏahŏ
jhatti mahīhara-siharu jiha  $  ṇivaḍiu hiẏaü dasāṇaṇa-rāẏahŏ


_______________________________________________________________

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 57, Kaḍavaka 1:


tūrahŏ saddu suṇevi  raüddahŏ  $  khuhiẏa laṅka ṇaṃ vela samuddahŏ
ehaĕ kālĕ aṇeẏaĩ jāṇaü  $  maṇĕṇa visaṇṇu vihīsaṇu rāṇaü
"ṇaṃ kula-selu samāhaü vajjeṃ  $  puri ṇandanti ṇaṭṭha viṇu kajjeṃ
kallĕ ji meraü ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  evahĩ dūsanthavaü ṇirāriu
to vi saṇeheṃ parihacchāvami  $  uppahĕ thiẏaü supantheṃ lāvami
jaï kaẏā vi uvasamaï dasāṇaṇu  $  pāveṃ chāiu para-mahilāṇaṇu
ema vi jaï mahu ṇa kiẏaü vuttaü  $  to riu-sāhaṇĕ milami ṇiruttaü
appāṇu vi ṇa hoi saṃsāriu  $  pariharievaü pārāẏāriu

ghatta


suhi jĕ sūlu paḍikulaṇaü  $  paru jĕ sahoẏaru jo aṇuattaï
    osahu dūruppaṇṇaü vi  $  vāhi sarīrahŏ kaḍḍhĕvi ghattaï"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 57, Kaḍavaka 2:


jo paratiẏa-paradavvāhiṃsaṇu  $  maṇĕ paricintĕvi ema vihīsaṇu
ahimuhu valiu dasāṇaṇa-rāẏahŏ  $  ṇaṃ guṇa-ṇivahu dosa-saṅghāẏahŏ
"bho bho bhū-bhūsaṇa bhaḍa-bhañjaṇa  $  khalahu mi khala sajjaṇahu mi sajjaṇa
rāvaṇa kiṇṇa gaṇahi mahu vaẏaṇaĩ  $  kiṇṇa ṇiẏahi ṇandantaĩ saẏaṇaĩ
kiṃ sa-gehu ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaru ṇa icchahi  $  kiṃ vajjāsaṇi sirĕṇa paḍicchahi
kiṃ devāvahi seṇṇu disā-vali  $  kiṃ urĕ dharahi jalaṇa-jālāvali
kiṃ āroḍahi rāhava-kesari  $  kiṃ jāṇantu khāhi visa-mañjari
kiṃ giri-samu vaḍḍattaṇu khaṇḍahi  $  kiṃ cārittu sīlu vaü chaṇḍahi
kiṃ vihaḍantaü kajju ṇa sandhahi  $  taïẏaĕ ṇaraĕ āu kiṃ vandhahi
ekku ajasu aṇṇekku amaṅgalu  $  jāṇaï dentaha para guṇu kevalu "

ghattā:

bhaṇaï dasāṇaṇu "bhāi suṇi  $  jāṇami pekkhami ṇaraẏahŏ saṅkami
ṇavara sarīrĕ vasantāĩ  $  pañcindiẏaĩ jiṇevi ṇa sakkami "

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 57, Kaḍavaka 3:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 57, Kaḍavaka 4:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 57, Kaḍavaka 8:

aggalĕ pacchalĕ a-parippamāṇa  $  jaü jaü jĕ diṭṭhi taü taü ji vāṇa
osariu māli ṇivisantareṇa  $  rahu diṇṇu tāmva vajjoareṇa
hakkāriu ahimuhu pavaṇa-jāu  $  "kahĩ jāhi pāva khaẏa-kālu āu
ettaḍeṇa ji tujjhu maraṭṭu jāu  $  jaṃ bhaggu bhiḍanteṃ māli-rāu

ghattā:

    abbhiḍahũ ve vi bhaẏa-bhāsura  $  raṇu pekkhantu surāsura"

saṇṇāhu laïu rahavarĕ caḍiu  $  rāvaṇa-ṇandaṇahŏ gampi bhiḍiu
hakkāraï paharaï ṇindaï vi  $  paṇavaï ghaṇavāhaṇu indaï vi
"tuhũ amhahã vandaṇa-joggu kiha  $  tihĩ sañjhahĩ parama-jiṇindu jiha

sā satti sattu-santāsaṇahŏ  $  kira muaï ṇa muaï vihīsaṇahŏ
tāvahĩ khara-dūsaṇa-maddaṇĕṇa  $  rahu antarĕ diṇṇu jaṇaddaṇeṇa
"arĕ khala jīvantu ṇa jāhi mahu  $  jaï satti satti to melli lahu"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi raẏaṇāsava-suĕṇa  $  āmelliẏa gañjolliẏa-bhuĕṇa
vindhantahũ ṇala-ṇīlaṅgaẏahũ  $  avarahu mi asesahũ kaïdhaẏahũ

      dihi rāvaṇahŏ  $  rāmahŏ dukkhuppatti jiha

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 1:


sarahasĕṇa parajjiẏa-āhaveṇa  $  sāmanta pajoiẏa rāhaveṇa
"kiṃ kahŏ vi atthi maṇu saïẏa-aṅgĕ  $  jo ei aṇuṭṭhantaĕ paẏaṅgĕ
jo jaṇaï maṇoraha mahu maṇāsu  $  jo jīviu dei jaṇaddaṇāsu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi maru-ṇandaṇeṇa  $  vuccaï rāvaṇa-vaṇa-maddaṇeṇa
"mahu atthi deva maṇu saïẏa-aṅgĕ  $  haũ emi aṇuṭṭhantaĕ paẏaṅgĕ
haũ jaṇami maṇohara tuha maṇāsu  $  haũ jīviu demi jaṇaddaṇāsu"
tārā-taṇaeṇa vi vuttu eva  $  "haũ haṇuvahŏ homi sahāu deva"
bhāmaṇḍalu pabhaṇaï "suṇu susāmi  $  haũ vihĩ uttara-sakkhiṇaü jāmi"

ghattā:

te jaṇaẏa-pavaṇa-suggīva-suẏa  $  rāmahŏ calaṇĕhĩ paḍiẏa kiha
    kallāṇa-kālĕ titthaṅkarahŏ  $  tiṇṇi vi tihuvaṇa-inda jiha


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 2:

ārūḍha vimāṇĕhĩ sundarehĩ  $  amarehi va savva-suhaṅkarehĩ
cumvaṇĕhĩ va ṇāṇāviha-sarehĩ  $  siva-paẏahĩ va muttāvali-dharehĩ
kāmiṇi-muhĕhĩ va vaṇṇujjalehĩ  $  chiñchaï-cittehĩ va cañcalehĩ
mahakaï-kavvehĩ va sughaḍiehĩ  $  supurisa-cariehĩ va paẏaḍiehĩ
therāsaṇehĩ va ali-muhaliehĩ  $  saï-cārittehĩ va akhaliehĩ
ṇava-jovvaṇĕhĩ va ṇaha-goẏarehĩ  $  jiṇa-sirĕhĩ va bhāmaṇḍala-dharehĩ
vaẏaṇehĩ va haṇuva-pasaṅgaehĩ  $  pāhuṇĕhĩ va gamaṇa-maṇaṅgaehĩ
thiẏa tehĩ vimāṇĕhĩ maṇimaehĩ  $  ṇaṃ vara-phullanduẏa paṅkaehĩ

ghattā:

maṇa-gamaṇĕhĩ gaẏaṇĕ paẏaṭṭaĕhĩ  $  lakkhiu lavaṇa-samuddu kiha
    mahi-maḍaẏahŏ ṇahaẏala-rakkhasĕṇa  $  phāḍiu jaṭhara-paesu jiha


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 3:

dīsaï raẏaṇāẏaru raẏaṇa-vāhu  $  viñjhu va sa-vāri chandu va sa-gāhu
atthāhu suhi va hatthi va karālu  $  bhaṇḍāriu vva vahu-raẏaṇa-pālu
sūhava-puriso vva saloṇa-sīlu  $  suggīvu va paẏaḍiẏa-indaṇīlu
jiṇa-suva-cakkavaï va kiẏa-vaselu  $  majjhaṇṇu va upparĕ caḍiẏa-velu
tavasi va paripāliẏa-samaẏa-sāru  $  dujjaṇa-puriso vva sahāva-khāru
ṇiddhaṇa-ālāvu va appamāṇu  $  joisu va mīṇa-kakkaḍaẏa-thāṇu
maha-kavva-ṇivandhu va sadda-gahiru  $  cāmīẏara-casaẏu va pīẏa-maïru
taṃ jalaṇihi ullaṅghantaehĩ  $  vohitthaĩ diṭṭhaĩ jantaehĩ
ṇīsīhavaḍaĩ lamviẏa-halāĩ  $  maharisi-cittāĩ va avicalāĩ

ghattā:

aṇṇu vi thovantaru jantaĕhĩ  $  tihi mi ṇihāliu giri malaü
      jo lavali-valahŏ candaṇa-sarahŏ  $  dāhiṇa-pavaṇahŏ thāmalaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 4:


jahĩ juvaï-paūru-parajjiẏāĩ  $  rattuppala-kaẏali-vaṇaĩ thiẏāĩ
kāmiṇi-gaï-chāẏā-bhaṃsiẏāĩ  $  jahĩ haṃsa-ulaĩ āvāsiẏāĩ
kara-karaẏala-ohāmiẏa-maṇāĩ  $  jahĩ mālaï-kaṅkellī-vaṇāĩ
jahĩ vaẏaṇa-ṇaẏaṇa-paha-ghalliẏāĩ  $  kamalindīvaraĩ samalliẏāĩ
jahĩ mahura-vāṇi avahatthiẏāĩ  $  koila-kulāĩ kasaṇaĩ thiẏāĩ
bhaühāvali-chāẏā-vaṅkiẏāĩ  $  jahĩ ṇimva-dalaĩ kaḍuẏaĩ kiẏāĩ
jahĩ cihura-bhāra-ohāmiẏāĩ  $  varahiṇa-kulāĩ rovāviẏāĩ
taṃ malaü muĕvi viharanti jāva  $  dāhiṇa-mahuraĕ āsaṇṇa tāva

ghattā:

kikkindha-mahāgiri lakkhiẏaü  $  tuṅga-siharu koḍḍāvaṇaü
    chuḍu ramiẏahĕ puhaï-vilāsiṇihĕ  $  ura-paesu sohāvaṇaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 5:

jahĩ indaṇīla-kara-bhijjamāṇu  $  sasi thāi juṇṇa-dappaṇa-samāṇu
jahĩ paümarāẏa-kara-teẏa-piṇḍu  $  rattuppala-saṇṇihu hoi caṇḍu
jahĩ maragaẏa-khāṇi vi vipphuranti  $  sasi-vimvu bhisiṇi-pattu va karanti
taṃ mellĕvi rahasucchaliẏa-gatta  $  ṇivisaddheṃ sari kāveri patta
jā laïẏa vihañjĕvi ṇaravarehĩ  $  mahakavva-kahā iva kaïvarehĩ
sāmiẏa-āṇā iva kiṅkarehĩ  $  titthaṅkara-vāṇi va gaṇaharehĩ
siva-sāsaẏa-motti va heuehĩ  $  vara-sadduppatti va dhāuehĩ
puṇu diṭṭha mahāṇaï tuṅgabhadda  $  kari-maẏara-maccha-ohara-raüdda

ghattā:
asahanteṃ vaṇadava-pavaṇa-jhaḍa  $  dūsaha-kiraṇa-divāẏarahŏ
    ṇaṃ sajjheṃ suṭṭhu tisāiĕṇa  $  jīha pasāriẏa sāẏarahŏ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 6:


puṇu diṭṭha pavāhiṇi kiṇhavaṇṇa  $  kiviṇattha-paütti va mahi-ṇisaṇṇa
puṇu indaṇīla-kaṇṭhiẏa dhareṇa  $  dakkhaviẏa samuddahŏ āẏareṇa
puṇu sari bhīmarahi jaloha-phāra  $  jā seuṇa-desahŏ amiẏa-dhāra
puṇu golā-ṇaï manthara-pavāha  $  sajjheṇa pasāriẏa ṇāĩ vāha
puṇu veṇṇi-paüṇhiu vāhiṇīu  $  ṇaṃ kuḍila-sahāvaü kāmiṇīu
puṇu tāvi mahāṇaï suppavāha  $  sajjaṇa-metti vva aladdha-thāha
thovantarālĕ puṇu viñjhu thāi  $  sīmantaü pihimihĕ taṇaü ṇāi
puṇu revā-ṇaï haṇuvaṅgaehĩ  $  sā ṇindiẏa rosa-vasaṅgaehĩ
"kiṃ viñjhahŏ pāsiu uvahi cāru  $  jo sa-visu kiviṇu accanta-khāru"
taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi sīẏa-sahoẏareṇa  $  ṇibbhacchiẏa ṇahaẏala-goẏareṇa

ghattā:

"jaṃ viñjhu muĕvi gaẏa sāẏarahŏ  $  mā rūsahŏ revā-ṇaïhĕ
      ṇilloṇu muaï saloṇu saraï  $  ṇiẏa-sahāu ĕu tiẏamaïhĕ"

_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 7:


sā ṇammaẏa dūrantarĕṇa catta  $  puṇu ujjaẏaṇi ṇiviseṇa patta
jahĩ jaṇavaü sa-dhaṇu mahā-ghaṇo vva  $  rāmovari vacchalu lakkhaṇo vva
guṇavantaü dhaṇuhara-saṅgaha vva  $  amuṇiẏa-kara-sira-taṇu vammaho vva
sa vi dummahila va ujjeṇi mukka  $  puṇu pāriẏattu mālavaü ḍhukka
jo dhaṇṇālaṅkiu ṇaravaï vva  $  ucchuhaṇu kusumasaru raïvaï vva
taṃ mellĕvi jaüṇā-ṇaï pavaṇṇa  $  jā alaẏa-jalaẏa-gavalāli-vaṇṇa
jā kasiṇa bhuaṅgi va visahŏ bhariẏa  $  kajjala-reha va ṇaṃ dharaĕ dhariẏa
thovantarĕ jala-ṇimmala-taraṅga  $  sasi-saṅkha-samappaha diṭṭha gaṅga

ghattā:

amhahã vihĩ garuvaü kavaṇu jaĕ  $  jujjhĕvi āeṃ maccharĕṇa
    himavantahŏ ṇaṃ avaharĕvi ṇiẏa  $  dhaẏa-vaḍāẏa raẏaṇāẏarĕṇa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 8:

thovantarĕ tihi mi aüjjha diṭṭha  $  puṇu siddhipurihĩ siddha va païṭṭha
jahĩ mihuṇaĩ ārambhiẏa-raẏāĩ  $  panthiẏa iva uccāiẏa-paẏāĩ
pāhuṇa iva avaruṇḍaṇa-maṇāĩ  $  girivara-gattā iva savvaṇāĩ
avicala-rajjā iva su-karaṇāĩ  $  risiula iva bhāva-parāẏaṇāĩ
dhaṇuhara iva guṇa-melliẏa-sarāĩ  $  aharattā iva paharāurāĩ
puṇu ṇaravaï maṃdirĕ gaẏa turanta  $  muṇi-suvvaẏa-jiṇa-maṅgalaĩ ganta
saggāvaẏārĕ jammābhiseĕ  $  ṇikkhavaṇĕ ṇāṇĕ ṇivvāṇacchaĕ
titthaẏara-parama-devāhã jāĩ  $  pañca vi kallāṇaĩ honti tāĩ

ghattā:

"mahi mandaru sāẏaru jāva ṇahu  $  jāva disaü mahaṇaï-jalaĩ
     taü hontu tāva jiṇa-kerāĩ  $  puṇṇa-pavittaĩ maṅgalaĩ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 9:


teṃ maṅgala-saddeṃ pahu viuddhu  $  ṇaṃ chaṇa-maẏalañchaṇu addha-addhu
ṇaṃ uaẏa-mahīharĕ taruṇa-mittu  $  ṇaṃ māṇasa-saru ravi-kiraṇa-chittu
ṇaṃ vāla-līlu kesari-kisoru  $  ṇaṃ suravaï sura-vahu-citta-coru
uṭṭhanteṃ vahu-maṇi-gaṇa-ciẏāĩ  $  lakkhiẏaĩ vimāṇaĩ khañciẏāĩ
ṇaṃ ṇahaẏala-kamalaĩ vihasiẏāĩ  $  sajjaṇa-vaẏaṇāĩ va pahasiẏāĩ
ṇikkāraṇĕ jāĩ papphulliẏāĩ  $  su-kalattaĩ ṇāĩ samalliẏāĩ
ṇiddiṭṭha vimāṇĕhĩ tehĩ vīra  $  savvāharaṇālaṅkiẏa-sarīra
paripucchiẏa "tumhĕ paẏaṭṭa ketthu  $  kiṃ māẏāpurisa paḍhukka etthu

ghattā:

hemanta-gimha-pāusa-samaẏa  $  kiṃ avaẏavĕhĩ alaṅkariẏa
    kiṃ tiṇṇi vi hari-hara-caüvaẏaṇa  $  āeṃ veseṃ avaẏariẏa"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 10:


vaẏaṇeṇa teṇa bharahahŏ taṇeṇa  $  vollijjaï jaṇaẏahŏ ṇandaṇeṇa
"haũ bhāmaṇḍalu haṇuvantu ehu  $  uhu aṅgaü rahasucchaliẏa-dehu
tiṇṇi vi āiẏa kajjeṇa jeṇa  $  suṇu akkhami kiṃ vahu-vitthareṇa
sīẏahĕ kāraṇĕ rosiẏa-maṇāhã  $  raṇu vaṭṭaï rāhava-rāvaṇāhã
lakkhaṇu sattiĕ viṇibhiṇṇu tetthu  $  dukkaru jīvaï teṃ āẏa etthu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi paripālielu  $  ṇaṃ kulisa-samāhaü paḍiu selu
ṇaṃ cavaṇa-kālĕ saggahŏ surindu  $  ummucchiu kaha vi kaha vi ṇarindu
dukkhāuru dhāhāvaṇahĩ laggu  $  puṇṇa-kkhaĕ hari va muantu saggu

ghattā:

"hā paĩ somitti marantaĕṇa  $  maraï ṇiruttaü dāsarahi
    bhattāra-vihūṇiẏa ṇāri jiha  $  ajju aṇāhīhūẏa mahi


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 11:


hā bhāẏara ekkasi dehi vāẏa  $  hā paĩ viṇu jaẏa-siri vihava jāẏa
hā bhāẏara mahu sirĕ paḍiu gaẏaṇu  $  hā hiẏaü phuṭṭu dakkhavahi vaẏaṇu
hā bhāẏara varahiṇa-mahura-vāṇi  $  mahu ṇivaḍio 'si dāhiṇaü pāṇi
hā kiṃ samuddĕ jala-ṇivahu khuṭṭu  $  hā kiha diḍhu kumma-kaḍāhu phuṭṭu
hā kiha suravaï lacchiĕ vimukku  $  hā kiha jamarāẏahŏ maraṇu ḍhukku
hā kiha diṇaẏaru kara-ṇiẏara-cattu  $  hā kiha aṇaṅgu dohaggu pattu
hā cañcalihūaü kema meru  $  hā kema jāu ṇiddhaṇu kuveru

ghattā:

hā ṇivvisu kiha dharaṇindu thiu  $  ṇippahu sasi sihi sīẏalaü
    ṭalaṭalihūī kema mahi  $  kema samīraṇu ṇiccalaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 12:

labbhaï raẏaṇāẏarĕ raẏaṇa-khāṇi  $  labbhaï koila-kulĕ mahura-vāṇi
labbhaï candaṇu giri-malaẏa-siṅgĕ  $  labbhaï suhavattaṇu juvaï-aṅgĕ
labbhaï dhaṇu dhaṇaĕ dharā-pavaṇṇu  $  labbhaï kañcaṇa-pāvaĕ suvaṇṇu
labbhaï pesaṇĕ sāmiẏa-pasāu  $  labbhaï kiĕ viṇaĕ jaṇāṇurāu
labbhaï sajjaṇĕ guṇa-dāṇa-kitti  $  siẏa asivarĕ guru-kulĕ parama titti
labbhaï vasiẏaraṇĕ kalatta-raẏaṇu  $  mahakavvĕ suhāsiu sukaï-vaẏaṇu
labbhaï uvaẏāra-maïĕ su-mittu  $  maddavĕhĩ vilāsiṇi-cāru-cittu
labbhaï para-tīrĕ mahagghu bhaṇḍu  $  vara-velu-mūlĕ veḍujja-khaṇḍu

ghattā:

gaĕ mottiu siṅghala-dīvĕ maṇi  $  vaïrāgarahŏ vajju paüru
    āẏaĩ savvaĩ labbhanti jaĕ  $  ṇavara ṇa labbhaï bhāi-varu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 13:

rovanteṃ dasaraha-ṇandaṇeṇa  $  dhāhāviu savveṃ pariẏaṇeṇa
dukkhāuru rovaï saẏalu lou  $  ṇaṃ cappĕvi cappĕvi bhariu sou
rovaï bhiccaẏaṇu samudda-hatthu  $  ṇaṃ kamala-saṇḍu hima-pavaṇa-ghatthu
rovaï anteuru soẏa-puṇṇu  $  ṇaṃ chijjamāṇu saṅkha-ulu vuṇṇu
rovaï avarāiva rāma-jaṇaṇi  $  kekkaẏa dāiẏa-taru-mūla-khaṇaṇi
rovaï suppaha vicchāẏa jāẏa  $  rovaï sumitta somitti-māẏa
"hā putta putta kettahi gao 'si  $  kiha sattiĕ vaccha-tthalĕ hao 'si
hā putta marantu ṇa joio 'si  $  daïveṇa keṇa vicchoio 'si

ghattā:

rovantiĕ lakkhaṇa-māẏariĕ  $  saẏalu lou rovāviẏaü
    kāruṇṇaĕ kavva-kahāĕ jiha  $  ko va ṇa aṃsu muāviẏaü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 14:


pariharĕvi sou bharahesareṇa  $  karavālu laïu dāhiṇa-kareṇa
raṇa-bheri samāhaẏa diṇṇa saṅkha  $  sāhaṇu saṇṇaddhu aladdha saṅkha
raha jottiẏa kiẏa kari sāri-sajja  $  pakkhariẏa turaṅgama jaẏa-jasajja
sarahasu saṇṇajjhaï bharahu jāva  $  bhāmaṇḍaleṇa viṇṇattu tā̃va
"paĩ gaĕṇa vi sijjhaï ṇāhĩ kajju  $  taṃ kari hari jīvaï jeṇa ajju
jaï diṇṇu visallahĕ taṇaü ṇhavaṇu  $  to akkhahi pesaṇu ṇa kiu kavaṇu"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇeppiṇu bhaṇaï rāu  $  "kiṃ salileṃ saĩ jĕ visalla jāu"
paṭṭhaviẏa mahallā gaẏa turanta  $  kaütikamaṅgalu ṇiviseṇa patta

ghattā:

viṇṇaviu ṇaveppiṇu doṇaghaṇu  $  "jīviu deva dehi harihĕ
    ṇīsaraü satti vacchatthalahŏ  $  jalĕṇa visallāsundarihĕ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 15:


ettaḍiẏa volla paḍivaṇṇa jāva  $  kekkaï sampāviẏa tahĩ ji tāva
paṇaveppiṇu bhāẏaru vuttu tīĕ  $  "karĕ gamaṇu visallā-sundariĕ
jīvaü lakkhaṇu hammaü dasāsu  $  pūrantu maṇoraha rāhavāsu
āṇandu pavaḍḍhaü jāṇaīhĕ  $  taṇu tāraü dukkha-mahāṇaīhĕ
aṇṇu vi visalla tahŏ puvva-diṇṇa  $  laggaü karaẏalĕ sabbhāva-bhiṇṇa"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi parituṭṭhu doṇu  $  "uṭṭhaü ṇārāẏaṇu akhaẏa-toṇu"
paṭṭhaviẏa visalla khaṇantareṇa  $  sahũ kaṇṇa-sahāseṃ uttareṇa
gaẏa jaẏakāreppiṇu doṇamehu  $  kekkaïẏa parāiẏa ṇiẏaẏa-gehu

ghattā:

haṇuvaṅgaẏa-bhāmaṇḍala-bharaha  $  diṭṭha visallā-sundariĕ
    ṇaṃ majjha-padesĕ païṭṭhiẏaĕ  $  caü maẏarahara vasundhariĕ

_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 69, Kaḍavaka 16:


sa vi ṇaẏaṇakaḍakkhiẏa dujjaehĩ  $  siẏa ṇāvaï caühu mi disa-gaehĩ
teṃ pulaïẏa ṇava-ṇīluppalacchi  $  vavasāu karantahŏ kahŏ ṇa lacchi
puṇu pomāiu lakkhaṇu kumāru  $  "saṃsārahŏ laï ettaḍaü sāru
jaï jīviu keva vi kaha vi pattu  $  to dhaṇṇaü jasu ehaü kalattu"
bhāmaṇḍaleṇa kokkāviẏāu  $  lahu ṇiẏaẏa-vimāṇĕ caḍāviẏāu
tiṇṇi vi saṃcalla ṇahaṅgaṇeṇa  $  gaẏa laṅka parāiẏa takkhaṇeṇa
jiha jiha kaṇṇaü ḍhukkanti tāu  $  tiha tiha vimalīhūẏaü disāu
rāmeṇa vuttu "jamvava vihāṇu  $  laï appaü dahami hariṃ samāṇu"

ghattā:

----------  [74. caüsattarimo saṃdhi]  ----------

lakkhaṇĕ puṇu mi satti saṃcārami  $  aṅgaṅgaẏa jamaüri païsārami
pāḍami vāṇara-vaṃsa-paīvahŏ  $  matthaĕ vajja-daṇḍu suggīvahŏ
candahāsu candoẏara-ṇandaṇĕ  $  vāẏavu vāueva-suẏa-sandaṇĕ
vāruṇu bhāmaṇḍalĕ bhaẏa-bhīsaṇĕ  $  dhagadhagantu aggeu vihīsaṇĕ
ṇāgavāsu māhinda-mahindahũ  $  vaïsavaṇatthu kumua-kundendahũ
moḍami gavaẏa-gavakkhahũ cindhaĩ  $  ṇaccāvami ṇala-ṇīla-kavandhaĩ
tāra-suseṇa demi vali bhūẏahũ  $  avara vi ṇemi pāsu jama-dūẏahũ

ghattā:

jasu indādeva vi āṇakara  $  dāsi vva kiẏañjali sa-dhara dhara
    so jaï ārūsami dahavaẏaṇu  $  to hari-vala saṇḍha kavaṇu gahaṇu"

bhiḍiẏa matta māẏaṅga matta-māẏaṅgahũ

ko vi bhaḍahŏ bhaḍu bhiḍĕvi ṇa icchaï  $  sagga-gamaṇu sahũ surĕhĩ paḍicchaï
ko vi sarāūriẏa-karu dhāvaï  $  raṇa-vahu-avaruṇḍantaü ṇāvaï
kāsu i vāhu-daṇḍu vāṇaggeṃ  $  ṇiu bhuaṅgu ṇaṃ garuḍa-vihaṅgeṃ
kāsu i vāṇa ṇirantara laggā  $  paḍiva ṇa devi ṇa keṇa vi bhaggā
ṇigguṇa jaï vi dhamma-paricattā  $  te ji vandhu je avasarĕ pattā
ṇaccaï kahi mi ruṇḍu raṇa-bhūmihĕ  $  ṇīriṇu huu ṇiẏa-sirĕṇa su-sāmihĕ
kāsu i bhaḍahŏ sīsu utthaliẏaü  $  gaẏaṇahŏ gampi paḍīvaü valiẏaü
dhua-dhavalāẏavattĕ ālīṇaü  $  rāhu-vimvu sasi-vimvĕ caḍīṇaü

ghattā:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 75, Kaḍavaka 10:

dasaraha-ṇandaṇeṇa te chiṇṇa ṇahĕ cciẏa paḍiẏa paḍivahaṃ

to hasiu rāmeṇa  $  rāmāhirāmeṇa
ucchaliẏa-ṇāmeṇa  $  laddhārithāmeṇa
"dhaṇuveẏa-parihīṇa  $  osaru parāhīṇa
jajjāhi āvāsu  $  aṇṇamaü guru-pāsu
dhaṇu-lakkhaṇaṃ vujjhu  $  divasehĩ puṇu jujjhu
eṇa ji paẏāveṇa  $  duṇṇaẏa-sahāveṇa
saṃtāviẏā deva  $  kārāviẏā seva
ahavaï asārāhã  $  raṇĕ cora-jārāhã
viẏalanti sattāĩ  $  ṇa vahanti gattāĩ"
to ṇisiẏarindeṇa  $  ṇijjiẏa-surindeṇa
jama-dhaṇaẏa-jhampeṇa  $  kaïlāsa-kampeṇa
sahasaẏara-dharaṇeṇa  $  vara-varuṇa-varaṇeṇa
sura-bhavaṇa-bhīseṇa  $  vīsaddha-sīseṇa
kovaggi-ditteṇa  $  vahaṇekka-citteṇa
tama-puñja-deheṇa  $  ṇaṃ palaẏa-meheṇa
bhū-bhaṅguraccheṇa  $  maṇa-pavaṇa-daccheṇa

ghattā:
vīsahi mi karĕhĩ vīsāuhaĩ  $  ekka-vāra raṇĕ mukkāĩ
      gharu kiviṇahŏ bhāmantu vaï jiha   $  rāmahŏ pāsu ṇa ḍhukkāĩ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 75, Kaḍavaka 11:

duvaī
ṇavara dasāṇaṇeṇa vāmohu tamohu saro visajjio
so vi valuddhureṇa rāmeṇa paẏaṅga-sareṇa ṇijjio

rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu kulisa-daṇḍu  $  sŏ vi rāmeṃ kiu saẏa-khaṇḍa-khaṇḍu
rāmaṇĕṇa samāhaü pāẏaveṇa  $  sŏ vi bhaggu mahattheṃ vāẏaveṇa
rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu giri vicittu  $  sŏ vi rāmeṃ vali jiha disahĩ ghittu
aggeu mukku dasa-kandhareṇa  $  ulhāviu so vi vāruṇa-sareṇa
rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu paṇṇaẏatthu  $  sŏ vi gāruḍa-vāṇĕhĩ kiu ṇiratthu
rāmaṇĕṇa gaẏāṇaṇa-sara vimukka  $  tāha mi vala-vāṇa-maïnda ḍhukka
rāmaṇĕṇa visajjiu sāẏaratthu  $  taṃ mandara-ghāeṃ ṇiu ṇiratthu
jaṃ jaṃ āmellaï ṇisiẏarindu  $  taṃ taṃ vi ṇivāraï rāmacandu

ghattā:

raṇĕ rāmaṇa-rāma-sarĕhĩ valaĩ  $  samara-bhūmi mellāviẏaĩ
      dupputtahĩ jiha pahavantaĕhĩ  $  uhaẏa-kulaĩ saṃtāviẏaĩ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 75, Kaḍavaka 12:

vihĩ hatthĕhĩ paharaï rāmacandu  $  vīsahĩ bhuva-daṇḍĕhĩ ṇisiẏarindu
a-pavāṇa vāṇa rāhavahŏ to vi  $  jajjariẏa laṅka raẏaṇāẏaro vi

bhijjanti valaĩ jalĕ jalaẏarā vi  $  ṇahĕ ṇaṭṭha deva thalĕ thalaẏarā vi
so ṇa vi gaẏavaru so ṇa vi turaṅgu  $  so ṇa vi rahavaru taṇ ṇa vi rahaṅgu
so ṇa vi dhaü taṇ ṇa vi āẏavattu  $  jahĩ rāma-sarahã saü saü ṇa pattu
