PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 1:


ṇivaḍiĕ rāvaṇĕ tihuaṇa-kaṇṭaĕ  $  kula-maṅgala-kalasĕ vva visaṭṭaĕ
ṇaha-siri-dappaṇĕ vva vicchuṭṭaĕ  $  lacchi-varaṅgaṇa-hārĕ va tuṭṭaĕ
puhaï-vilāsiṇi-māṇĕ va galiẏaĕ  $  raṇavahu-jovvaṇe vva daramaliẏaĕ
dāhiṇa-disa-gaĕ vva oṇallaĕ  $  ṇīsāriĕ va surāsura-sallaĕ
raṇa-devaẏa-ṇamaṃsiĕ va diṇṇaĕ  $  toẏadavāhaṇa-vaṃsĕ va chiṇṇaĕ
cavaṇa-purandarĕ vva saṃkamiĕ  $  kālahŏ diṇaẏarĕ vva atthamiĕ
laṅkāuri-pāẏārĕ va paḍiẏaĕ  $  sīẏa-saẏattaṇĕ vva ṇivvaḍiẏaĕ
tama-saṅghāĕ va puñjĕvi mukkaĕ  $  añjaṇa-selĕ va thāṇahŏ cukkaĕ

ghattā:

teṇa paḍanteṃ pāḍiẏaĩ  $  cittaĩ raṇĕ raẏaṇīẏara-ṇāmahũ
    pāṇa mahārahĕ mahiharahŏ  $  sura-kusumaĩ sirĕ lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 2:


amarĕhĩ sāhukkāriĕ hari-valĕ  $  vijaĕ paghuṭṭhĕ samuṭṭhiĕ kalaẏalĕ
tahĩ avasarĕ maṇi-gaṇa-vipphuriẏahĕ  $  upparĕ karu karevi ṇiẏa-churiẏahĕ
appaü haṇaï vihīsaṇu jāvĕhĩ   $  mucchaĕ ṇāĩ ṇivāriu tāvehĩ
ṇivaḍiu dharaṇi-paṭṭĕ ṇicceẏaṇu  $  dukkhu samuṭṭhiu pasariẏa-veẏaṇu
caraṇa dharevi ruevaĕ laggaü  $  "hā bhāẏara maĩ muĕvi kahiṃ gaü
hā hā bhāẏara ṇa kiu ṇivāriu  $  jaṇa-viruddhu vavahariu ṇirāriu
hā bhāẏara sarīrĕ sukumāraĕ  $  kema viẏāriu cakkahŏ dhāraĕ
hā bhāẏara duṇṇiddaĕ bhuttaü  $  sejja muĕvi kiṃ mahiẏalĕ suttaü

ghattā:

kiṃ avaheri karevi thiu  $  sīsĕ caḍāviẏa calaṇa tuhārā
   acchami suṭṭhummāhiẏaü  $  hiẏaü phuṭṭu āliṅgi bhaḍārā"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 3:


ruaï vihīsaṇu soẏakkamiẏaü  $  "tuhũ ṇatthamiu vaṃsu atthamiẏaü
tuhũ ṇa jio 'si saẏalu jiu tihuaṇu  $  tuhũ ṇa muo 'si muaü vandiẏa-jaṇu
tuhũ paḍio 'si ṇa paḍiu purandaru  $  maüḍu ṇa bhaggu bhaggu giri-mandaru
diṭṭhi ṇa ṇaṭṭha ṇaṭṭha laṅkāuri  $  vāẏa ṇa ṇaṭṭha ṇaṭṭha mandoẏari
hāru ṇa tuṭṭu tuṭṭu tārāẏaṇu  $  hiẏaü ṇa bhiṇṇu bhiṇṇu gaẏaṇaṅgaṇu
cakku ṇa ḍhukku ḍhukku ekkantaru  $  āu ṇa khuṭṭu khuṭṭu raẏaṇāẏaru
jīu ṇa gaü gaü āsā-poṭṭalu  $  tuhũ ṇa suttu suttaü mahi-maṇḍalu
sīẏa ṇa āṇiẏa āṇiẏa jamaüri  $  hari-vala kuddha ṇa kuddhā kesari

ghattā:

suravara-saṇḍha-varāiṇā  $  saẏala-kāla je miga sambhūẏā
    rāvaṇa paĩ sīheṇa viṇu  $  te vi ajju sacchandīhūẏā


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 4:


saẏala-surāsura-diṇṇa-pasaṃsahŏ  $  ajju amaṅgalu rakkhasa-vaṃsahŏ
khala-khuddahũ pisuṇahũ duviẏaḍḍhahũ  $  ajju maṇoraha suravara-saṇḍhahũ
dunduhi vajjaü gajjaü sāẏaru  $  ajju tavaü sacchandu divāẏaru
ajju miẏaṅku hou pahavantaü  $  vāu vāu jagĕ ajju saïttaü
ajju dhaṇaü dhaṇa-riddhi ṇiẏacchaü  $  ajju jalantu jalaṇu jagĕ acchaü
ajju jamahŏ ṇivvahaü jamattaṇu  $  ajju kareu indu indattaṇu
ajju ghaṇahã pūrantu maṇoraha  $  ajju ṇiraggala hontu mahāgaha
ajju papphullaü phalaü vaṇāsaï  $  ajju gāu mokkalaü sarāsaï

ghattā:

tāva dasāṇaṇu āhaẏaṇĕ  $  paḍiu suṇevi sa-doru sa-ṇeuru
    dhāiu mandoẏari-pamuhu  $  dhāhāvantu saẏalu anteuru


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 5:


dummaṇu dukkha-mahaṇṇavĕ ghittaü  $  piẏa-vioẏa-jāloli-palittaü
mokkala-kesu visaṇṭhula-gattaü  $  vihaḍapphaḍu ṇivaḍantuṭṭhantaü
uddha-hatthu uddhāhāvantaü  $  aṃsu-jaleṇa vasuha siñcantaü
ṇeura-hāra-dora-guppantaü  $  candaṇa-chaḍa-kaddamĕ khuppantaü
pīṇa-paohara-bhārakkantaü  $  kajjala-jala-mala-maïlijjantaü
ṇaṃ koila-kulu kahi mi paẏaṭṭaü  $  ṇaṃ gaṇiẏāri-jūhu vicchuṭṭaü
ṇaṃ kamaliṇi-vaṇu thāṇahŏ cukkaü  $  ṇaṃ haṃsiulu mahāsara-mukkaü
kaluṇa-sareṇa rasantu padhāiu  $  ṇiviseṃ raṇa-dharitti sampāiu

ghattā:

haẏa-gaẏa-bhaḍa-ruhirāruṇiẏa  $  samara-vasundhari soha ṇa pāvaï
    rattaü parihĕvi paṅgurĕvi  $  thiẏa rāvaṇa-aṇumaraṇeṃ ṇāvaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 6:


diṭṭhu mahāhavu viṇivāiẏa-bhaḍu  $  āmisa-soṇiẏa-rasa-vasa-vīsaḍu
haḍḍa-ruṇḍa-vicchaḍḍa-bhaẏaṅkaru  $  loṭṭāviẏa-dhaẏa-cindha-ṇirantaru
ṇacciẏa-uddha-kavandha-visanthulu  $  vāẏasa-ghora-giddha-siva-saṅkulu
kahi mi āẏavattaĩ sasi-dhavalaĩ  $  ṇaṃ raṇa-devaẏa-accaṇa-kamalaĩ
kahi mi turaṅga vāṇa-viṇibhiṇṇā  $  raṇa-devaẏahĕ ṇāĩ vali diṇṇā
kahi mi sarehĩ dhariẏa ṇahĕ kuñjara  $  ṇaṃ jala-dhārā-ūriẏa jalahara
kahi mi rahaṅga-bhagga thiẏa rahavara  $  ṇaṃ vajjāsaṇi-sūḍiẏa mahihara
tahĩ dahavaẏaṇu diṭṭhu vahu-vāhaü  $  kappa-taru vva paloṭṭiẏa-sāhaü
rajja-gaẏālaṇa-khambhu va chiṇṇaü  $  lakkhaṇa-cakka-raẏaṇa-viṇibhiṇṇaü

ghattā:

daha diẏahāĩ sa-rattiẏaĩ  $  jaṃ jujjhantu ṇa ṇiddaĕ bhuttaü
      teṇa cakka-sejjahĩ caḍĕvi  $  raṇa-vahuaĕ samāṇu ṇaṃ suttaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 7:


diṭṭhu puṇo vi ṇāhu piẏa-ṇārihĩ  $  suttu matta-hatthi va gaṇiẏārihĩ
vāhiṇihĩ va sukkaü raẏaṇāẏaru  $  kamaliṇihĩ va atthavaṇa-divāẏaru
kumuiṇihi vva jaraḍha-maẏalañchaṇu  $  vijjuhi vva chuḍu chuḍu varisiẏa-ghaṇu
amara-vahūhĩ va cavaṇa-purandaru  $  gimbha-disāhĩ va añjaṇa-mahiharu
bhamarāvalihi mva sūḍiẏa-taruvaru  $  kalahaṃsīhi mva a-jalu mahā-saru
kalaẏaṇṭhīhi mva māhava-ṇiggamu  $  ṇāiṇihĩ va haẏa-garuḍa-bhuẏaṅgamu
vahula-paosu va tārā-pantihĩ  $  tema dasāsa-pāsu ḍhukkantihĩ
dasa-siru dasa-seharu dasa-maüḍaü  $  giri va sa-kandaru sa-taru sa-kūḍaü

ghattā:

ṇiĕvi avattha dasāṇaṇahŏ  $  "hā hā sāmi" bhaṇantu sa-veẏaṇu
    anteuru mucchā-vihalu  $  ṇivaḍiu mahihĩ jhatti ṇicceẏaṇu


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 8:


tārā-cakku va thāṇahŏ cukkaü  $  dukkhu dukkhu mucchaĕ āmukkaü
lagga ruevvaĕ tahĩ mandoẏari  $  uvvasi rambha tilottama sundari
candavaẏaṇa sirikantāṇuddhari  $  kamalāṇaṇa gandhāri vasundhari
mālaï campaẏamāla maṇohari  $  jaẏasiri candaṇaleha taṇūari
lacchi vasantaleha migaloẏaṇa  $  joẏaṇagandha gori goroẏaṇa
raẏaṇāvali maẏaṇāvali suppaha  $  kāmaleha kāmalaẏa saẏampaha
suhaẏa vasantatilaẏa malaẏāvaï  $  kuṅkumaleha paüma paümāvaï
uppalamāla guṇāvali ṇiruvama  $  kitti vuddhi jaẏalacchi maṇorama

ghattā:

āĕhĩ soāūriẏahĩ  $  aṭṭhārahahi mi juvaï-sahāsĕhĩ
    ṇava-ghaṇa-mālāḍamvarĕhĩ  $  chāiu viñjhu jema caü-pāsĕhĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 9:


rovaï laṅkā-pura-paramesari  $  "hā rāvaṇa tihuaṇa-jaṇa-kesari
paĩ viṇu samara-tūru kahŏ vajjaï  $  paĩ viṇu vāla-kīla kahŏ chajjaï
paĩ viṇu ṇava-gaha-ekkīkaraṇaü  $  ko parihesaï kaṇṭhāharaṇaü
paĩ viṇu ko vi vijja ārāhaï  $  paĩ viṇu candahāsu ko sāhaï
ko gandhavva-vāvi āḍohaï  $  kaṇṇahã cha vi sahāsu saṃkhohaï
paĩ viṇu ko kuveru bhañjesaï  $  tijagavihūsaṇu kahŏ vasihosaï
paĩ viṇu ko jamu viṇivāresaï  $  ko kaïlāsuddharaṇu karesaï
sahasakiraṇa-ṇalakuvvara-sakkahũ  $  ko ari hosaï sasi-varuṇakkahũ
ko ṇihāṇa-raẏaṇaĩ pālesaï  $  ko vahurūviṇi vijja laesaï

ghattā:

sāmiẏa paĩ bhavieṇa viṇu  $  puppha-vimāṇĕ caḍĕvi guru-bhattiĕ
      meru-siharĕ jiṇa-mandiraĩ  $  ko maĩ ṇesaï vandaṇa-hattiĕ"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 10:


puṇu vi puṇu vi gaẏaṇaṅgaṇagoẏari  $  kaluṇakkandu karaï mandoẏari
"ṇandaṇa-vaṇĕ dijjanti maṇohari  $  sumarami pāriẏāẏa-taru-mañjari
vuḍḍaṇa-vāvihĕ thaṇa-paricaḍḍaṇu  $  sumarami īsi īsi avaruṇḍaṇu
saẏaṇa-bhavaṇĕ ṇaha-ṇiẏara-viẏāraṇu  $  sumarami līlā-paṅkaẏa-tāḍaṇu
paṇaẏa-rosa-samae maẏa-vaddhaṇu  $  sumarami rasaṇā-dāma-ṇivandhaṇu
sumarami dijjamāṇu daṇu-dāvaṇi  $  dharaṇindahŏ keraü cūḍā-maṇi
sumarami sāmi kumārahŏ keraü  $  varahiṇa-pehuṇa-kaṇṇeūraü
sumarami sura-kari-maẏa-mala-sāmalu  $  hārĕ ṭhavijjamāṇu muttāhalu

ghattā:

sumarami saĩ suraẏāruhaṇĕ  $  ṇeura-vara-jhaṅkāra-vilāsu
    to i mahāraü vajjamaü  $  hiẏaü ṇa ve-dalu hoi ṇirāsu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 11:


puṇu vi puṇu vi mandoẏari jampaï  $  "uṭṭhĕ bhaḍārā kettiu suppaï
jaï vi ṇirāriu ṇiddaĕ bhuttaü  $  to vi ṇa sohahi mahiẏalĕ suttaü
sāmiẏa ko avarāhu mahāraü  $  sīẏahĕ dūī gaẏa saẏa-vāraü
to i a-kāraṇĕ jjĕ āruṭṭhaü  $  jeṇa pariṭṭhiu pārāuṭṭhaü"
tahĩ avasarĕ piu pekkhĕvi ghāiu  $  kā vi karei alīẏaï (?) sāiu
āliṅgeppiṇu savvāẏāmeṃ  $  kā vi ṇivandhaï rasaṇā-dāmeṃ
kā vi varaṃsueṇa ka vi hāreṃ  $  kā vi suandha-kusuma-pabbhāreṃ
ka vi urĕ tāḍĕvi līlā-kamaleṃ  $  pabhaṇaï maülieṇa muha-kamaleṃ

ghattā:
"tumhahã cakka-dhāra-vahua  $  jaï vi ṇirāriu pāṇahã ruccaï
    to kiṃ mahu pekkhantiẏahĕ  $  hiẏaĕ païṭṭhī ṇivisu ṇa muccaï"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 12:


ka vi kesāvali raṅkholāvaï  $  ṇaṃ kasaṇāhi-panti khelāvaï
kā vi kuḍila-bhaühāvali dāvaï  $  haṇaï maẏaṇa-dhaṇu-laṭṭhiĕ ṇāvaï
kā vi ṇiei diṭṭhiĕ su-visālaĕ   $  ṇaṃ ḍhaṅkaï ṇīluppala-mālaĕ
ka vi ahisiñcaï avirala-vāheṃ  $  pāusa-siri giri vva jala-vāheṃ
kā vi piẏāṇaṇĕ āṇaṇu lāẏaï  $  ṇaṃ kamalovari kamalu caḍāvaï
ka vi āliṅgaï bhuahĩ visālahĩ  $  ṇaṃ omālaï mālaï-mālahĩ
ka vi parimasaï agga-hatthaẏaleṃ  $  chivaï ṇāĩ ṇava-līlā-kamaleṃ
ka vi ṇimmala-kararuha paẏaḍāvaï  $  ṇaṃ daha-muhahũ va dappaṇu dāvaï
kā vi paohara-ghaḍa-jualeṇaṃ  $  ṇaṃ siñcaï lāẏaṇṇa-jaleṇaṃ

ghattā:

tahĩ avasarĕ keṇa vi ṇarĕṇa  $  indaï-kumbhaẏaṇṇa-āvāsaĕ
      sahasā jiha ṇa maranti tiha  $  rāvaṇa-maraṇu kahiu parihāsaĕ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 13:


"ajju mahantu diṭṭhu accariẏaü  $  kiha kamaleṇa kulisu jajjariẏaü
kiha muṭṭhiĕ meru i musumūriu  $  kiha pāẏālu tiladdheṃ pūriu
kiha indhaṇĕṇa daddhu vaïsāṇaru  $  kiha culueṇa susiu raẏaṇāẏaru
kiha poṭṭalĕṇa ṇivaddhu pahañjaṇu  $  kiha kareṇa ḍhaṅkiu maẏalañchaṇu
diṇaẏaru teẏa-rāsi kara-dūsahu  $  kiha joiṅgaṇeṇa kiu ṇippahu
kiha paḍeṇa pacchaṇṇu pahāẏaü  $  kiha siva-pahu aṇṇāṇeṃ ṇāẏaü
kiha paramāṇueṇa ṇahu chāiu  $  kiha goppaĕ mahi-maṇḍalu māiu
kiha masaeṇa tuliu bhuvaṇa-ttaü  $  maraṇāvattha kālu kaha pattaü"

ghattā:

taṃ erisaü vaẏaṇu suṇĕvi  $  rāvaṇa-taṇaẏahũ vikkama-sārahũ
    indaï-pamuhaü mucchiẏaü  $  addha-pañca koḍīu kumārahũ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 14:

ṇivaḍiu kumbhaẏaṇṇu sahũ puttĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ maẏalañchaṇu sahũ ṇakkhattĕhĩ
ṇaṃ amarāhiu sahiẏaü amarĕhĩ  $  sittu jaleṇa pavijjiu camarĕhĩ
uṭṭhiu dukkhu dukkhu dukkhāuru  $  soẏahŏ taṇaü ṇāĩ paḍhamaṅkuru
laggu ruevaĕ "hā hā bhāẏari  $  hā hā haü hariṇehĩ va kesari
hā vihi tuhu mi hūu dāliddiu  $  hā savvaṇhu tuhu mi kiha chiddiu
hā jama tuhu mi mahāhavĕ ghāiu  $  hā raẏaṇāẏara tuhu mi tisāiu
hā maru tuhu mi ṇivandhaṇu pattaü  $  hā ravi tuhu mi kiraṇa-paricattaü
hā daḍḍho 'si tuhu mi dhūmaddhaẏa  $  ṇīsohaggu tuhu mi maẏaraddhaẏa

ghattā:

hā acalinda tuhu mi caliu  $  tuhu mi paẏāvaï bhukkhaĕ bhaggaü
    puṇṇa-mahakkhaĕ pekkhu kiha  $  vajjamae vi khambhĕ ghuṇu laggaü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 76, Kaḍavaka 15:


tāva sa-veẏaṇu uṭṭhiu indaï  $  appaü haṇaï ghivaï pariṇindaï
"hā hā tāẏa tāẏa māṇuṇṇaẏa  $  suravara-samara-sahāsahĩ dujjaẏa
paĩ atthantaeṇa atthamiẏaĩ  $  volliẏa-hasiẏa-ramiẏa-paribhamiẏaĩ
sutta-viuddha-gamaṇa-āgamaṇaĩ  $  parihiẏa-jimiẏa-pasāhiẏa-ṇhavaṇaĩ
vaṇa-kīlā-jala-kīlā-thāṇaĩ  $  puttucchava-vivāha-vara-pāṇaĩ
geẏa-paṇacciẏāĩ vara-vajjaĩ  $  pariẏaṇa-piṇḍavāsa-siẏa-rajjaĩ"
toẏadavāhaṇo vi sa-kumāraü  $  mucchāvijjaï saẏa-saẏa-vāraü
kandaï kaṇaï pavaḍḍhiẏa-veẏaṇu  $  avirala-vāhāūriẏa-loẏaṇu

ghattā:

dukkhu dasāṇaṇa-pariẏaṇahŏ  $  sīẏahĕ dihi jaü lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ
    sura vi sa iṃ bhu va ṇahũ caliẏa  $  laṅka païṭṭha kaïddhaẏa-ṇāmahũ


----------  [77. sattasattarimo saṃdhi]  ----------


bhāi-vioeṃ  $  jiha jiha karaï vihīsaṇu sou
tiha tiha dukkhĕṇa  $  ruvaï sa-hari-vala-vāṇara-lou


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 1:


dummaṇu dummaṇa-vaẏaṇaü  $  aṃsu-jalolliẏa-ṇaẏaṇaü
ḍhukku kaïddhaẏa-satthaü  $  jahĩ rāvaṇu palhatthaü
teṇa samāṇu viṇiggaẏa-ṇāmĕhĩ  $  diṭṭhu dasāṇaṇu lakkhaṇa-rāmĕhĩ
diṭṭhaĩ sa-maüḍa-siraĩ paloṭṭaĩ  $  ṇāĩ sa-kesarāĩ kandoṭṭaĩ
diṭṭhaĩ bhālaẏalaĩ pāẏaḍiẏaĩ  $  addhaẏanda-vimvāĩ va paḍiẏaĩ
diṭṭhaĩ maṇi-kuṇḍalaĩ sa-teẏaĩ  $  ṇaṃ khaẏa-ravi-maṇḍalaĩ aṇeẏaĩ
diṭṭhaü bhaühaü bhiuḍi-karālaü  $  ṇaṃ palaẏaggi-sihaü dhūmālaü
diṭṭhaĩ dīha-visālaĩ ṇettaĩ  $  mihuṇā iva āmaraṇāsattaĩ
muha-kuharaĩ daṭṭhoṭṭhaĩ diṭṭhaĩ  $  jamakaraṇāĩ va jamahŏ aṇiṭṭhaĩ
diṭṭha mahabbhuva bhaḍa-sandoheṃ  $  ṇaṃ pāroha mukka ṇaggoheṃ
diṭṭhu ura-tthalu phāḍiu cakkeṃ  $  diṇa-majjhu a(?) majjhattheṃ akkeṃ
avaṇiẏalu va viñjheṇa vihañjiu  $  ṇaṃ vihĩ bhāĕhĩ timiru va puñjiu

ghattā:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 14:


"re re jaṇa ṇīsāraü  $  viṭṭalu khalu saṃsāraü
darisiẏa-ṇāṇāvatthaü  $  dukkhāvāsu vi gatthaü
jahĩ uḍḍanti mahīhara vāeṃ  $  tahĩ kiṃ gahaṇu reṇu-saṃghāeṃ
jahĩ jalaṇeṇa jalanti jalāĩ vi  $  tahĩ tiṇohu kiṃ cukkaï kāĩ vi
jahĩ kulisāĩ janti saẏa-sakkaru  $  tahĩ kamalahũ kettaḍaü maḍappharu
hoi mahaṇṇavo vi jahĩ ṇippaü  $  tahiṃ pajjharaï kāĩ kira goppaü
jahĩ aïrāvaṇo vi ummajjaï  $  tahĩ kira kāĩ sasaü galagajjaï
jahĩ ṇitteu taraṇi ṇaha-maṇḍaṇu  $  tahĩ kiṃ karaï kanti joiṅgaṇu
jahĩ vuḍḍaï acalindu samatthaü  $  tahĩ kira kavaṇu gahaṇu siddhatthaü
kumma-kaḍāha-ẏalu vi jahĩ phuṭṭaï  $  tahĩ kumhāra-ghaḍaü kiṃ chuṭṭaï

ghattā:

jahĩ palaẏaṅgaü  $  rāvaṇu tihuẏaṇa-vaṇagaẏa-aṅkusu
      uṇṇaïvantaü  $  tahĩ sāmaṇṇu kāĩ kira māṇusu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 15:


tāva dasāṇaṇa-pariẏaṇu  $  soāuru heṭṭhāṇaṇu
païsaï kamala-mahāsarĕṇa  $  ṇāvaï cintā-sāẏarĕṇa
kamalāẏara-tīrantarĕ thakvĕvi  $  pabhaṇaï rahuvaï ṇaravara kokkĕvi
"ahŏ vijjāhara-vaṃsa-paīvahŏ  $  bhāmaṇḍala-suseṇa-suggīvahŏ
jamvava-maïsamudda-maïkantahŏ  $  dahimuha-kumua-kunda-haṇuvantahŏ
rambha-virāhiẏa-tāra-taraṅgahŏ  $  candakiraṇa-karaṇaṅgaẏa-aṅgahŏ
gavaẏa-gavakkha-susaṅkha-ṇarindahŏ  $  ṇala-ṇīlahŏ māhinda-mahindahŏ
indaï-kumbhaẏaṇṇa lahu āṇahŏ  $  loẏācāru karahŏ sarĕ ṇhāṇahŏ"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi vuttu sāmantĕhĩ  $  pañca-paẏāra-manta-maïvantĕhĩ
"ṇāha ṇa hoi ehu bhallāraü"  $  savvahã jaṇaṇa-vaïru vaḍḍāraü

ghattā:

indaï-rāṇaü  $  salilu ṇiĕvi jaï kaha vi viẏaṭṭaï
      to amhāraü  $  khandhāvāru savvu dalavaṭṭaï


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 16:


kiṇṇa parakkamu vujjhiu  $  jaïẏahũ sura-valĕ jujjhiu
jiṇĕvi valā valavantahŏ  $  bhaggu maraṭṭu jaẏantahŏ
aṇṇu vi pavaṇa-puttu jasa-luddhaü  $  so vi ṇāga-vāsehĩ ṇivaddhaü
bhāmaṇḍalu suggīu sahattheṃ  $  vaddha te vi teṇa ji divvattheṃ
aṇṇu vi kumbhaẏaṇṇu kiṃ dhariẏaü  $  jaïẏahũ saṇṇahevi ṇīsariẏaü
tahĩ avasarĕ jeṃ teṇa viẏambhiu  $  kiṇṇa diṭṭhu valu saẏalu vi thambhiu
aṇṇu vi mārui āvaï pāviu  $  tārā-suĕṇa dukkhu choḍāviu
te viṇṇi aṇilāṇala-sarisā  $  keṇa paḍicchiẏa vaddhāmarisā
vaddhā kiṇṇa hunti maṇi ujjala  $  vaddhā maü muanti kiṃ maẏagala
vaddhā kavvālāva bhaḍārā  $  kiṇṇa hunti jaṇavaĕ guruārā

ghattā:

āẏahũ hatthĕṇa  $  bhāi-vaïru pariaḍḍhĕvi bhīsaṇu
      eu ṇa jāṇahũ   $  kāĩ karesaï cheĕ vihīsaṇu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 17:


taṃ ṇisuṇevi halīseṃ  $  vuccaï vihuṇiẏa-sīseṃ
"lakkhaṇa-samu kiẏa-pesaṇu  $  vihaḍaï kema vihīsaṇu
viṇaẏavantu accanta-saṇehaü  $  aṇṇu vi khattiẏa-maggu ṇa ehaü
jeṇa samāṇu rosu so hammaï  $  avaseṃ sahũ avasāṇu ṇa gammaï
ahavaï kiṃ karanti te kuddhā  $  bhagga-maḍapphara saṃsaĕ chuddhā
ukkhaẏa-danta matta māẏaṅga va  $  dāḍhuppāḍiẏa pavara bhuvaṅga va
ṇahara-pahara-parihīṇa maïnda va  $  uṇṇaï-bhagga mahīhara-vinda va"
laddhāesa padhāiẏa kiṅkara  $  ukkhaẏa-paharaṇa-ṇiẏara-bhaẏaṅkara
gampiṇu teṇa asesa vi rāṇā  $  dummaṇa dīṇa ṇiruṇṇaẏa-māṇā
lakkhaṇa-rāmahũ pāsu parāṇiẏa  $  sahũ anteureṇa sare ṇhāṇiẏa

ghattā:

loẏācārĕṇa   $  pāṇiu diṇṇu dasāṇaṇa-vīrahŏ
      añjali-uḍĕhĩ va   $  para ghivanti lāẏaṇṇu sarīrahŏ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 18:


aha dahamuha-piẏaïttihĕ  $  mucchāviẏaĕ (?) dharittihĕ
paccujjīviẏa-atthaĕ  $  salilu ghivanti va matthaĕ
ahavaï vasumaīĕ jaṃ diṇṇaü  $  sokkhu asesu vi āsi uchiṇṇaü
taṃ pahu pacchaĕ maggijjantaĩ  $  dinti ṇāĩ vevanta-ruvantaĩ
puṇu vi paḍīvaĩ vuḍḍaĩ saravarĕ  $  ṇaṃ pāviṭṭhaĩ ṇaraẏabbhantarĕ
puṇu ṇīsariẏaĩ sarahŏ raüddahŏ  $  ṇaṃ bhaviẏaĩ saṃsāra-samuddahŏ
jalu lāẏaṇṇu ṇāĩ mellantaĩ  $  ṇaṃ tivalīu taraṅgahũ dentaĩ
vaḍḍima sarahŏ marālahũ thira-gaï  $  cakkavāla-juvalahũ thaṇa-saṅgaï
muha-aṇurāu ratta-aravindahũ  $  mahu ālāvaü mahuara-vindahũ
vatta-soha saẏavatta-sahāsahũ  $  ṇaẏaṇa-cchavi kuvalaẏahũ asesahũ

ghattā:

ṇīru tareppiṇu  $  juaï-sahāsaĩ sāiu dinti
      pīlĕvi pīlĕvi  $  kaluṇu mahā-rasu ṇāĩ laïnti


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 19:


tāva vihīsaṇa-ṇāmeṃ  $  kiẏa-dūrahŏ ji paṇāmeṃ
lāẏaṇṇambha-mahāsari  $  dhīriẏa laṅka-puresari
"vāla-marāla-līla-gaï-gāmiṇi  $  ajja vi rajju tuhāraü sāmiṇi
sohaü taṃ jĕ tuhāraü pesaṇu  $  chattaĩ tāĩ taṃ ji sīhāsaṇu
camaraĩ tāĩ tāĩ dhaẏa-daṇḍaĩ  $  raẏaṇa-ṇihāṇaĩ vasuha-ti-khaṇḍaĩ
te ji turaṅga te ji gaẏa sandaṇa  $  te ji tuhārā saẏala vi ṇandaṇa
te ji asesa bhicca hiẏaïcchā  $  te ji ṇarāhiva āṇa-vaḍicchā
sā tuhũ sā jĕ laṅka paramesari  $  indaï bhuñjaü saẏala vasundhari"
taṃ ṇisuṇevi pavolliu rāvaṇi  $  vijjāhara-kumāra-cūḍāmaṇi
"lacchi kumāri va cañcala-cittī  $  kiha bhuñjami jā tāeṃ bhuttī

ghattā:

pahu maĩ kallaĕ  $  savva-saṅga-paricāu karevvaü
     sahũ parivārĕṇa  $  pāṇi-pattĕ āhāru laevvaü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa IV, Saṃdhi 77, Kaḍavaka 20:


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi ṇīsāmĕṇa  $  pulaü vahanteṃ rāmĕṇa
sāhukkāriu rāvaṇi  $  "hohi bhavva-cūḍāmaṇi"
ema bhaṇĕvi jaẏalacchi-ṇivāsahŏ  $  savvaĩ ṇiẏaĩ ṇiẏaẏa-āvāsahŏ
parihāviẏaĩ dukūlaĩ vatthaĩ  $  vāẏaraṇaĩ va laddha-saddatthaĩ
parihāviẏaü dasāṇaṇa-pattiu  $  sahu keurĕhĩ vimukkaü pottiu
ṇeura-ṇivahu samaü laẏa-maggeṃ  $  rasaṇā-dāmaĩ sahũ sohaggeṃ
aṅgutthaliẏaü vantaṇi-sohĕhĩ(?)  $  cūḍā-vandha samaü ghara-mohĕhĩ
sahũ keūrāliṅgaṇa-bhāvĕhĩ  $  kaṇṭhā kaṇṭha-ggahaṇa-sahāvĕhĩ
maṇi-kuṇḍalaĩ samaü taṇu-teĕhĩ  $  vara-kaṇṇāvaẏaṃsa sahũ geĕhĩ
luhiẏa hiẏa(?) tilaẏa sahũ māṇĕhĩ  $  cūḍāmaṇi piẏa-paṇaẏa-paṇāmĕhĩ

ghattā:

eva vimukkaĩ   $  visaẏa-suhehĩ samaü maṇi-raẏaṇaĩ
     ṇavara ṇa mukkaĩ  $  diḍhaĩ sa iṃ bhu eṇa guru-vaẏaṇaĩ


jujjhakaṃḍaṃ samāptam

*************************  V. uttarakaṇḍaṃ  *************************  
________________________________________________________________________



----------  [78. aṭṭhasattarimo saṃdhi]  ----------


rāvaṇĕṇa maranteṃ diṇṇu suhu  $  surahũ dukkhu vandhava-jaṇahŏ
rāmahŏ kalattu lakkhaṇahŏ  $  jaü avicalu rajju vihīsaṇahŏ

_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 1:


jasasesīhūaĕ dahavaẏaṇĕ  $  paḍivaṇṇaĕ diṇamaṇi-atthavaṇĕ
chappaṇṇa-saehĩ mahā-risihĩ  $  tava-sūrahũ ṇāsiẏa-bhava-ṇisihĩ
ṇāmeṇa sāhu apameẏavalu  $  thiu ṇandaṇa-vaṇĕ meru va acalu
uppaṇṇu ṇāṇu tahŏ muṇivarahŏ  $  ettahĕ vi parama-titthaṅkarahŏ
dhaṇa-kaṇaẏa-raẏaṇa-kāmiṇi-paürĕ  $  aïsundarĕ sundararaẏaṇa-purĕ
je vandaṇahattiĕ tetthu gaẏa  $  te iha vi parāiẏa amara-saẏa
ettahĕ rahu-taṇaü sa-sāhaṇu vi  $  ettahĕ indaï ghaṇavāhaṇu vi
saẏalehĩ vi vandaṇahatti kiẏa  $  raẏaṇīẏara puṇu vollanta thiẏa

ghattā:

"tumhāgamu uggamu kevalahŏ  $  aṇṇu eu devāgamaṇu
    gaẏa-divasĕ bhaḍārā hontu jaï  $  to marantu kiṃ dahavaẏaṇu"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 2:

paramesaru kevala-ṇāṇa-ṇihi  $  ṇisiẏarahã viakkhaï dhamma-vihi
"visamahŏ dīharahŏ aṇiṭṭhiẏahŏ  $  tihuẏaṇa-vammīẏa-pariṭṭhiẏahŏ
ko kāla-bhuẏaṅgahŏ uvvaraï  $  jo jagu jĕ savvu uvasaṅgharaï
tahŏ jahĩ jahĩ kahi mi diṭṭhi ramaï  $  tahĩ tahĩ ṇaṃ maïẏavaṭṭu bhamaï
kĕ vi gilaï gilĕvi kĕ vi uggilaï  $  kāhi (?) mi jammāvasāṇĕ milaï
kĕ vi ṇaraẏa-vilĕhĩ païsĕvi gasaï  $  kāhi (?) vi aṇulaggaü jjĕ vasaï
kĕ vi kaḍḍhaï saggahŏ vari caḍĕvi  $  kĕ vi khaẏahŏ ṇei upparĕ paḍĕvi
kĕ vi ghāraï ghŏraĕ pāva-visĕṇa  $  kĕ vi bhakkhaï ṇāṇāviha-misĕṇa

ghattā:

tahŏ ko vi ṇa cukkaï bhukkhiẏahŏ  $  kāla-bhuaṅgahŏ dūsahahŏ
    jiṇa-vaẏaṇa-rasāẏaṇu lahu piẏahŏ  $  jeṃ ajarāmaru paü lahahŏ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 3:


jaï kāla-bhuaggu ṇa uvaḍasaï  $  to kiṃ suravaï saggahŏ khasaï
kahĩ rāvaṇu suravara-ḍamara-karu  $  dasa-kandharu dasa-muhu vīsa-karu
vahurūviṇi jasu pesaṇu karaï  $  jasu ṇāmeṃ tihuẏaṇu tharaharaï
jasu candu ṇa ṇahaẏalĕ tavaï ravi  $  jamu talavaru vatthaĩ dhuvaï havi
jasu paṅgaṇu vohāraï pavaṇu  $  kosāṇupālu jasu vaïsavaṇu
ghaṇa chaḍaü denti sarasaï jhuṇaï  $  jasu vaṇasaï pupphaccaṇu kuṇaï
sā sampaẏa gaẏa kahĩ rāvaṇahŏ  $  kahĩ rāvaṇu kahĩ suhu pariẏaṇahŏ

ghattā:

amha vi tumha vi avaraha mi (?)  $  savvaĩ ekkahĩ miliẏāĩ
    pekkhesahũ kāla-bhuaṅgamĕṇa  $  ajja va kalla va giliẏāĩ


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 4:

so kāla-bhuaṅgamu duvvisahŏ  $  aṇṇu vi visamaü parivāru tahŏ
acchaï pariveḍhiu sappiṇihĩ  $  vihĩ osappiṇi-avasappiṇihĩ
ekkekkahĕ tiṇṇi tiṇṇi samaẏa  $  su-du-paḍhama-samuttara-ṇāma ṇaẏa
tāhã vi uppaṇṇa saṭṭhi taṇaẏa  $  saṃvacchara-ṇāma pasiddhi gaẏa
ekkekkahŏ viṇṇi kalattāĩ  $  aẏaṇaĩ ṇāmeṇa pahuttāĩ
ekkekkahŏ tahĩ cha-cchaṅgaruha  $  phagguṇa-avasāṇa cetta-pamuha
ekkekkahŏ tahŏ vi dhavala-kasaṇa  $  uppaṇṇa putta dui dui jĕ jaṇa
ekkekkahŏ tahĩ vi pāṇa-piẏaü  $  paṇṇāraha paṇṇāraha tiẏaü

ghattā:

ĕhu pariẏaṇu kāla-bhuaṅgamahŏ  $  avaru gaṇĕvi keṃ sakkiẏaü
    so tehaü tihuaṇĕ ko vi ṇa vi  $  jo ṇa vi āeṃ ḍaṅkiẏaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 5:

taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi karuṇa-rasabbhaïẏa  $  indaï-ghaṇavāhaṇa pavvaïẏa
maẏa-kumbhaẏaṇṇa-māricci tiha  $  avara vi ṇarinda amarinda-ṇiha
sahasatti jāẏa sīlāharaṇa  $  āẏāsa-vāsa kara-pāvaraṇa
mandoẏari vaẏa-guṇa-vantiẏahĕ  $  kantiẏahĕ pāsĕ sasikantiẏahĕ
ṇikkhanta samaü anteurĕṇa  $  sāharaṇottāriẏa-ṇeurĕṇa
pavvaïu ko vi pavvaïu ṇa vi  $  ṇahĕ ṇāĩ ṇihālaü āu ravi
ravi uiu vihīsaṇu gaẏaü tahĩ  $  ṇandaṇa-vaṇĕ jaṇaẏahŏ taṇaẏa jahĩ
āharaṇaĩ vatthaĩ ḍhoiẏaĩ  $  vaïdehiĕ tāĩ ṇa joiẏaĩ

ghattā:

"malu kevalu āẏaĩ savvaï mi  $  jaï maṇĕ maliṇu maṇammaṇaü
    ṇiẏa-païhĕ milantihĕ kula-vahuhĕ  $  sīlu ji hoi pasāhaṇaü"


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 6:


"jaï jāmi āsi paricatta-bhaẏa  $  to sahũ haṇuvanteṃ kiṇṇa gaẏa"
"viṇu ṇiẏa-bhattāreṃ jantiẏahĕ   $  kulaharu jĕ pisuṇu kulaüttiẏahĕ
purisahũ cittaĩ āsīvisaĩ  $  alahanta vi uddisanti misaĩ
vīsāsu janti ṇaü iẏarahu mi  $  suẏa-devara-bhāẏara-piẏarahu mi"
taṃ vaẏaṇu suṇevi mahāsaïhĕ  $  gaü pāsu vihīsaṇu rahuvaïhĕ
"ahŏ ahŏ paramesara dāsarahi  $  pacchaĕ laṅkāuri païsarahi
mili tāva bhaḍārā jāṇaïhĕ  $  taru duttara-viraha-mahāṇaïhĕ
caḍu tijagavihūsaṇa-kumbhaẏalĕ  $  maẏa-parimala-melāviẏa-bhasalĕ"
attā


taṃ ṇisuṇĕvi halaharu cakkaharu  $  sīẏahĕ pāsĕ samuccaliẏa
    ahiseẏa-samaĕ siri-devaẏahĕ   $  diggaẏa viṇṇi ṇāĩ miliẏa


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 7:


vaïdehi diṭṭha hari-halaharĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ candaleha vihĩ jalaharĕhĩ
ṇaṃ saraẏa-lacchi paṅkaẏa-sarĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ puṇṇima vihĩ pakkhantarĕhĩ
ṇaṃ sura-sari himagiri-sāẏarĕhĩ  $  ṇaṃ ṇaha-siri canda-divāẏarĕhĩ
paripuṇṇa maṇoraha jāṇaïhĕ  $  taraï va lāẏaṇṇa-mahāṇaïhĕ
ṇiẏa-ṇaẏaṇa-sarāsaṇi sandhaï va  $  piu paguṇa-guṇehĩ ṇivandhaï va
jasa-kaddamĕ ṇaṃ jagu limpaï va  $  harisaṃsu-pavāheṃ sippaï va
vijjei va karaẏala-pallavĕhĩ  $  accei va ṇaha-kusumĕhĩ ṇavĕhĩ
païsaraï va hiẏaĕ halāuhahŏ  $  karaï va ujjou disāmuhahŏ

ghattā:

mehaliĕ milantahŏ rahuvaïhĕ  $  suhu uppaṇṇaü jettaḍaü
    indahŏ indattaṇu pattāhŏ    $  hojja ṇa hojja va tettaḍaü


_______________________________________________________________


START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 78, Kaḍavaka 8:


sa-kalattaü lakkhaṇu paṇaẏa-siru  $  pabhaṇaï jalahara-gambhīra-giru
"jaṃ kiu khara-dūsaṇa-tisira-vahu  $  jaṃ haṃsadīvĕ jiu haṃsarahu
jaṃ satti paḍicchiẏa samara-muhĕ  $  jaṃ lagga visalla karamvuruhĕ
jaṃ raṇĕ uppaṇṇu cakka-raẏaṇu   $  jaṃ ṇihaü valuddharu dahavaẏaṇu
jaṃ devi pasāeṃ taü taṇĕṇa  $  kulu dhavaliu jāĕ saïttaṇĕṇa"
ahivāẏaṇu kiu lakkhaṇĕṇa jiha  $  suggīva-pamuha-ṇaravarahĩ tiha
saẏala vi ṇiẏa-ṇiẏa-vāhaṇĕhĩ thiẏa  $  para-pura-pavesa-sāmaggi kiẏa
jaẏa-maṅgala-tūraĩ tāḍiẏaĩ  $  riu-ghariṇihĩ cittaĩ pāḍiẏaĩ
ghattā:

païsantahã vala-ṇārāẏaṇahã  $  ṇaẏaru maṇoharu āvaḍiu

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 82, Kaḍavaka 8:

jāṇĕvi kumāra-vikkamu alaṅghu  $  suṭṭheriu rosiu vajjajaṅghu
"jo tumhahã tihi mi aṇiṭṭhu pāu  $  so mahu mi ṇa bhāvaï pisuṇa-bhāu"

----------  [83. teāsīmo saṃdhi]  ----------

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 83, Kaḍavaka 1:

"deva deva jaï huavahu ḍajjhaï  $  jaï māruu paḍa-poṭṭalĕ vajjhaï

jaï uppajjaï maraṇu kiẏantahŏ  $  jaï ṇāsaï sāsaṇu arahantahŏ

sahũ tehĩ milĕvi kañcaṇarahāsu  $  gaẏa samuha saẏamvara-maṇḍavāsu
jahĩ gāḍha ṇiviḍa vahu mañca vaddha  $  ṇāvaï sakkaï-kaẏa kavva-vandha
jahĩ ṇaravara paẏaḍiẏa-vahu-viẏāra  $  khaṇĕ galĕ vandhanti muẏanti hāra
khaṇĕ lenti aṇeẏaĩ bhūsaṇāĩ  $  caü-disu joẏanti ṇiẏaṃsaṇāĩ
jahĩ suvvaï vīṇā-veṇu-saddu  $  paḍu-paḍaha-murava-ruñjā-ṇiṇaddu
jahĩ maṇaharu kĕ vi gāẏanti geu  $  aï-su-saru suhāvaü viviha-bheu

----------  [87. sattāsīmo saṃdhi]  ----------


vahu-divasĕhĩ te lakkhaṇa-sua vi  $  duddharu dūsahu tavu karĕvi
jiha haṇuu tema dhuẏa-kamma-raẏa  $  thiẏa siva-sāsaĕ païsarĕvi

paĩ viṇu a-kileseṃ bhuvaṇĕ kāsu  $  karĕ laggaï asivaru sūrahāsu
paĩ viṇu ko helaĕ garua-dhīru  $  viṇivāẏaï samvukumāru vīru
paĩ viṇu saṃdarisiẏa-vahu-viẏāru  $  ko pariẏāṇaï candaṇahi-cāru
paĩ viṇu ko jīviu haraï tāhã  $  tīhi mi tisiraẏa-khara-dūsaṇāhã
paĩ viṇu ko dhīraï pamaẏa-satthu  $  ko koḍi-siluddharaṇahũ samatthu
paĩ viṇu laṅkā-ṇaẏarihĕ samīvĕ  $  ko jiṇaï haṃsarahu haṃsa-dīvĕ
paĩ viṇu ko indaï dharaï bhāi  $  ko rāvaṇa-sattiĕ samuhu thāi
paĩ viṇu kahŏ āvaï kiẏa-visalla  $  divasaẏarĕ aṇuṭṭhantaĕ visalla
paĩ viṇu uppajjaï kahŏ rahaṅgu  $  ko darisaï vahurūviṇihĕ bhaṅgu
paĩ viṇu kiẏantu ko rāvaṇāsu  $  ko siẏa-dāẏāru vihīsaṇāsu

ghattā:

paĩ viṇu maṇiṭṭha mahu bhāiṇara  $  ko melāvaï piẏa-ghariṇi
      pālesaï ṇiru ṇiruvaddaviẏa  $  ko ti-khaṇḍa-maṇḍiẏa dharaṇi

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 87, Kaḍavaka 14:

hā tavahŏ vigaẏa mahu putta ve vi  $  lacchīhara gampiṇu āu levi
hā muĕ maccharu lahu pāliela  $  vaṭṭaï aṇagāra-muṇinda-vela
hā kiṃ mahu uvari paṇaṭṭhu ṇehu  $  hā jaṇu saṃthavahi ruvantu ehu
iha cakkeṃ jeṃ haü vaïri-cakku  $  so visahahi keva kiẏanta-cakku
hā kāĩ karami saṃcarami ketthu  $  ṇa vi taṃ paesu suhu lahami jetthu
ṇiḍḍahaï jema bhāẏara-viou  $  tiha ṇa vi visu visamu ṇa pisuṇu lou
ṇa vi gimha-ẏālĕ khara-diṇaẏaro vi  $  ṇa vi pajjāliu vaïsāṇaro vi

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 87, Kaḍavaka 15:

ruṇṇu aüjjhā-jaṇĕṇa aseseṃ  $  avarāiĕ suppahaĕ viseseṃ
ruṇṇu sallasundariĕ visālaĕ  $  ruṇṇu visallaĕ tiha guṇamālaĕ
ruṇṇu raẏaṇacūlaĕ vaṇamālaĕ  $  tiha kallāṇamāla-ṇāmālaĕ

ruṇṇu kamalaloẏaṇa-sasimuhiẏahĩ  $  sasivaddhaṇa-sīhoẏara-duhiẏahĩ
ruṇṇu aṇeẏahĩ vandhava-saẏaṇĕhĩ  $  khaṇĕ khaṇĕ vihihĕ diṇṇa-duvvaẏaṇĕhĩ

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 87, Kaḍavaka 16:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 87, Kaḍavaka 17:

"hā hā kālaho ṇihāṇa-pāla  $  aï-dūrīhūaü sāmisāla
hā hā kahĕ pesaṇu kiṃ pi ṇāha  $  hā ajju jāẏa amhaĩ aṇāha
hā hā jaṇa-maṇa-jaṇiẏāṇurāẏa  $  kahĕ ko pesesaï vahu-pasāẏa

hā hā sāmiẏa savvovaẏāri  $  hā hā maẏaraharāvatta-dhāri
hā sāmiẏa tuha daẏa-riṇu imeṇa  $  parisujjhaï ṇa vi ekkeṃ bhaveṇa
teṃ kajjeṃ kiṃ ĕu juttu tujjhu  $  jeṃ muĕvi jāhi ṇa kahantu gujjhu"

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 87, Kaḍavaka 18:


appaü santhaviu vihīsaṇeṇa  $  puṇu pabhaṇiu rāhavacandu teṇa
"parisesahi deva mahantu sou  $  kāsu ṇa bhuvaṇantarĕ huu viou
ṇa vi ekkahŏ eẏahŏ antakaraṇu  $  savvahŏ vi jaṇahŏ jara-jamma-maraṇu
jīvahŏ bhava-gahaṇĕ ṇa kā vi bhanti  $  cañcalaĩ sarīraĩ honti janti
uppatti jeva tiha dhuvu viṇāsu  $  kiṃ rovahi kāraṇĕ lakkhaṇāsu
kaïu vi amhehĩ tumhehĩ eva  $  pahu gamaṇu karevaü eṇa jeva
jaï jīva-rāsi āvaï ṇa jāi  $  to meiṇi-maṇḍalĕ ketthu māi
jaï maraṇu ṇāhĩ bho rāmaẏanda  $  to kahĩ gaẏa kulaẏara jiṇavarinda
kahĩ bharaha-pamuha cakkavaï pavara  $  kahĩ rudda-kaṇha-valaeva avara

ghattā:

      jhāẏahi sa ẏa mbhu taïlokka-guru  $  duhu du-kalattu va pariharahi


iẏa pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-raïe  $  hari-maraṇaṃ ṇāma pavvam iṇaṃ
vandaïāsiẏa-kaïrāẏa-  $  taṇaẏa-tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-ṇimmavie
pomacariẏassa sese  $  sattāsīmo imo saggo
tihuaṇa-saẏambhu ṇavaraṃ  $  ekko kaïrāẏa-cakkiṇuppaṇṇo
paümacariẏassa cūlāmaṇi vva  $  sesaṃ kaẏaṃ jeṇa


----------  [88. aṭṭhāsīmo saṃdhi]  ----------


tahĩ avasarĕ sirasā paṇavantĕhĩ  $  valu viṇṇaviu saẏala-sāmantĕhĩ
"paramesara uvasoha samārahŏ  $  lacchīhara-kumāru saṃkārahŏ"
dhruvakaṃ

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 88, Kaḍavaka 1:


pabhaṇaï sīrāuhu iẏa vaẏaṇĕhĩ  $  "ḍajjhahŏ tumhĕhĩ sahũ ṇiẏa-saẏaṇĕhĩ
ḍajjhaü māẏa-vappu tumhāraü  $  hou cirāusu bhāi mahāraü
uṭṭhi jāhũ lakkhaṇa lahu tettahĕ  $  khala-vaẏaṇaĩ suvvanti ṇa jettahĕ
ẽva cavĕvi cumvĕvi ālāvĕvi  $  vāsueu ṇiẏa-khandhĕ caḍāvĕvi
gaü valaeu aṇṇu thāṇantaru  $  païṭhu turantu pavara-majjaṇaharu
"bhāi viujjhahi kettiu sovahi  $  ṇhāṇa-vela parilhasiẏa ṇa joẏahi"
puṇu pīḍhovari thavĕvi ṇavamhĕhĩ  $  ahisiñcaï vara-kañcaṇa-kumbhĕhĩ
puṇu bhūsaï maṇi-raẏaṇāharaṇĕhĩ  $  sasahara-tavaṇa-teẏa-avaharaṇĕhĩ
puṇu vollaï samāṇu sūẏārahŏ  $  "bhoẏaṇa-vihi lahu karahŏ kumārahŏ
teṇa vi vitthāriu hari-pariẏalu  $  dei piṇḍa muhĕ maṇĕ mohiu valu
ṇa vi ahilasaï ṇa pekkhaï lakkhaṇu  $  jiṇa-vaẏaṇu va a-bhavvu a-viẏakkhaṇu

ghattā:

tahŏ āẏaĩ avaraĩ vi karantahŏ  $  ṇiẏa-khandheṃ hari-maḍaü vahantahŏ
      bhāi-vioẏa-jāẏa-aï-khāmahŏ  $  addhu varisu volīṇaü rāmahŏ

START

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 88, Kaḍavaka 3:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 88, Kaḍavaka 4:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 88, Kaḍavaka 5:

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 88, Kaḍavaka 8:


puṇar avi eva vuttu kākuttheṃ  $  "ke tumhe akkhahŏ paramattheṃ

kohu mūlu savvahũ vi aṇatthahũ  $  kohu mūlu saṃsārāvatthahũ
kohu viṇāsa-karaṇu daẏa-dhammahŏ  $  kohu jĕ mūlu ghora-dukkammahŏ
kohu jĕ mūlu jaga-ttaẏa-maraṇahŏ  $  kohu jĕ mūlu ṇaraẏa-païsaraṇahŏ
kohu jĕ vaïriu savvahŏ jīvahŏ  $  teṃ kajjeṃ ahŏ hari-dahagīvahŏ
kohu visajjahŏ visama-sahāvahŏ  $  avaropparu mittattaṇu bhāvahŏ"
taṇ ṇisuṇĕvi iẏa vaẏaṇāṇantarĕ  $  tiṇṇi vi te uvasamiẏa khaṇantarĕ
"kiṃ daẏa-dhammĕ ṇa kiẏa dihi taïẏahũ  $  āsi laddhu maṇuattaṇu jaïẏahũ
hā hā kāĩ pāu kiu vaḍḍaü  $  jeṃ sampāiẏa duhu evaḍḍaü

ghattā:

tuhũ para dhaṇṇaü jiẏa-loẏaĕ  $  jeṃ chaṇḍiẏa ku-maï
     jiṇa-vaẏaṇāmaẏa-paripīẏaü  $  jāu surāhivaï"

START
PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 89, Kaḍavaka 11:


to parivaḍḍhiẏa maṇĕ kāruṇṇeṃ  $  vāsaveṇa duvvaṅkura-vaṇṇeṃ
sadda-paramparāĕ mambhīsiẏa  $  "ehu ehu" ālāva pabhāsiẏa
"laï vaṭṭaï etthahŏ uddhārami  $  duggaï-duttara-taḍiṇihĕ tārami
viṇṇi vi jaṇa sahasā solahamaü  $  saggu parāṇami accua-ṇāmaü"
ẽva bhaṇevi lei kira jāvahĩ  $  loṇiu jema vilĕvi gaẏa tāvahĩ
jalaṇeṃ tuppu jema tiha tāviẏa  $  aï-dugejjha dappaṇa-chāẏa va thiẏa
savvovāẏahĩ bhaggāṇandeṃ  $  kema vi levi ṇa sakkiẏa indeṃ
aha jahĩ jeṇa jeva pāvevaü  $  suhu va duhu va tihuaṇĕ bhuñjevaü
taṃ samatthu ko viṇivārevaĕ  $  kāsu satti parirakkha karevaĕ
puṇu vahu-dukkhāṇala-santattā  $  ve vi cavanti eva vevantā

ghattā:

"uvaesu daẏāvara kiṃ pi  $  kahĕ givvāṇa-vaï
      jeṃ puṇu vi ṇa pāvahũ eha  $  bhīsaṇa ṇaraẏa-gaï"

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 89, Kaḍavaka 12:


teṇa vi pavuttu "jaï karahŏ vaẏaṇu  $  to lehu turiu sammatta-raẏaṇu
jaṃ paramuttamu tihuaṇĕ pasiddhu  $  aï-dullahu puṇṇa-pavittu suddhu
jaṃ kamma-mahaṇu kallāṇa-tattu  $  duṇṇeu abhavvahã bhava-bhaẏantu
jaṃ kahiu parama-titthaṅkarehĩ  $  paripujjiu sura-ṇara-visaharehĩ
jaṃ sundaru kāleṃ vohi dei  $  sāsaẏa-siva-thāṇu pahāṇu ṇei"
iẏa-vaẏaṇĕhĩ dūrujjhiẏa-bhaehĩ  $  sammattu vihi mi paḍivaṇṇu tehĩ
gaü sīẏā-hari vi sa-saṅku tetthu  $  valaeu sa-kevala-ṇāṇu jetthu
samasaraṇabbhantarĕ païsarevi  $  bhattiĕ puṇu puṇu vandaṇa karevi

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 89, Kaḍavaka 13:


tuhũ para ekku viẏaḍḍhu viẏaḍḍhahũ  $  sūrahũ sūru guṇaḍḍhu guṇaḍḍhahũ
ṇāṇa-mesavāhaṇĕṇa bhaẏāvaṇu  $  jeṇa daḍḍhu bhava-caügaï-kāṇaṇu
uttama-lesa-tisūleṃ duddharu  $  jeṃ kiu moha-vaïri saẏa-sakkaru
diḍha-mahanta-vaïraggahŏ pāsiu  $  jeṇa ṇeha-ṇāmu vi ṇiṇṇāsiu
aṇṇu vi eu kāĩ taü juttaü  $  siva-paü ekkeṃ jaï vi viḍhattaü
to vi kiṃ maĩ muĕvi jāijjaï  $  āvami jema haü mi taha kijjaï"
pabhaṇaï muṇivarindu "suṇĕ sundara  $  dūrĕ pamāẏahi rāu purandara
jiṇĕhĩ pagāsiu mokkhu vi-rāẏahŏ  $  kamma-vandhu diḍhu hoi sa-rāẏahŏ"

ghattā:

    sīendeṃ rāma-muṇindu  $  ṇamiu sa ẏa mbhu ĕhĩ




iẏa-pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-raïe  $  vala-ṇāṇuppatti-pavvam iṇaṃ
iẏa ettha mahākavve  $  vandaïāsiẏa-saẏambhu-taṇaẏa-kae
rāmāẏaṇassa sese  $  eso saggo ṇavīsamo


----------  [90. ṇavaïmo saṃdhi]  ----------

vāleṇa vi jeṇa saẏambhu-kavva-bhāro samuvvūḍho




puṇar avi suravaï āhāsaï  $  "jo tava-sañjama-ṇiẏama-juu
paramesara kahĕ saṅkhevĕṇa  $  dasaraha-rāṇaü ketthu huu

PAUMACARIU, Kaṇḍa V, Saṃdhi 90, Kaḍavaka 1:

kā jaṇaẏahŏ kaṇaẏahŏ kekkaẏahĕ  $  kā avarāiẏahĕ su-suppahahĕ
kā lakkhaṇa-māẏahĕ kekkaẏahĕ  $  kā bhāmaṇḍalahŏ cāru-maïhĕ"
akkhaï kevali sura-ṇamiẏa-paü  $  "dasarahu terahamaü saggu gaü
paramāu vīsa sāẏaraĩ jahĩ  $  jaṇaü vi kaṇaü vi uppaṇṇu tahĩ
parimāṇu jetthu āhuṭṭha kara  $  avara vi aṇeẏa tahĩ jāẏa ṇara
avarāiẏa-kekkaẏa-suppahaü  $  kaïkaï-sahiẏaü parisaha-sahaü
aṇṇaü vi ghora-tava-tattiẏaü  $  savvaü devattaṇu pattiẏaü

jiha so tiha aṇanta-suha-thāṇahŏ  $  gaü ghaṇavāhaṇo vi ṇivvāṇahŏ
jasu keraü ajja vi ahiṇandaï  $  lou meharahu titthu pavandaï
kumbhaẏaṇṇu puṇu sāsaẏa-sokkhahŏ  $  so vi vaḍahĕ kheḍḍahĕ gaü mokkhahŏ

ghattā:

gaü rahuvaï kaïhi mi divasĕhĩ  $  tihuaṇa-maṅgalagārāhŏ
     ajarāmara-pura-paripālahŏ  $  pāsu sa ẏa mbhu-bhaḍārāhŏ




iẏa pomacariẏa-sese  $  saẏambhuevassa kaha vi uvvarie
tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-raïe  $  rāhava-ṇivvāṇa-pavvam iṇaṃ
vandaïāsiẏa-tihuẏaṇa-  $  saẏambhu-pariviraïẏammi maha-kavve
pomacariẏassa sese  $  saṃpuṇṇo ṇavaïmo saggo



pomacariẏaṃ samattaṃ

praśastigāthāḥ

siri-vijjāhara-kaṇḍe saṃdhīo honti vīsa-parimāṇā  $  ujjhā-kaṇḍammi tahā vāvīsa muṇeha gaṇaṇāe
caüdaha sundara-kaṇḍe ekkāhiẏa-vīsa jujjha-kaṇḍe ẏa  $  uttara-kaṇḍe teraha sandhīo ṇavaï savvāu



tihuaṇa-saẏambhu ṇavaram ekko kaïrāẏa-cakkiṇuppaṇṇo  $  paümacariẏassa cūlāmaṇi vva sesaṃ kaẏaṃ jeṇa
kaïrāẏassa vijaẏa-sesiẏassa vitthārio jaso bhuvaṇe  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā pomacariẏa-seseṇa ṇisseso
tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-dhavalassa ko guṇe vaṇṇiuṃ jae taraï  $  vāleṇa vi jeṇa saẏambhu-kavva-bhāro samuvvūḍho
vāẏaraṇa-daḍha-kkhandho āgama-aṅgo pamāṇa-viẏaḍa-pao  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-dhavalo jiṇa-titthe vahaü kavva-bharaṃ



caümuha-saẏambhuevāṇa vāṇiẏatthaṃ acakkhamāṇeṇa  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-raïẏaṃ pañcamicariẏaṃ mahacchariẏaṃ
savve vi suā pañjara-sua vva paḍhiẏakkharāĩ sikkhanti  $  kaïrāẏassa suo puṇa suẏa vva sui-gabbha-sambhūo
tihuaṇa-saẏambhu jaï ṇa hontu (?) ṇandaṇo siri-saẏambhudevassa  $  kavvaṃ kulaṃ kavittaṃ to pacchā ko samuddharaï
jaï ṇa huu chandacūḍāmaṇissa tihuaṇa-saẏambhu lahu-taṇao  $  to paddhiḍaẏā-kavvaṃ siri-pañcami ko samāreu
savvo vi jaṇo geṇhaï ṇiẏa-tāẏa-viḍhatta-davva-santāṇaṃ  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā puṇu gahiẏaṃ sukaïtta-santāṇaṃ
tihuaṇa-saẏambhum ekkaṃ mottūṇa saẏambhu-kavva-maẏaraharo  $  ko taraï gantum antaṃ majjhe ṇissesa-sīsāṇaṃ


iẏa cāru pomacariẏaṃ saẏambhueveṇa raïẏaṃ(ẏama?) samattaṃ  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā taṃ samāṇiẏaṃ parisamattam iṇaṃ
"ceṣṭitam ayanaṃ caritaṃ karaṇaṃ cāritram ity amī yac-chabdāḥ  $  paryāyā rāmāyaṇam ity uktaṃ tena ceṣṭitaṃ rāmasya
vācayati śruṇoti janas tasyāyur vṛddhim īyate puṇyaṃ ca  $  ākṛṣṭa-khaṅga-hasto ripur api na karoti vairam upaśamam eti"



māura-sua-sirikaïrāẏa-taṇaẏa-kaẏa-pomacariẏa-avasesaṃ  $  saṃpuṇṇaṃ saṃpuṇṇaṃ vandaïo lahaï saṃpuṇṇaṃ
goinda-maẏaṇa-suẏaṇanta-viraïẏaṃ vandaï-paḍhama-taṇaẏassa  $  vacchalladāĕ tihuaṇa-saẏambhuṇā raïẏaṃ (?) mahappaẏaṃ
vandaïẏa-ṇāga-siripāla-pahui-bhavvaẏaṇa-gaṇa-samūhassa  $  ārogatta-samiddhī-santi-suhaṃ hou savvassa
satta-mahāsaggaṅgī ti-raẏaṇa-bhūsā su-rāmakaha-kaṇṇā  $  tihuaṇa-saẏambhu-jaṇiẏā pariṇaü vandaïẏa-maṇa-taṇaẏaṃ
